tika-s0102t:477_14: Yena dhammādāsenāti idha pana maggadhammameva vadati.
tika-s0102t:478_2: so pana yasmā pāsāṇapabbato viya niccalo,
tika-s0102t:480_1: Sikkhāpadāvirodhenāti yathā bhūtarocanāpatti na hoti, evaṃ.
tika-s0102t:482_1: Tadā kira vesālī iddhā phītā sabbaṅgasampannā ahosi vepullappattā,
tika-s0102t:482_2: taṃ sandhāyāha “khandhake vuttanayena vesāliyā sampannabhāvo veditabbo”ti.
tika-s0102t:482_3: Tasmiṃ kira bhikkhusaṅghe pañcasatamattā bhikkhū navā acirapabbajitā ahesuṃ osannavīriyā ca.
tika-s0102t:482_4: Tathā hi vakkhati “tattha kira ekacce bhikkhū osannavīriyā”tiādi.
tika-s0102t:482_6: Saratīti kāyādike yathāsabhāvato ñāṇasampayuttāya satiyā anussarati upadhāreti.
tika-s0102t:483_0: Sabbasaṅgāhakanti sarīragatassa ceva vatthālaṅkāragatassa cāti sabbassa nīlabhāvassa saṅgāhakaṃ vacanaṃ.
tika-s0102t:483_3: Yathā te licchavirājāno apītādivaṇṇā eva keci vilepanavasena pītādivaṇṇā khāyiṃsu,
tika-s0102t:483_4: evaṃ anīlādivaṇṇā eva keci vilepanavasena nīlādivaṇṇā khāyiṃsūti vuttaṃ “na tesaṃ pakativaṇṇo nīlo”tiādi.
tika-s0102t:483_7: Te kira suvaṇṇaviracite hi maṇiobhāsehi ekanīlā viya khāyanti.
tika-s0102t:483_15: Aṅguliphoṭopi aṅguliyā cālanavaseneva hotīti vuttaṃ “aṅguliṃ cālesu”nti.
tika-s0102t:484_1: Taṃ pana apavattitvā olokanaṃ anu anu dassanaṃ hotīti āha “punappunaṃ passathā”ti.
tika-s0102t:485_0: “Upasaṃharatha bhikkhave licchaviparisaṃ tāvatiṃsasadisa”nti nayidaṃ nimittaggāhe niyojanaṃ,
tika-s0102t:485_1: kevalaṃ pana dibbasampattisadisā etesaṃ rājūnaṃ issariyasampattīti anupubbikathāya saggasampattikathanaṃ viya daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0102t:485_2: Tesu pana bhikkhūsu ekaccānaṃ tattha nimittaggāhopi siyā,
tika-s0102t:485_4: Hitakāmatāya tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ yathā āyasmato nandassa hitakāmatāya saggasampattidassanaṃ.
tika-s0102t:485_8: Aniccalakkhaṇavibhāvanatthanti tesaṃ rājūnaṃ vasena bhikkhūnaṃ aniccalakkhaṇavibhūtabhāvatthaṃ.
tika-s0102t:487_1: Samīpe veḷuvagāmoti pubbaṇhaṃ vā sāyanhaṃ vā gantvā nivattanayogye āsannaṭṭhāne niviṭṭhā parivāragāmo.
tika-s0102t:488_8: Adhivāsesīti tā abhibhavanto yathāparimadditākārasallakkhaṇena attani āropetvā vāsesi,
tika-s0102t:488_13: Asati hi tasmiṃ adhivāsanāya eva asambhavoti.
tika-s0102t:488_20: Yathā nāma pupphanasamaye campakādirukkhe vekhe dinne yāva so vekho nāpanīyati,
tika-s0102t:488_22: evameva yathāvuttavīriyavekhadānena tā vedanā satthu sarīre yathāparicchinnaṃ kālaṃ vikkhambhitā vinoditā ahesuṃ.
tika-s0102t:488_29: pavattana”nti ca vattabbataṃ arahatīti vuttaṃ “adhiṭṭhahitvā pavattetvā”ti.
tika-s0102t:489_0: Khaṇikasamāpattīti tādisaṃ pubbābhisaṅkhāraṃ akatvā ṭhānaso samāpajjitabbasamāpatti.
tika-s0102t:489_1: Puna sarīraṃ vedanā ajjhottharati savisesapubbābhisaṅkhārassa akatattā.
tika-s0102t:489_4: Idāni tamatthaṃ upamāya vibhāvetuṃ “yathā nāmā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:489_6: Cuddasahākārehi sannetvāti tesaṃyeva rūpasattakaarūpasattakānaṃ vasena cuddasahi pakārehi vipassanācittaṃ,
tika-s0102t:489_7: sakalameva vā attabhāvaṃ visabhāgarogasañjanitalūkhabhāvanirogakaraṇāya sinehetvā na uppajjiyeva sammāsambuddhena
tika-s0102t:490_0: Gilāno hutvā puna vuṭṭhitoti pubbe gilāno hutvā puna tato gilānabhāvato vuṭṭhito.
tika-s0102t:490_3: “Nānākārato na upaṭṭhahantī”ti iminā disāsammohopi me ahosi sokabalenāti dasseti.
tika-s0102t:490_4: Satipaṭṭhānādidhammāti kāyānupassanādayo anupassanādhammā pubbe vibhūtā hutvā upaṭṭhahantāpi idāni mayhaṃ pākaṭā na honti.
tika-s0102t:491_2: Puggalaṃ abbhantaraṃ karoti nāma samānattatāvasena dhammena pubbe tassa saṅgaṇhato.
tika-s0102t:491_4: Kassaci akathetvāti kassaci attano antevāsikassa upanigūhabhūtaṃ ganthaṃ akathetvā.
tika-s0102t:491_5: Muṭṭhiṃ katvāti muṭṭhigataṃ viya rahasibhūtaṃ katvā.
tika-s0102t:491_6: Yasmiṃ vā naṭṭhe sabbo taṃmūlako dhammo vinassati,
tika-s0102t:491_8: mussati vinassati dhammo etena naṭṭhenāti muṭṭhi,
tika-s0102t:491_9: taṃ tathārūpaṃ muṭṭhiṃ katvā pariharitvā ṭhapitaṃ kiñci natthīti dasseti.
tika-s0102t:492_1: avadhāraṇena pana vinā “ahaṃ bhikkhusaṅgha”ntiādi bhikkhusaṅghapariharaṇe ahaṃkāramamaṃkārābhāvadassananti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0102t:492_5: Evaṃ na hotīti “ahaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ pariharissāmī”tiādi ākārena cittappavatti na hoti.
tika-s0102t:492_6: “Pacchimavayaanuppattabhāvadīpanatthaṃ vutta”nti iminā vayo viya buddhakiccampi pariyositakammanti dīpeti.
tika-s0102t:493_1: Rūpādayo eva dhammā saviggaho viya upaṭṭhānato rūpanimittādayo,
tika-s0102t:493_3: Lokiyānaṃ vedanānanti yāsaṃ nirodhanena phalasamāpatti samāpajjitabbā,
tika-s0102t:493_7: Dvīhi bhāgehi āpo gato etthāti dīpo,
tika-s0102t:493_14: Mā aññagatikāti aññaṃ kiñci gatiṃ paṭisaraṇaṃ parāyaṇaṃ mā cintayittha. Kasmā?
tika-s0102t:493_16: so evaṃ sampādito tumhākaṃ dīpaṃ tāṇaṃ gati parāyaṇanti.
tika-s0102t:493_19: ko hi nātho paro siyā”ti upadesamattameva hi parasmiṃ paṭibaddhaṃ,
tika-s0102t:493_20: aññā sabbā sampatti purisassa attādhīnā eva.
tika-s0102t:493_26: Sabbepi te catusatipaṭṭhānagocarā vāti catubbidhaṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ bhāvetvā brūhetvā tadeva gocaraṃ attano
tika-s0102t:493_27: pavattiṭṭhānaṃ katvā ṭhitā eva bhikkhū agge bhavissanti.
tika-s0102t:496_2: tasmā imaṃ vesālippavesanaṃ niyametvā dassetuṃ “kadā pāvisī”ti pucchitvā āgamanato paṭṭhāya taṃ dassento “bhagavā kirā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0102t:496_3: Āgatamaggenevāti pubbe yāva veḷuvagāmakā āgatamaggeneva paṭinivattento.
tika-s0102t:498_2: Taṃ paṭhamaṃ dassananti yaṃ veḷuvane paribbājakarūpena āgatassa siddhaṃ dassanaṃ,
tika-s0102t:498_4: Yaṃ vā anomadassissa bhagavato vacanaṃ saddahantena tadā abhinīhārakāle paccakkhato viya tumhākaṃ dassanaṃ siddhaṃ,
tika-s0102t:499_5: Taṃ pavattinti tattha vasitukāmatāya vuttaṃ taṃ.
tika-s0102t:500_0: “Jānantāpi tathāgatā pucchantī”ti iminā nīhārena thero “ke tumhe”ti pucchi.
tika-s0102t:500_1: “Tvaṃ catūhi mahārājehi mahantataro”ti puṭṭho attano mahattaṃ satthu upari pakkhipanto “ārāmikasadisā ete upāsike amhākaṃ satthuno”ti āha.
tika-s0102t:500_2: Sāvakasampattikittanampi hi atthato satthu sampattiṃyeva vibhāveti.
tika-s0102t:501_1: attano ca upanissayasampattiyā ñāṇassa paripakkattā sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahitvā.
tika-s0102t:503_1: Udenayakkhassa cetiyaṭṭhāneti udenassa nāma yakkhassa āyatanabhāvena iṭṭhakāhi cite mahājanassa cittīkataṭṭhāne.
tika-s0102t:503_7: Punappunaṃ katāti bhāvanāya bahulīkaraṇena aparāparaṃ pavattitā.
tika-s0102t:503_8: Yuttayānaṃ viya katāti yathā yuttaṃ ājaññayānaṃ chekena sārathinā adhiṭṭhitaṃ yathāruci pavattati,
tika-s0102t:503_11: Vatthu viya katāti sabbaso upakkilesavisodhanena iddhivisayatāya pavattiṭṭhānabhāvato suvisodhitaparissayavatthu viya katā.
tika-s0102t:503_15: Suṭṭhu samāraddhāti iddhibhāvanāya sikhāppattiyā sammadeva saṃsevitā.
tika-s0102t:504_3: tasseva gahaṇe kāraṇaṃ brahmajālasuttavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0102t:504_4: Mahāsivatthero pana “mahābodhisattānaṃ carimabhave paṭisandhidāyino kammassa asaṅkhyeyyāyukatāsaṃvattanasamatthataṃ
tika-s0102t:504_5: hadaye ṭhapetvā buddhānaṃ āyusaṅkhārassa parissayavikkhambhanasamatthatā pāḷiyaṃ āgatā evāti imaṃ bhaddakappameva
tika-s0102t:504_7: “Khaṇḍiccādīhi abhibhuyyatī”ti etena yathā iddhibalena jarāya na paṭighāto,
tika-s0102t:504_8: evaṃ tena maraṇassapi na paṭighātoti atthato āpannamevāti.
tika-s0102t:504_10: kva ca nipatito”ti aññathā vuṭṭhitenāpi theravādena aṭṭhakathāvacanameva samatthitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0102t:505_0: Pariyuṭṭhitacittoti yathā kiñci atthānatthaṃ sallakkhetuṃ na sakkā,
tika-s0102t:505_2: So pana abhibhavo mahatā udakoghena appakassa udakassa ajjhottharaṇaṃ viya ahosīti vuttaṃ “ajjhotthaṭacitto”ti.
tika-s0102t:505_4: ariyehi vā aññopi yo koci puthujjano.
tika-s0102t:505_5: Puthujjanaggahaṇañcettha yathā sabbena sabbaṃ appahīnavipallāso mārena pariyuṭṭhitacitto kiñci atthaṃ sallakkhetuṃ na sakkoti,
tika-s0102t:505_6: evaṃ thero bhagavatā kataṃ nimittobhāsaṃ sabbaso na sallakkhesīti dassanatthaṃ.
tika-s0102t:505_12: Tenāti yadipi itare aṭṭha vipallāsā pahīnā,
tika-s0102t:505_16: aññathā tena maddite sattānaṃ maraṇameva siyā.
tika-s0102t:505_24: Vibādhanādhippāyena pana idha “kiṃ sakkhissatī”ti vuttaṃ hadayamaddanassa adhigatattā.
tika-s0102t:505_25: Nimittobhāsanti ettha “tiṭṭhatu bhagavā kappa”nti sakalakappaṃ avaṭṭhānayācanāya “yassa kassaci ānanda
tika-s0102t:505_26: cattāro iddhipādā bhāvitā”tiādinā aññāpadesena attano caturiddhipādabhāvanānubhāvena kappaṃ avaṭṭhānasamatthatāvasena
tika-s0102t:505_28: tathā pana pariyāyaṃ muñcitvā ujukaṃyeva attano adhippāyavibhāvanaṃ obhāso.
tika-s0102t:505_29: Jānantoyeva vāti mārena pariyuṭṭhitabhāvaṃ jānanto eva.
tika-s0102t:505_30: Attano aparādhahetuto sattānaṃ soko tanuko hoti,
tika-s0102t:505_32: Kiṃ pana thero mārena pariyuṭṭhitacittakāle pavattiṃ pacchā jānātīti?
tika-s0102t:507_2: virāgavibandhanena vā jātinimittatāya tattha tattha jātaṃ jātaṃ mārento viya hotīti “māretīti māro”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:507_9: Sattamasattāhato paraṃ satta ahāni sandhāyāha “aṭṭhame sattāhe”ti na pana pallaṅkasattāhādi viya niyatakiccassa aṭṭhamasattāhassa nāma labbhanato.
tika-s0102t:507_11: sakkassa ca devarañño paṭiññātadhammadesanaṃ bhagavantaṃ ñatvā “idāni satte dhammadesanāya mama visayaṃ
tika-s0102t:507_12: atikkamāpessatī”ti sañjātadomanasso hutvā ṭhito cintesi “handa dānāhaṃ naṃ upāyena parinibbāpessāmi,
tika-s0102t:507_15: Evaṃ pana cintetvā bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā ekaṃ antaṃ ṭhito “parinibbātu dāni bhante bhagavā”tiādinā parinibbānaṃ yāci,
tika-s0102t:507_18: Bhagavā cassa abhisandhiṃ jānantopi taṃ anāvikatvā parinibbānassa akālabhāvameva pakāsento yācanaṃ paṭikkhipi.
tika-s0102t:508_1: Tatheva vinītāti maggavasena kilesānaṃ samucchedavinayanena vinītā.
tika-s0102t:508_2: Tathā visāradāti ariyamaggādhigameneva satthusāsane vesārajjappattiyā visāradā,
tika-s0102t:508_3: sārajjakarānaṃ diṭṭhivicikicchādipāpadhammānaṃ vigamena visāradabhāvaṃ pattāti attho.
tika-s0102t:508_4: Yassa sutassa vasena vaṭṭadukkhato nissaraṇaṃ sambhavati,
tika-s0102t:508_10: Tamevāti yaṃ taṃ tepiṭakaṃ sotabbabhāvena “suta”nti vuttaṃ, tameva.
tika-s0102t:508_12: Dhārentīti suvaṇṇabhājane pakkhittasīhavasaṃ viya avinassantaṃ katvā suppaguṇasuppavattibhāvena dhārenti hadaye ṭhapenti.
tika-s0102t:508_13: Iti pariyattidhammavasena bahussutadhammadharabhāvaṃ dassetvā idāni paṭivedhadhammavasenapi taṃ dassetuṃ “atha vā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:508_19: Anudhammanti tassā yathāvuttapaṭipadāya anurūpaṃ abhisallekhitaṃ appicchatādidhammaṃ.
tika-s0102t:508_24: Attano ācariyavādanti attano ācariyassa sammāsambuddhassa vādaṃ.
tika-s0102t:509_10: Uttāniṃ karissantīti anuttānaṃ gambhīraṃ uttānaṃ pākaṭaṃ karissanti.
tika-s0102t:509_12: saddo kāraṇapariyāyo “hetumhi ñāṇaṃ dhammapaṭisambhidā”tiādīsu viyāti āha “sahetukena sakāraṇena vacanenā”ti.
tika-s0102t:509_15: evaṃ hetudāharaṇehi yathādhigatamatthaṃ sampādetvā dhammaṃ kathessanti.
tika-s0102t:509_18: Ettha ca “paññāpessantī”tiādīhi chahi padehi cha atthapadāni dassitāni,
tika-s0102t:509_19: ādito pana dvīhi padehi cha byañjanapadāni.
tika-s0102t:509_20: Ettāvatā tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ saṃvaṇṇanānayena saṅgahetvā dassitaṃ hoti.
tika-s0102t:510_5: Sabbapāliphullaṃ viya abhiññāsampattivasena abhiññāsampadāhi sāsanābhivuddhiyā matthakappattito.
tika-s0102t:510_11: puthu vā puthuttaṃ bhūtaṃ pattanti puthubhūtaṃ.
tika-s0102t:510_14: Suṭṭhu pakāsitanti suṭṭhu sammadeva ādikalyāṇādibhāvena paveditaṃ.
tika-s0102t:512_1: Satiṃ sūpaṭṭhitaṃ katvāti ayaṃ kāyādivibhāgo attabhāvasaññito dukkhabhāro mayā ettakaṃ kālaṃ vahito,
tika-s0102t:512_3: etassa avahanatthaṃ cirataraṃ kālaṃ ariyamaggasambhāro sambhato,
tika-s0102t:512_5: yato ime kāyādayo asubhādito sammadeva pariññātā,
tika-s0102t:512_6: catubbidhampi sammāsatiṃ yathātathaṃ visaye suṭṭhu upaṭṭhitaṃ katvā.
tika-s0102t:512_7: Ñāṇena paricchinditvāti yasmā imassa attabhāvasaññitassa dukkhabhārassa vahane payojanabhūtaṃ attahitaṃ tāva mahābodhimūle eva parisamāpitaṃ,
tika-s0102t:512_11: evaṃ buddhañāṇena paricchinditvā sabbabhāgena nicchayaṃ katvā.
tika-s0102t:512_12: Āyusaṅkhāraṃ vissajjīti āyuno jīvitassa abhisaṅkhārakaṃ phalasamāpattidhammaṃ “na samāpajjissāmī”ti vissajji
tika-s0102t:512_16: Tattha ṭhānamahantatāya bhūmicālassa mahattaṃ dassetuṃ “tadā kira…pe…
tika-s0102t:512_18: Sā pana jātikkhettabhūtā dasasahassī lokadhātu eva,
tika-s0102t:512_21: Tadāpi tattikāya eva kampane kiṃ kāraṇaṃ?
tika-s0102t:512_24: Tathā hi purimabuddhānampi tāvatakameva jātikkhettaṃ ahosi.
tika-s0102t:512_29: Udakapariyantaṃ katvā chappakārapavedhanena avītarāge bhiṃsetīti bhiṃsano,
tika-s0102t:512_33: atha kho uppātabhāvena labbhamāno ākāsagato nigghosasaddo.
tika-s0102t:512_36: Tassa hi acchabhāvena ākāsassa vassābhāvena sukkhagajjitasaññite sadde niccharante devadundubhisamaññā.
tika-s0102t:513_0: Pītivegavissaṭṭhanti “evaṃ cirataraṃ kālaṃ vahito ayaṃ attabhāvasaññito dukkhabhāro,
tika-s0102t:513_1: idāni na cirasseva nikkhipissatī”ti sañjātasomanasso bhagavā sabhāveneva pītivegavissaṭṭhaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
tika-s0102t:513_2: Evaṃ pana udānentena ayampi attho sādhito hotīti dassanatthaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “kasmā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:514_3: Tathā hi taṃ parito khaṇḍitabhāvena “paritta”nti vuccati.
tika-s0102t:514_5: vipulaphalatāya ca na tulaṃ na paricchinnaṃ.
tika-s0102t:514_6: Yehi kāraṇehi pubbe avisesato mahaggataṃ “atula”nti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0102t:514_7: tāni kāraṇāni rūpāvacarato āruppassa sātisayāni vijjantīti “arūpāvacaraṃ atula”nti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0102t:514_9: appavipākaṃ tīsupi kammesu yaṃ tanuvipākaṃ hīnaṃ,
tika-s0102t:514_15: ukkaṭṭhanti dvidhā bhinditvā dvīsu bhāgesu pakkhipitabbaṃ.
tika-s0102t:514_16: Hīnattikavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttanayeneva appabahuvipākataṃ niddhāretvā tassa vasena tulātulabhāvo veditabbo.
tika-s0102t:514_21: Na ca taṃ kāmādibhavābhisaṅkhārakanti tato visesanatthaṃ “sambhava”nti vatvā “bhavasaṅkhāra”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:514_23: Kavacaṃ viya attabhāvaṃ pariyonandhitvā ṭhitaṃ attani sambhūtattā attasambhavaṃ kilesañca abhindīti kilesabhedasahabhāvikammossajjanaṃ
tika-s0102t:515_2: “Tulento tīrento”tiādinā saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ vitthārato dassetuṃ “pañcakkhandhā”ti ādiṃ vatvā bhavasaṅkhārassa avassajjanākāraṃ sarūpato dassesi.
tika-s0102t:515_3: “Eva”ntiādinā pana udānavaṇṇanāyaṃ ādito vuttamatthaṃ nigamanavasena dassesi.
tika-s0102t:517_1: Yanti karaṇe vā adhikaraṇe vā paccattavacananti adhippāyena āha “yena samayena,
tika-s0102t:517_5: bahala”nti idaṃ tassa vātassa ubbedhappamāṇameva gahetvā vuttaṃ,
tika-s0102t:517_8: Puna vātoti ukkhepakavāte tathākatvā vigate udakasandhārakavāto puna ābandhitvā gaṇhāti yathā taṃ udakaṃ na bhassati,
tika-s0102t:517_10: Tato udakaṃ uggacchatīti tato ābandhitvā gahaṇato tena vātena utthambhitaṃ udakaṃ uggacchati upari gacchati.
tika-s0102t:518_3: Tathā ca bhāvanā balavatī na hotīti āha “dubbalā”ti.
tika-s0102t:518_6: Sā hi thirā daḷhatarā hotīti āha “balavā”ti.
tika-s0102t:518_9: āposaññāya pana subhāvitāya pathavīkampo sukheneva ijjhatīti ayamettha adhippāyo veditabbo.
tika-s0102t:518_11: Vīmaṃsanto vā tāvadeva samadhigataṃ attano iddhibalaṃ.
tika-s0102t:518_12: Mahāmoggallānattherassa pāsādakampanaṃ pākaṭanti taṃ anāmasitvā saṅgharakkhitasāmaṇerassa pāsādakampanaṃ dassetuṃ “so kirāyasmā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:518_14: tena pūtigandheneva adhigatamātukucchisambhavaṃ viya gandheneva sīsena,
tika-s0102t:519_2: so ca upāye kosallassa attanā na sammā uggahitattā na tāva sikkhitoti āha “asikkhitvāva yuddhaṃ paviṭṭhosī”ti.
tika-s0102t:519_3: “Pilavanta”nti iminā sakalameva pāsādavatthuṃ udakaṃ katvā adhiṭṭhātabbapāsādova tattha pilavatīti dasseti.
tika-s0102t:519_7: taṃ pacantā kapāle paṭhamaṃ kiñci piṭṭhaṃ ṭhapetvā anukkamena vaḍḍhetvā antantena paricchindanti pūvaṃ samantato paricchinnaṃ katvā ṭhapenti,
tika-s0102t:519_8: evaṃ “āpokasiṇavasena ‘pāsādena patiṭṭhitaṭṭhānaṃ udakaṃ hotū’ti adhiṭṭhahanto samantato pāsādassa yāva pariyantā yathā udakaṃ hoti,
tika-s0102t:520_2: yadā bodhisatto tusitā kāyā cavitvā mātukucchiṃ okkamatī”ti vatvā “ayañca dasasahassī lokadhātu saṅkampati sampakampati sampavedhatī”ti,
tika-s0102t:520_5: yadā bodhisatto mātukucchimhā nikkhamatī”ti vatvā “ayañca dasasahassī lokadhātu saṅkampati sampakampati
tika-s0102t:520_7: abhijātiyañca dhammatāvasena mahāpadānepathavīkampassa vuttattā itaresupi catūsu ṭhānesu pathavīkampo
tika-s0102t:521_1: pavattiākārato ca vibhāgaṃ dassetuṃ “iti imesū”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:521_3: Iddhānubhāvenāti ñāṇiddhiyā vā kammavipākajiddhiyā vā pabhāvena,
tika-s0102t:521_8: Sādhukāradānavasenāti yathā anaññasādhāraṇena paṭivedhañāṇānubhāvena abhihatā mahāpathavī abhisambodhiyaṃ akampittha,
tika-s0102t:521_9: evaṃ anaññasādhāraṇena desanāñāṇānubhāvena abhihatā mahāpathavī akampittha,
tika-s0102t:521_10: taṃ panassā sādhukāradānaṃ viya hotīti “sādhukāradānavasenā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:522_2: paramukkaṃsagato asamo asamasamo appaṭipuggalo arahaṃ sammāsambuddho attano attabhāvasaññitaṃ khandhapañcakaṃ
tika-s0102t:522_3: kappaṃ vā kappāvasesaṃ vā ṭhapetuṃ samatthopi saṅkhatadhammaṃ paṭijigucchanākārappavattena ñāṇavisesena
tika-s0102t:522_6: taṃ panassā kāruññasabhāvasaṇṭhitā viya hotīti vuttaṃ “kāruññasabhāvenā”ti.
tika-s0102t:522_7: Yasmā bhagavā parinibbānasamaye catuvīsatikoṭisatasahassasaṅkhyā samāpattiyo samāpajji antarantarā phalasamāpattisamāpajjanena,
tika-s0102t:522_8: tassa pubbabhāge sātisayaṃ tikkhaṃ sūraṃ vipassanāñāṇañca pavattesi,
tika-s0102t:522_9: “yadatthañca mayā evaṃ sucirakālaṃ anaññasādhāraṇo paramukkaṃsagato ñāṇasambhāro sambhato,
tika-s0102t:522_11: tassa vata me sikhāppattaphalabhūtā accantaniṭṭhā anupādisesanibbānadhātu ajja samijjhatī”ti bhiyyo ativiya
tika-s0102t:522_12: somanassappattassa bhagavato pītivipphārādiguṇavipulatarānubhāvo parehi asādhāraṇañāṇātisayo udapādi,
tika-s0102t:522_13: yassa samāpattibalasamupabrūhitassa ñāṇātisayassa ānubhāvaṃ sandhāya idaṃ vuttaṃ “dveme piṇḍapātā samasamaphalā samasamavipākā”tiādi,
tika-s0102t:522_14: tasmā tassa ānubhāvena samabhihatā mahāpathavī akampittha.
tika-s0102t:522_15: Taṃ panassā tassaṃ velāyaṃ ārodanākārappatti viya hotīti “aṭṭhamo ārodanenā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:523_2: Pathavīdevatāya vasenāti ettha samuddadevatā viya mahāpathaviyā adhidevatā kira nāma atthi.
tika-s0102t:523_3: Tādise kāraṇe sati tassā cittavasena ayaṃ mahāpathavī saṅkampati sampakampati sampavedhati,
tika-s0102t:523_6: Tathā hi visākhapuṇṇamāyaṃ abhisambodhiatthaṃ bodhirukkhamūle nisinnassa lokanāthassa antarāyakaraṇatthaṃ upaṭṭhitaṃ mārabalaṃ vidhamituṃ –
tika-s0102t:526_0: Vacanasamanantaraṃ mahāpathavī bhijjitvā saparisaṃ māraṃ parivattesi.
tika-s0102t:526_3: dhammatāvasena pana vuttanayena siyāti sakkā vattuṃ.
tika-s0102t:526_5: so puññadhammassa vā ñāṇadhammassa vā ānubhāvasabhāvoti.
tika-s0102t:530_2: Ettāvatāti pathavīkampādiuppādajananena ceva pathavīkampassa bhagavato hetunidassanena ca.
tika-s0102t:530_3: “Addhā ajja bhagavatā āyusaṅkhāro ossaṭṭho”ti sallakkhesi pārisesañāyena.
tika-s0102t:530_4: Evañhi tadā thero tamatthaṃ vīmaṃseyya nāyaṃ bhūmikampo dhātuppakopahetuko tassa apaññāyamānarūpattā,
tika-s0102t:530_5: bāhirakopi isi evaṃ mahānubhāvo buddhakāle natthi,
tika-s0102t:530_6: sāsanikopi satthu anārocetvā evaṃ karonto nāma natthi,
tika-s0102t:530_8: evaṃ bhūmikampo cāyaṃ mahābhiṃsanako salomahaṃso ahosi,
tika-s0102t:530_9: tasmā pārisesato āha “ajja bhagavatā āyusaṅkhāro ossaṭṭhoti sallakkhesī”ti.
tika-s0102t:532_1: Okāsaṃ adatvāti “tiṭṭhatu bhante bhagavā kappa”ntiādi nayappavattāya therassa āyācanāya avasaraṃ adatvā.
tika-s0102t:532_2: Aññānipi aṭṭhakāni sampiṇḍento hetuaṭṭhakato aññāni parisābhibhāyatanavimokkhavasena tīṇi aṭṭhakāni saṅgahetvā dassento “aṭṭha kho imā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0102t:532_3: “Āyasmato ānandassa sokuppattiṃ pariharanto vikkhepaṃ karonto”ti keci sahasā bhaṇite balavasoko uppajjeyyāti.
tika-s0102t:533_7: Ādito tehi saddhiṃ satthu bhāsanaṃ ālāpo.
tika-s0102t:533_12: “Tesa”nti padaṃ ubhayapadāpekkhaṃ “tesampi lakkhaṇasaṇṭhānaṃ viya satthu sarīrasaṇṭhānaṃ,
tika-s0102t:533_17: Bhāsantaranti tesaṃ sattānaṃ bhāsato aññaṃ bhāsaṃ.
tika-s0102t:533_20: desetī”ti idaṃ nanu attānaṃ jānāpetvā dhamme kathite tesaṃ sātisayo pasādo hotīti iminā adhippāyena vuttaṃ?
tika-s0102t:533_21: Yesaṃ attānaṃ ajānāpetvāva dhamme kathite pasādo hoti,
tika-s0102t:533_25: Evaṃ sutopīti evaṃ aviññātadesako aviññātāgamanopi suto dhammo attano dhammasudhammatāyeva anāgate paccayo hoti suṇantassa.
tika-s0102t:534_1: Esa nayo ito paresupi evarūpesu ṭhānesu.
tika-s0102t:536_4: Abhibhavitabbaṃ vā ārammaṇasaṅkhātaṃ āyatanaṃ etassāti abhibhāyatanaṃ.
tika-s0102t:536_5: Ārammaṇābhibhavanato abhibhu ca taṃ āyatanañca yogino sukhavisesānaṃ adhiṭṭhānabhāvato,
tika-s0102t:536_10: Paṭipakkhabhāvena paccanīkadhamme abhibhavanti puggalassa ñāṇuttariyatāya ārammaṇāni abhibhavanti.
tika-s0102t:536_11: Ñāṇabaleneva hi ārammaṇābhibhavanaṃ viya paṭipakkhābhibhavo pīti.
tika-s0102t:537_2: Na hi paṭibhāganimittārammaṇā appanā ajjhattavisayā sambhavati,
tika-s0102t:537_3: taṃ pana ajjhattaparikammavasena laddhaṃ kasiṇanimittaṃ avisuddhameva hoti,
tika-s0102t:538_2: Parittavasenevāti vaṇṇavasena ābhoge vijjamānepi parittavaseneva idaṃ abhibhāyatanaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:538_4: Vaṇṇābhoge satipi asatipi abhibhāyatanabhāvanā nāma tikkhapaññasseva sambhavati,
tika-s0102t:538_7: samāpajjanañca upacārajjhānādhigamasamanantarameva appanājhānuppādananti āha “saha nimittuppādenevettha appanaṃ pāpetī”ti.
tika-s0102t:538_8: Saha nimittuppādenāti ca appanāparivāsābhāvassa lakkhaṇaṃ vacanametaṃ.
tika-s0102t:539_0: Ettha ca keci “uppanne upacārajjhāne taṃ ārabbha ye heṭṭhimantena dve tayo javanavārā pavattanti,
tika-s0102t:539_7: nāpi mahaggatappamāṇajjhānesu viya upacārajjhāne ekantato paccavekkhaṇā icchitabbā,
tika-s0102t:539_8: tasmā upacārajjhānādhigamanato paraṃ katipayabhavaṅgacittāvasāne appanaṃ pāpuṇanto “saha nimittuppādenevettha appanaṃ pāpetī”ti vutto.
tika-s0102t:539_12: na antosamāpattiyaṃ tadā tathārūpassa ābhogassa asambhavato.
tika-s0102t:539_13: Samāpattito vuṭṭhitassa ābhogo pubbabhāgabhāvanāyavasena jhānakkhaṇe pavattaṃ abhibhavanākāraṃ gahetvā pavattoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0102t:539_14: Abhidhammaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “iminā tassa pubbābhogo kathito”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:539_15: Antosamāpattiyaṃ tathā ābhogābhāve kasmā “jhānasaññāyapī”ti vuttanti āha “abhibhavana…pe… atthī”ti.
tika-s0102t:540_1: na ekaṅguladvaṅgulādivasena vaḍḍhiṃ pāpitānīti tathā vaḍḍhanassevettha asambhavato.
tika-s0102t:542_1: Abhidhamme pana “ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññī bahiddhā rūpāni passati parittāni suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇāni…pe…
tika-s0102t:542_2: appamāṇāni suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇānī”ti evaṃ catunnaṃ abhibhāyatanānaṃ āgatattā abhidhammaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “kasmā
tika-s0102t:542_3: pana ‘yathā suttante ajjhattaṃ rūpasaññī eko bahiddhā rūpāni passati parittānītiādi vuttaṃ,
tika-s0102t:542_4: evaṃ avatvā idha catūsupi abhibhāyatanesu ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññitāva vuttā’ti codanaṃ katvā ‘ajjhattarūpānaṃ anabhibhavanīyato’ti kāraṇaṃ vatvā,
tika-s0102t:542_5: tattha vā hi idha vā bahiddhā rūpāneva abhibhavitabbāni,
tika-s0102t:542_6: tasmā tāni niyamato vattabbānīti tatrāpi idhāpi vuttāni.
tika-s0102t:542_7: ‘Ajjhattaṃ rūpasaññī’ti idaṃ pana satthu desanāvilāsamattamevā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:542_9: sahitāni ca sabbāni parittāni “parittāni suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇānī”ti vuttāni,
tika-s0102t:542_11: Atthi hi so pariyāyo parittāni abhibhuyya tāni ce kadāci vaṇṇavasena ābhujitāni honti,
tika-s0102t:542_14: Abhidhamme pana nippariyāyadesanattā vaṇṇābhogarahitāni visuṃ vuttāni,
tika-s0102t:542_17: Tathā idha pariyāyadesanattā vimokkhānampi abhibhavanapariyāyo atthīti “ajjhattaṃ rūpasaññī”tiādinā paṭhamadutiyaabhibhāyatanesu paṭhamavimokkho,
tika-s0102t:542_20: Abhidhamme pana nippariyāyadesanattā vimokkhābhibhāyatanāni asaṅkarato dassetuṃ vimokkhe vajjetvā abhibhāyatanāni kathitāni;
tika-s0102t:542_21: sabbāni ca vimokkhakiccāni jhānāni vimokkhadesanāyaṃ vuttāni.
tika-s0102t:542_22: Tadetaṃ “ajjhattaṃ rūpasaññī”ti āgatassa abhibhāyatanadvayassa abhidhamme abhibhāyatanesu avacanato “rūpī
tika-s0102t:542_23: rūpāni passatī”tiādīnañca sabbavimokkhakiccasādhāraṇavacanabhāvato vavatthānaṃ katanti viññāyati.
tika-s0102t:542_24: “Ajjhattarūpānaṃ anabhibhavanīyato”ti idaṃ katthacipi “ajjhattaṃ rūpāni passatī”ti avatvā sabbattha yaṃ vuttaṃ “bahiddhā rūpāni passatī”ti,
tika-s0102t:542_28: Yaṃ pana desanāvilāsahetukaṃ ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññitāya eva abhidhamme vacanaṃ,
tika-s0102t:542_29: na tassa aññaṃ kāraṇaṃ maggitabbanti dasseti.
tika-s0102t:542_30: Ajjhattarūpānaṃ anabhibhavanīyatā ca tesaṃ bahiddhā rūpānaṃ viya abhūtattā.
tika-s0102t:542_31: Desanāvilāso ca yathāvuttavavatthānavasena veditabbo veneyyajjhāsayavasena vijjamānapariyāyakathābhāvato.
tika-s0102t:542_32: “Suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇānī”ti eteneva siddhattā na nīlādi abhibhāyatanāni vattabbānīti ce? Taṃ na,
tika-s0102t:542_37: Etesu ca parittādikasiṇarūpesu yaṃ yaṃ caritassa imāni abhibhāyatanāni ijjhanti,
tika-s0102t:544_0: Ekaccassa ito bāhirakassa appamāṇaṃ ativitthāritaṃ kasiṇanimittaṃ olokentassa bhayaṃ uppajjeyya “kiṃ
tika-s0102t:544_1: nu kho idaṃ sakalaṃ lokaṃ abhibhavitvā ajjhottharitvā gaṇhātī”ti,
tika-s0102t:544_2: tathāgatassa pana tādisaṃ bhayaṃ vā sārajjaṃ vā natthīti abhītabhāvadassanatthameva ānītāni.
tika-s0102t:546_3: tathāgatassa pana vimokkhe upasampajja viharatopi taṃ natthīti abhītabhāvadassanatthameva ānītāni.
tika-s0102t:548_3: Evaṃ vuttabhāvanti “ākaṅkhamāno ānanda tathāgato kappaṃ vā tiṭṭheyyā”ti evaṃ vuttabhāvaṃ.
tika-s0102t:549_0: 179. Tampi oḷārikanimittaṃ kataṃ tassa mārena pariyuṭṭhitacetaso na paṭividdhaṃ na sallakkhitaṃ.
tika-s0102t:550_6: Maraṇena vinābhāvoti cutiyā tenattabhāvena apunarāvattanato vippayogo.
tika-s0102t:550_7: Bhavena aññathābhāvoti bhavantaraggahaṇena purimākārato aññākāratā “kāmāvacarasatto rūpāvacaro hotī”tiādinā,
tika-s0102t:550_9: Kutettha labbhāti kuto kuhiṃ kismiṃ nāma ṭhāne ettha etasmiṃ khandhappavatte “yaṃ taṃ jātaṃ…pe…
tika-s0102t:550_11: Na sakkā eva tādisassa kāraṇassa abhāvatoti āha “netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjatī”ti.
tika-s0102t:550_14: “Paccāvamissatī”ti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati satiṃ sūpaṭṭhitaṃ katvā ñāṇena paricchinditvā āyusaṅkhārānaṃ ossaṭṭhattā,
tika-s0102t:550_16: Na hettha māsattayato paraṃ buddhaveneyyā labbhantīti.
tika-s0102t:551_1: Sāsanassa ciraṭṭhiti nāma sasambhārehi ariyamaggadhammehi kevalehīti āha “sabbaṃ lokiyalokuttaravaseneva
tika-s0102t:551_2: kathita”nti lokiyāhi sīlasamādhipaññāhi vinā lokuttaradhammasamadhigamassa asambhavato.
tika-s0102t:554_4: Aṅkusakalaggāni viyāti aṅkusakāni viya aññamaññasmiṃ laggāni āsattāni hutvā ṭhitāni.
tika-s0102t:554_8: atha kho sabbānipi tāni buddhānaṃ ṭhapetvā bāhusandhiādikā dvādasa mahāsandhiyo,
tika-s0102t:554_9: aṅgulisandhiyo ca itarasandhīsu ekābaddhāni hutvā ṭhitāni,
tika-s0102t:554_10: yato nesaṃ pakatihatthīnaṃ koṭisahassabalappamāṇaṃ kāyabalaṃ hoti.
tika-s0102t:554_12: Yadi evaṃ kathaṃ taṃ nāgāpalokitaṃ nāma jātaṃ?
tika-s0102t:555_0: “Idaṃ pacchimakaṃ ānanda tathāgatassa vesāliyā dassana”nti nayidaṃ vesāliyā apalokanassa kāraṇavacanaṃ anekantikattā,
tika-s0102t:555_2: Maggasodhanavasena taṃ dassetvā aññadevettha apalokanakāraṇaṃ dassetukāmo “nanu cā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0102t:555_3: Taṃ taṃ sabbaṃ pacchimadassanameva anukkamena kusināraṃ gantvā parinibbātukāmatāya tato tato nikkhantattā.
tika-s0102t:555_6: Idaṃ panettha aviparītaṃ kāraṇanti dassetuṃ “apicā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:555_7: Na hi bhagavā sāpekkho vesāliṃ apalokesi,
tika-s0102t:555_8: “idaṃ pana me gamanaṃ apunarāgamana”nti dassanamukhena bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāya apalokesi.
tika-s0102t:556_3: Savāsanānaṃ kilesānaṃ samucchinnattā sātisayaṃ kilesaparinibbānena parinibbuto.
tika-s0102t:558_7: “sammukhā metaṃ āvuso bhagavato suta”ntiādinā kenaci ābhatassa “dhammo”ti vinicchinane kāraṇaṃ.
tika-s0102t:558_14: evaṃ “tumhākaṃ mayā yaṃ dhammo paṭiggahito”ti apadisitabbānaṃ bhedena cattāro.
tika-s0102t:558_15: Tenāha “sammukhā me taṃ āvuso bhagavato suta”ntiādi.
tika-s0102t:558_16: Tathā ca vuttaṃ nettiyaṃ “cattāro mahāpadesā buddhāpadeso saṅghāpadeso sambahulattherāpadeso ekattherāpadeso.
tika-s0102t:558_17: Ime cattāro mahāpadesā”ti buddho apadeso etassāti buddhāpadeso.
tika-s0102t:559_2: Ganthassa sampaṭicchanaṃ nāma savananti āha “na sotabba”nti.
tika-s0102t:559_10: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃpana “‘padasaṅkhātāni byañjanānī’ti byañjanapadāneva vuttānī”ti keci, taṃ na,
tika-s0102t:559_17: Attho vuttoti pāḷiyā attho pavatto niddiṭṭho.
tika-s0102t:559_19: upari desanāya ca anusandhānaṃ kathitaṃ sambandho kathito.
tika-s0102t:559_20: Pubbāparaṃ kathitanti pubbenāparaṃ avirujjhanañceva visesādhānañca kathitaṃ pakāsitaṃ.
tika-s0102t:559_21: Evaṃ pāḷidhammādīni sammadeva sallakkhetvā gahaṇaṃ sādhukaṃ uggahaṇanti āha “suṭṭhu gahetvā”ti.
tika-s0102t:559_22: Sutte otāretabbānīti ñāṇena sutte ogāhetvā tāretabbāni,
tika-s0102t:559_23: taṃ pana ogāhetvā taraṇaṃ tattha otaraṇaṃ anuppavesanaṃ hotīti vuttaṃ “sutte otāretabbānī”ti.
tika-s0102t:560_1: ko vā vinayoti vicāraṇāya ācariyānaṃ matibhedamukhena tamatthaṃ dassetuṃ “ettha cā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:560_3: So hi mātikāsaññitassa suttassa atthasūcanato “sutta”nti vattabbataṃ arahati.
tika-s0102t:560_7: Evanti evaṃ suttavinayesu pariggayhamānesu vinayapiṭakampi na pariyādīyati parivārapāḷiyā asaṅgahitattā.
tika-s0102t:560_11: Na tāva pariyādīyantīti na tāva anavasesato pariggayhanti,
tika-s0102t:560_13: Yasmā “sutta”nti imaṃ nāmaṃ anāropetvā saṅgītampi jātakādibuddhavacanaṃ atthi,
tika-s0102t:560_14: tasmā vuttanayena tīṇi piṭakāni na pariyādiṇṇānīti.
tika-s0102t:560_15: Suttanipātaudānaitivuttakādīni dīghanikāyādayo viya suttanāmaṃ āropetvā asaṅgītānīti adhippāye panettha jātakādīhi saddhiṃ tānipi gahitāni.
tika-s0102t:560_18: Sabbopāyaṃ vaṇṇanānayo theravādaṃ dassanamukhena paṭikkhitto evāti.
tika-s0102t:561_2: Tathā hi nidānavaṇṇanāyaṃ amhehi vuttaṃ “suttanti sāmaññavidhi,
tika-s0102t:561_4: Taṃ sabbaṃ paṭikkhipitvā “suttanti vinayo”tiādinā vuttaṃ saṃvaṇṇanānayaṃ “nāyamattho idhādhippeto”ti paṭisodhetvā.
tika-s0102t:561_7: so eva ca naṃ karotīti kāraṇanti āha “vinayo pana kāraṇa”nti.
tika-s0102t:562_20: Evaṃ yo pariyattidhammo uggahaṇadhāraṇaparipucchāmanasikāravasena yoniso paṭipajjantassa sarāgādibhāvaparivajjanassa
tika-s0102t:562_26: satthu sammāsambuddhassa ovādānusiṭṭhibhāvato etaṃ satthusāsananti dhāreyyāsi jāneyyāsi,
tika-s0102t:562_28: Catusaccassa sūcanaṃ suttanti āha “sutteti tepiṭake buddhavacane”ti.
tika-s0102t:562_30: Rāgādivinayanakāraṇaṃ tathāgatena suttapadena pakāsitanti āha “vinayeti etasmiṃ rāgādivinayakāraṇe”ti.
tika-s0102t:563_0: Sutte osaraṇañcettha tepiṭake buddhavacane pariyāpannatāvaseneva veditabbaṃ,
tika-s0102t:563_2: Challiṃ uṭṭhapetvāti arogassa mahato rukkhassa tiṭṭhato upakkamena challiyā sakalikāya,
tika-s0102t:563_3: papaṭikāya vā uṭṭhapanaṃ viya arogassa sāsanadhammassa tiṭṭhato byañjanamattena tappariyāpannaṃ viya
tika-s0102t:563_5: tādisāni pana ekaṃsato guḷhavessantarādipariyāpannāni hontīti āha “guḷhavessantara…pe…paññāyantīti attho”ti.
tika-s0102t:563_7: Tadākāratāya na paññāyamānāni na dissamānāni chaḍḍetabbāni vajjitabbāni na gahetabbāni.
tika-s0102t:564_1: “Sutte cattāro mahāpadesā”tiādinā vuttampi avuttena saddhiṃ gahetvā pakiṇṇakakathāya mātikaṃ uddisati.
tika-s0102t:564_7: Ācariyā vadanti saṃvaṇṇenti pāḷiṃ etenāti ācariyavādo aṭṭhakathā.
tika-s0102t:564_8: Tassa tassa therassa attano eva mati adhippāyoti attanomati.
tika-s0102t:564_11: Pamīyati dhammo paricchijjati vinicchīyati etenāti pamāṇaṃ.
tika-s0102t:564_14: Puna itaranti akappiyaṃ anulomentaṃ kappiyaṃ paṭibāhantaṃ sandhāyāha.
tika-s0102t:565_3: Ṭhapanīyoti tidhāpi avissajjanīyattā ṭhapanīyo byākaraṇaṃ akatvā ṭhapetabbo.
tika-s0102t:565_4: “Cakkhuṃ anicca”nti pañhe uttarapadāvadhāraṇaṃ sandhāya “ekaṃseneva byākātabba”nti vuttaṃ niccatāya lesassāpi tattha abhāvato.
tika-s0102t:565_5: Purimapadāvadhāraṇe pana vibhajjabyākaraṇīyatā cakkhusotesu visesatthasāmaññatthānaṃ asādhāraṇabhāvato.
tika-s0102t:565_6: Dvinnaṃ tesaṃ sadisatācodanā paṭipucchanamukheneva byākaraṇīyā paṭikkhepavasena,
tika-s0102t:565_10: Taṃ jīvaṃ taṃ sarīranti jīvasarīrānaṃ anaññatāpañho.
tika-s0102t:565_12: so eva paramatthato nupalabbhatīti vañjhātanayassa matteyyatākittanasadisoti abyākātabbatāya ṭhapanīyo vuttoti.
tika-s0102t:565_13: Imāni cattāri pañhabyākaraṇāni pamāṇaṃ teneva nayena tesaṃ pañhānaṃ byākātabbato.
tika-s0102t:566_1: mahāpadesabhāvena pana taṃsadisatāya suttantamahāpadesesupi “anulomakappiya”nti ayaṃ aṭṭhakathāvohāro.
tika-s0102t:566_2: Yadipi tattha tattha bhagavatā pavattitapakiṇṇakadesanāva aṭṭhakathā,
tika-s0102t:566_3: sā pana dhammasaṅgāhakehi paṭhamaṃ tīṇi piṭakāni saṅgāyitvā tassa atthavaṇṇanānurūpeneva vācanāmaggaṃ
tika-s0102t:566_4: āropitattā “ācariyavādo”ti vuccati ācariyā vadanti saṃvaṇṇenti pāḷiṃ etenāti.
tika-s0102t:566_6: Tisso saṅgītiyo āruḷho eva ca buddhavacanassa atthasaṃvaṇṇanābhūto kathāmaggo mahindattherena tambapaṇṇidīpaṃ
tika-s0102t:566_7: ābhato pacchā tambapaṇṇiyehi mahātherehi sīhaḷabhāsāya ṭhapito nikāyantaraladdhisaṅkarapariharaṇatthaṃ.
tika-s0102t:566_11: Attano paṭibhānanti attano eva tassa atthassa vuttanayena upaṭṭhānaṃ,
tika-s0102t:566_15: Pamādapāṭhavasena ācariyavādassa kadāci pāḷiyā asaṃsandanāpi siyā,
tika-s0102t:566_16: so na gahetabboti dassento āha “ācariyavādopi suttena samentoyeva gahetabbo”ti.
tika-s0102t:566_21: “Āgatameva pamāṇa”nti iminā mahākassapādīhi saṅgītameva “sutta”nti idhādhippetanti tadaññassa suttabhāvameva paṭikkhipati.
tika-s0102t:566_25: na ca vinaye sandissantīti veditabbāni tassa asuttabhāvato tena “anulomakappiyaṃ suttena samentameva
tika-s0102t:566_27: Sabbattha “na itara”nti vacanaṃ tattha tattha gahitāvadhāraṇaphaladassanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0102t:568_4: bhikkhusaṅghassa ca āhāraṃ paṭiyādentā anavajjameva paṭiyādenti,
tika-s0102t:568_7: Tathā hi taṃ “mudu ceva siniddhañcā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:568_9: Ojaṃ pakkhipiṃsu “ayaṃ bhagavato pacchimako āhāro”ti puññavisesāpekkhāya,
tika-s0102t:569_1: taṃ ajānantā “kassaci adatvā vināsita”nti upavadeyyunti parūpavādamocanatthaṃ bhagavā “nāhaṃ ta”ntiādinā sīhanādaṃ nadati.
tika-s0102t:570_1: Kathaṃ panāyaṃ sīhanādo nanu taṃ bhagavatopi sammāpariṇāmaṃ na gatanti?
tika-s0102t:570_3: yasmā “sammadeva taṃ bhagavato pariṇāmaṃ gata”nti vattuṃ arahati tappaccayā uppannassa vikārassa abhāvato,
tika-s0102t:570_7: aññe vā pana khīṇāsavā navavedanuppādanavasena āhāraṃ paribhuñjanti aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgatameva katvā āhārassa upabhuñjanato.
tika-s0102t:570_8: Yadi evaṃ kasmā pāḷiyaṃ “bhattaṃ bhuttāvissa kharo ābādho uppajjī”tiādi vuttaṃ?
tika-s0102t:570_11: Katupacitassa laddhokāsassa kammassa vasena balavatipi roge uppanne garusiniddhabhojanappaccayā vedanāniggaho jāto,
tika-s0102t:570_14: icchā cassa tattha gantvā vinetabbaveneyyāpekkhā daṭṭhabbā.
tika-s0102t:570_17: na pana bhojanappaccayā ābādhaṃ phusi dhīroti dasseti.
tika-s0102t:572_1: Pasannabhāvena udakassa acchabhāvo veditabboti āha “acchodakāti pasannodakā”ti.
tika-s0102t:575_1: Vicarantiyo meghagabbhato niccharantiyo viya hontīti vuttaṃ “niccharantīsūti vicarantīsū”ti.
tika-s0102t:575_3: Navasu hi pakāresu ekavidhāpi asani tappariyāpannatāya “navavidhā” tveva vuccati.
tika-s0102t:575_4: Īdisī hi esā ruḷhi aṭṭhavimokkhapattipi samaññā viya.
tika-s0102t:575_9: Saṅkāraṃ tīrentī paricchijjantī viya dassetīti saterā.
tika-s0102t:575_15: Naṅgalassa kassanakāle kassakānaṃ hatthena gahetabbaṭṭhāne maṇikā hoti,
tika-s0102t:575_19: Deve vassantepi sajotibhūtatāya udakena atemetabbato mahāsani “sukkhāsanī”ti vuttā.
tika-s0102t:576_1: Tattha kira mahantaṃ palālapuñjaṃ abbhantarato palālaṃ nikkaḍḍhitvā sālāsadisaṃ pabbajitānaṃ vasanayoggaṭṭhānaṃ kataṃ,
tika-s0102t:576_6: So tvaṃ bhanteti ayameva vā pāṭho.
tika-s0102t:577_1: Siṅgī nāma kira uttamaṃ ativiya pabhassaraṃ buddhānaṃ chavivaṇṇobhāsaṃ devalokato āgatasuvaṇṇaṃ.
tika-s0102t:577_3: “Kiṃ pana thero taṃ gaṇhī”ti sayameva pucchaṃ samuṭṭhāpetvā tattha kāraṇaṃ dassento “kiñcāpī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0102t:577_7: satthu ajjhāsayānuvattananti iminā teneva yathāvuttena catubbidhena kāraṇena.
tika-s0102t:578_1: Thero ca tāvadeva taṃ siṅgīvaṇṇaṃ maṭṭhadussaṃ bhagavato upanāmesi “paṭiggaṇhatu me bhante bhagavā imaṃ maṭṭhadussaṃ,
tika-s0102t:578_7: Tāvadeva kira taṃ bhikkhū ovaṭṭikaraṇamattena tunnakammaṃ niṭṭhāpetvā therassa upanesuṃ,
tika-s0102t:578_11: Bhagavato hi sarīrappabhāhi abhibhuyyamānā tassa vatthayugassa pabhassaratā nāhosi.
tika-s0102t:579_0: “Pasannarūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpetī”ti etenetassa āhārassa bhuttappaccayā na so rogoti ayamattho dīpito.
tika-s0102t:579_1: Dvīsu kālesu evaṃ hoti dvinnaṃ nibbānadhātūnaṃ samadhigamasamayabhāvato.
tika-s0102t:579_2: Upavattane antarena yamakasālānanti ettha vattabbaṃ parato āgamissati.
tika-s0102t:580_1: Sabbaṃ suvaṇṇavaṇṇameva ahosi ativiya parisuddhāya pabhassarāya ekagghanāya bhagavato sarīrappabhāya nirantaraṃ abhibhūtattā.
tika-s0102t:581_0: Dhammeti pariyattidhamme. Pavattāti pāvacanabhāvena desetā. Puratova nisīdi ovādappaṭikaraṇabhāvato.
tika-s0102t:582_1: Dānānisaṃsasaṅkhātā lābhāti vaṇṇadānabaladānādibhedā dānassa ānisaṃsasaññitā diṭṭhadhammikā,
tika-s0102t:582_3: Te alābhāti te sabbe tuyhaṃ alābhā,
tika-s0102t:582_5: Diṭṭheva dhamme paccakkhabhūte imasmiṃyeva attabhāve bhavā diṭṭhadhammikā.
tika-s0102t:582_6: Samparetabbato pecca gantabbato “samparāyo”ti laddhanāme paraloke bhavā samparāyikā.
tika-s0102t:582_9: Sabbathā samameva hutvā samaṃ phalaṃ etesaṃ na ekadesenāti samasamaphalā.
tika-s0102t:583_1: satipi ekasantānabhāve puthujjanaarahantabhāvasiddhaṃ nanu tesaṃ khettaṃ visiṭṭhanti dassetuṃ “nanu cā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0102t:583_3: “Paribhuñjitvā parinibbuto”ti etena yathā paṇītapiṇḍapātaparibhogūpatthambhitarūpakāyasannissayo dhammakāyo sukheneva kilese pariccaji,
tika-s0102t:583_4: bhojanasappāyasaṃsiddhiyā evaṃ sukheneva khandhe pariccajīti evaṃ kilesapariccāgassa,
tika-s0102t:583_5: khandhapariccāgassa ca sukhasiddhinimittatāya ubhinnaṃ piṇḍapātānaṃ samaphalatā jotitā.
tika-s0102t:583_7: Yathā hi sujātāya “imaṃ āhāraṃ nissāya mayhaṃ devatāya vaṇṇasukhabalādiguṇā sammadeva sampajjeyyu”nti uḷāro ajjhāsayo tadā ahosi,
tika-s0102t:583_8: evaṃ cundassapi kammāraputtassa “imaṃ āhāraṃ nissāya bhagavato vaṇṇasukhabalādiguṇā sammadeva sampajjeyyu”nti
tika-s0102t:583_9: uḷāro ajjhāsayoti evampi nesaṃ ubhinnaṃ samaphalatā veditabbā.
tika-s0102t:583_10: Satipi catuvīsatikoṭisatasahassasamāpattīnaṃ devasikaṃ vaḷañjanasamāpattibhāve yathā pana abhisambujjhanadivase
tika-s0102t:583_11: abhinavavipassanaṃ paṭṭhapento rūpasattakādi vasena cuddasahākārehi sannetvā mahāvipassanāmukhena tā
tika-s0102t:583_13: evaṃ parinibbānadivasepi sabbā tā samāpajjīti evaṃ samāpattisamatāyapi tesaṃ samaphalatā.
tika-s0102t:583_14: Cundassa tāva anussaraṇaṃ uḷārataraṃ hotu bhagavato dinnabhāvena aññathattābhāvato,
tika-s0102t:585_5: tena yutto kusaloti āha “kusalo pana ñāṇasampanno”ti.
tika-s0102t:585_8: aggamaggo ca niravasesato kilese pajahatīti āha “ariyamaggena…pe…
tika-s0102t:585_10: Imaṃ pāpakaṃ jahitvāti dānena tāva lobhamacchariyādipāpakaṃ,
tika-s0102t:585_11: sīlena pāṇātipātādipāpakaṃ jahitvā tadaṅgavasena pahāya tato samathavipassanādhammehi vikkhambhanavasena,
tika-s0102t:585_12: tato maggapaṭipāṭiyā samucchedavasena anavasesaṃ pāpakaṃ pahāya.
tika-s0102t:585_13: Tathā pahīnattā eva rāgādīnaṃ khayā kilesanibbānena sabbaso kilesavūpasamena nibbuto parinibbutoti saupādisesāya
tika-s0102t:588_1: Evaṃ taṃ kusinārāyaṃ hotīti yathā anurādhapurassa thūpārāmo dakkhiṇapacchimadisāyaṃ,
tika-s0102t:588_2: evaṃ taṃ uyyānaṃ kusinārāya dakkhiṇapacchimadisāyaṃ hoti.
tika-s0102t:588_3: Tasmāti yasmā nagaraṃ pavisitukāmā uyyānato upecca vattanti gacchanti etenāti “upavattana”nti vuccati,
tika-s0102t:588_6: Tassa kira mañcakassāti tattha paññapiyamānassa tassa mañcakassa.
tika-s0102t:588_12: Yaṃ pana pāḷiyaṃ “uttarasīsakaṃ mañcakaṃ paññapehī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0102t:588_13: taṃ pacchimadassanaṃ daṭṭhuṃ āgatānaṃ devatānaṃ daṭṭhuṃ yogyatāvasena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:588_14: Keci pana “uttaradisāvilokanamukhaṃ pubbadisāsīsakaṃ katvā mañcakaṃ paññapehīti attho”ti vadanti,
tika-s0102t:589_0: Ete nāgānamuttamāti ete gottato gocariādināmakā hatthināgesu balena seṭṭhatamā.
tika-s0102t:589_1: Majjhimaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana keci hatthino ito aññathā āgatā,
tika-s0102t:589_2: so pana nesaṃ nāmamattakato bhedo daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0102t:590_2: “na pana paribhuttappaccayā”ti heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0102t:590_4: Katokāsassa kammassa vasena yathāsamuṭṭhito rogo ārogyaṃ abhimaddatīti katvā etamatthaṃ dassento “viyā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:590_7: tattakaṃ kālaṃ ṭhāne payojanābhāvato āyusaṅkhāre ossajjitvā tādisassa kammassa okāsaṃ adāsi,
tika-s0102t:591_0: Kusalaṃ kātabbaṃ maññissanti “evaṃ mahapphalaṃ, evaṃ mahānisaṃsaṃ, mahānubhāvañca taṃ kusala”nti.
tika-s0102t:592_0: Ekassāpi sattassa vaṭṭadukkhavūpasamo buddhānaṃ garutaro hutvā upaṭṭhāti atidullabhabhāvato,
tika-s0102t:593_0: Tatiyaṃ pana kāraṇaṃ sattānaṃ uppajjanakaanatthapariharaṇanti taṃ dassento puna “aparampi passatī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0102t:595_1: dakkhiṇapassena sayāno nāma natthi dakkhiṇahatthassa sarīraggahaṇādiyogakkhamato,
tika-s0102t:596_0: Ekena passena sayituṃ na sakkonti dukkhuppattito.
tika-s0102t:597_0: Ayaṃ sīhaseyyāti ayaṃ evaṃ vuttā sīhaseyyā.
tika-s0102t:597_2: Bhīrukā hi sesamigā attano āsayaṃ pavisitvā santāsapubbakaṃ yathā tathā sayanti,
tika-s0102t:597_3: sīho pana abhīrubhāvato satokārī bhikkhu viya satiṃ upaṭṭhāpetvāva sayati.
tika-s0102t:597_5: Dakkhiṇe purimapāde vāmassa purimapādassa ṭhapanavasena dve purimapāde ekasmiṃ ṭhāne ṭhapetvā.
tika-s0102t:597_7: Vuttanayeneva idhāpi ekasmiṃ ṭhāne pādaṭṭhapanaṃ veditabbaṃ,
tika-s0102t:597_9: “Sīsaṃ pana ukkhipitvā”tiādinā vuttā sīhakiriyā anutrāsapabujjhanaṃ viya abhīrubhāvasiddhā dhammatāvasenevāti veditabbā.
tika-s0102t:597_10: Sīhavijambhitavijambhanaṃ ativelaṃ ekākārena ṭhapitānaṃ sarīrāvayavānaṃ gamanādikiriyāsu yogyabhāvāpādanatthaṃ.
tika-s0102t:598_4: tato hi vuṭṭhahitvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā bhagavā anukkamena aggamaggaṃ adhigantvā tathāgato jātoti.
tika-s0102t:598_6: tathāpi yasmā ‘catutthajjhānā vuṭṭhahitvā samanantarā bhagavā parinibbāyī’ti vakkhati,
tika-s0102t:598_11: Tattha yathā sattānaṃ niddupagamanalakkhaṇā seyyā bhavaṅgacittavasena hoti,
tika-s0102t:598_13: evaṃ bhagavato ariyajātisamanvayaṃ yebhuyyavuttikaṃ aggaphalabhūtaṃ catutthajjhānaṃ “tathāgataseyyā”ti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0102t:599_2: “Ito uṭṭhahissāmī”ti manasikārassa abhāvato “uṭṭhānasaññaṃ manasi karitvā”ti na vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:599_6: cittavasena ca anuṭṭhānaṃ nāma niddupagamananti tadabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “niddāvasenā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:602_0: Devatānaṃ upakappanacandanacuṇṇānīti saṭṭhipi paññāsampi yojanāni vāyanakasetavaṇṇacandanacuṇṇāni.
tika-s0102t:603_0: Ekacakkavāḷe sannipatitvā antalikkhe vajjanti mahābhinikkhamanakāle viya.
tika-s0102t:604_3: Hatthena hatthanti attano hatthena parassa hatthaṃ.
tika-s0102t:604_4: Gīvāya gīvanti kaṇṭhagāhavasena attano gīvāya parassa gīvaṃ.
tika-s0102t:605_0: 199. Mahantaṃ ussāhanti tathāgatassa pūjāsakkāravasena pavattiyamānaṃ mahantaṃ ussāhaṃ disvā.
tika-s0102t:607_7: upāsakopāsikāvāresu “gandhapūjaṃ mālāpūjaṃ karotī”ti vacanaṃ cārittasīlapakkhe ṭhapetvā karaṇaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-s0102t:612_0: Idāni āgamanato paṭṭhāya tamatthaṃ vitthārato dassetuṃ “vipassimhi kira sammāsambuddhe”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-s0102t:612_1: “Cātumahārājikā devatā”ti idaṃ gobalībaddañāyena gahetabbaṃ bhummadevatādīnampi tappariyāpannattā.
tika-s0102t:615_5: tato katipayaratanaṭṭhānaṃ vaṭṭanavaseneva gantvā puna yathāpatitameva ṭhānaṃ vaṭṭanavasena āgacchanti.
tika-s0102t:615_12: Devatā dhāretuṃ na sakkoti udakaṃ viya osīdanato.
tika-s0102t:615_16: Pathaviyaṃ pathaviṃ māpesunti pakatipathaviyaṃ attano sarīraṃ dhāretuṃ samatthaṃ iddhānubhāvena pathaviṃ māpesuṃ.
tika-s0102t:616_0: Kāmaṃ domanasse asatipi ekacco rāgo hotiyeva,
tika-s0102t:616_1: rāge pana asati domanassassa asambhavo evāti tadekaṭṭhabhāvatoti āha “vītarāgāti pahīnadomanassā”ti.
tika-s0102t:620_2: Sā cassa saddhāsampadā evaṃ veditabbāti phalena hetuṃ dassento “vattasampannassā”ti āha.
tika-s0102t:623_15: Pabbajitehi kattabbakammanti āmisapaṭiggahaṇādi pabbajitehi kātabbaṃ kammaṃ.
tika-s0102t:624_0: 204. Atantibaddhāti abhāravahā. Pesitacittāti nibbānaṃ pati pesitacittā.
tika-s0102t:627_1: Theraṃ adisvā āmantesīti tattha adisvā āvajjanto therassa ṭhitaṭṭhānaṃ,
tika-s0102t:628_0: Kāyakammassa hitabhāvo hitajjhāsayena pavattitattāti āha “hitavuddhiyā katenā”ti.
tika-s0102t:628_3: Āvirahovibhāgato advayabhāvato advayenāti imamatthaṃ dassetuṃ “yathā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:628_5: therassa ajjhāsayasampattiyā ca “ettakamida”nti pamāṇaṃ gahetuṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya pamāṇavirahitattā tassa kammassāti āha “cakkavāḷampī”tiādi.
tika-s0102t:629_0: Evaṃ pavattitenāti evaṃ odissakamettābhāvanāya vasena pavattitena.
tika-s0102t:629_1: Vivaṭṭūpanissayabhūtaṃ kataṃ upacitaṃ puññaṃ etenāti katapuñño,
tika-s0102t:630_1: Katthaci saṅkucitaṃ hutvā ṭhitaṃ mahāpathaviṃ pattharanto viya,
tika-s0102t:630_2: paṭisaṃhaṭaṃ hutvā ṭhitaṃ ākāsaṃ vitthārento viya,
tika-s0102t:630_5: satayojanāyāmavitthāraṃ mahājambuṃ khandhe gahetvā cālento viyāti pañca hi upamā hi therassa guṇakathā
tika-s0102t:630_9: “sadevakasmiṃ lokasmiṃ natthi me paṭipuggalo”ti ca evaṃ ādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0102t:631_2: upagatānaṃ pana bhikkhūnaṃ bhikkhunīnañca pucchāvissajjanavasena ceva cittarucivasena ca yathākālaṃ dhammaṃ desetiyeva,
tika-s0102t:633_2: saddo appatthoti āha “khuddakanagaraketi nagarapatirūpake sambādhe khuddakanagarake”ti.
tika-s0102t:633_5: Ettha ca “khuddakanagarake”ti iminā tassa nagarassa appakabhāvo vutto,
tika-s0102t:634_2: Dve pavisantīti dve kahāpaṇasakaṭāni dve āyavasena pavisanti.
tika-s0102t:635_3: Saddaṃ karonteti ravasārinā tuṭṭhabhāvena koñcanādaṃ karonte.
tika-s0102t:635_8: itaro taṃ anubandhati evaṃ aññamaññaṃ anubandhamānā.
tika-s0102t:635_10: Tassa mahantabhāvato ceva iddhādibhāvato ca niccaṃ payojitāneva bheriādīni tūriyāni,
tika-s0102t:635_11: samma sammāti vā aññamaññaṃ piyālāpasaddo samma- saddo.
tika-s0102t:636_3: Idha na evaṃ ahosi devaloke viya sabbaso paripuṇṇasampattikatāya.
tika-s0102t:637_1: upāsakānañca vasena purato purato mahatī ugghosanā hoti.
tika-s0102t:637_2: Tattha bhagavantaṃ uddissa katassa vihārassa abhāvato,
tika-s0102t:637_3: bhikkhusaṅghassa ca mahantabhāvato te āgantvā…pe… pesesi.
tika-s0102t:637_4: Pesento ca “kathañhi nāma bhagavā pacchime kāle attano pavattiṃ amhākaṃ nārocesi,
tika-s0102t:637_5: nesaṃ domanassaṃ mā ahosī”ti “ajja kho vāseṭṭhā”tiādinā sāsanaṃ pesesi.
tika-s0102t:639_4: Taṃ taṃkulīnabhāgena ṭhito sattanikāyo “kulaparivattaso”ti vuttanti āha “kulaparivatta”nti.
tika-s0102t:639_5: Te pana taṃtaṃkulaparivattaparicchinnā mallarājāno tasmiṃ nagare vīthiādisabhāgena vasantīti vuttaṃ “vīthisabhāgena ceva racchāsabhāgena cā”ti.
tika-s0102t:641_3: Bījato ca aggaṃ gahetvā āhāraṃ sampādetvā dānaṃ bījaggaṃ.
tika-s0102t:641_7: Lāyanagganti pakkassa sassassa lavane lavanārambhe dānaṃ adāsi.
tika-s0102t:641_8: Lunassa sassassa veṇivasena bandhitvā ṭhapanaṃ veṇikaraṇaṃ.
tika-s0102t:641_10: Veṇiyo pana ekato katvā rāsikaraṇaṃ kalāpo.
tika-s0102t:641_13: Madditaṃ ophuṇitvā dhaññassa rāsikaraṇe aggadānaṃ khalabhaṇḍaggaṃ.
tika-s0102t:641_14: Dhaññassa khalato koṭṭhe pakkhipane aggadānaṃ koṭṭhaggaṃ.
tika-s0102t:642_0: “Nava aggadānāni adāsī”ti iminā “kathaṃ nu kho ahaṃ satthu santike aggatova mucceyya”nti aggaggadānavasena
tika-s0102t:642_2: ñāṇassa ca tathā paripākaṃ gatattā aggadhammadesanāya tassa bhājanabhāvaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0102t:643_2: Abbhaññiṃsūti sandehajātassa pucchāvacananti katvā jāniṃsūti atthamāha.
tika-s0102t:643_5: Sā paṭiññāti “karoto kho mahārāja kārayato”tiādinā paṭiññātā,
tika-s0102t:643_8: tesaṃ vā siddhantasaṅkhātā paṭiññā vaṭṭato nissaraṇaṭṭhena niyyānikāti.
tika-s0102t:643_13: Okāsābhāvatoti tathā vitthāritaṃ katvā dhammaṃ desetuṃ avasarābhāvato.
tika-s0102t:644_2: te pana ukkaṭṭhaniddesena ariyamaggadhammāti catumaggasaṃsiddhiyā pāḷiyaṃ cattāro samaṇā vuttāti te bāhirasamaye
tika-s0102t:644_7: anvayato ca adhippeto attho vibhāvīyatīti paṭhamanayopettha “purimadesanāyā”ti padena saṅgahito vāti daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0102t:644_8: Attano sāsanaṃ niyamento āha “imasmiṃ kho”ti yojanā.
tika-s0102t:644_12: Apare pana “bāhirakasamaye vipassanārambhassa ganthopi natthevāti avisesavacanameta”nti vadanti.
tika-s0102t:644_18: tattha vā siddhito ṭhitapubbo bhūtapubbagatiyāti sotāpattimaggaṭṭho sotāpanno,
tika-s0102t:644_20: Sotāpanno hi attanā adhigataṭṭhānaṃ sotāpattimaggaṃ aññassa kathetvā sotāpattimaggaṭṭhaṃ kareyya,
tika-s0102t:644_22: Esa nayo sesamaggaṭṭhesūti etthāpi imināva nayena attho veditabbo.
tika-s0102t:645_1: Tañhi sabbañeyyadhammāvabodhane “kusalaṃ chekaṃ nipuṇa”nti vuccati tattha asaṅgaappaṭihataṃ pavattatīti katvā.
tika-s0102t:645_3: Ñāyanti etena catusaccadhammaṃ yāthāvato paṭivijjhantīti ñāyo,
tika-s0102t:645_5: Padissati etena ariyamaggo paccakkhato dissatīti padeso,
tika-s0102t:646_3: Attano ṭhāne ṭhapito hoti parapabbājanādīsu niyuttattā.
tika-s0102t:650_4: tasseva pakārato ñāpanaṃ veneyyasantāne ṭhapanaṃ paññāpananti “dhammopi desito ceva paññatto cā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:650_5: Tathā vinayatantisaṅgahitassa kāyavācānaṃ vinayanato “vinayo”ti laddhādhivacanassa atthassa atisajjanaṃ sambodhanaṃ desanā,
tika-s0102t:650_6: tasseva pakārato ñāpanaṃ asaṅkarato ṭhapanaṃ paññāpananti “vinayopi desito ceva paññatto cā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:650_7: Adhisīlasikkhāniddesabhāvena sāsanassa mūlabhūtattā vinayo paṭhamaṃ sikkhitabboti taṃ tāva ayamuddesaṃ sarūpato dassento “mayā hi vo”tiādimāha.
tika-s0102t:650_10: idaṃ vo na kattabba”nti kattabbākattabbassa vibhāgena anusāsanato.
tika-s0102t:651_0: Tena tenākārenāti tena tena veneyyānaṃ ajjhāsayānurūpena pakārena.
tika-s0102t:651_10: taṃ pana paccayānulomādivasena vibhajiyamānaṃ aparimāṇanayaṃ evāti āha “anantanayamahāpaṭṭhānapaṭimaṇḍita”nti.
tika-s0102t:651_11: Satthukiccaṃ sādhessatīti khandhādivibhāgena ñāyamānaṃ catusaccasambodhāvahattā satthārā sammāsambuddhena kātabbakiccaṃ nipphādessati.
tika-s0102t:653_3: Gāravavacanaṃ hetaṃ yadidaṃ bhanteti vā āyasmāti vā,
tika-s0102t:654_0: “Ākaṅkhamāno samūhanatū”ti vutte “na ākaṅkhamāno na samūhanatū”tipi vuttameva hotīti āha “vikappavacaneneva ṭhapesī”ti.
tika-s0102t:654_6: Santi hi keci khuddānukhuddakāni sikkhāpadāni samādāya saṃvattituṃ anicchantā,
tika-s0102t:654_7: tesaṃ tathā avuccamāne bhagavati vighāto uppajjeyya,
tika-s0102t:654_8: taṃ tesaṃ bhavissati dīgharattaṃ ahitāya dukkhāya,
tika-s0102t:654_9: tathā pana vutte tesaṃ vighāto na uppajjeyya “amhākaṃ evāyaṃ doso,
tika-s0102t:654_10: yato amhesu eva keci samūhananaṃ na icchantī”ti.
tika-s0102t:654_11: Keci “sakalassa pana sāsanassa saṅghāyattabhāvakaraṇatthaṃ tathā vutta”nti vadanti.
tika-s0102t:654_13: taṃ samaṇā sakyaputtiyā sirasā sampaṭicchitvā jīvitaṃ viya rakkhanti.
tika-s0102t:654_14: Tathā hi te “khuddānukhuddakāni sikkhāpadāni ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho samūhanatū”ti vuttepi na samūhaniṃsu,
tika-s0102t:654_15: aññadatthu “purato viya tassa accayepi rakkhiṃsu evā”ti satthusāsanassa,
tika-s0102t:654_16: saṅghassa ca mahantabhāvadassanatthampi tathā vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0102t:654_18: aññepi vā bhikkhū “katamaṃ pana bhante khuddakaṃ,
tika-s0102t:654_19: katamaṃ anukhuddaka”nti na pucchiṃsu samūhanajjhāsayasseva abhāvato.
tika-s0102t:655_0: Na taṃ evaṃ gahetabbanti “nāgasenatthero khuddānukhuddakaṃ jānātī”tiādinā vuttaṃ taṃ nesaṃ vacanaṃ iminā
tika-s0102t:655_2: Idāni taṃ adhippāyaṃ vibhāvetuṃ “nāgasenatthero hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:655_3: Yasmā nāgasenatthero (milindapañhe abhejjavagge vitthāro) paresaṃ vādapathopacchedanatthaṃ saṅgītikāle
tika-s0102t:655_4: dhammasaṅgāhakamahātherehi gahitakoṭṭhāsesu ca antimakoṭṭhāsameva gahetvā milindarājānaṃ paññāpesi.
tika-s0102t:655_5: Mahākassapatthero pana ekasikkhāpadampi asamūhanitukāmatāya tathā kammavācaṃ sāveti,
tika-s0102t:655_6: tasmā taṃ tesaṃ vacanaṃ tathā na gahetabbaṃ.
tika-s0102t:656_5: Taṃ vo vadāmīti taṃ saṃsayavantaṃ bhikkhuṃ sandhāya vo tumhe vadāmi.
tika-s0102t:657_0: Nikkaṅkhabhāvapaccakkhakaraṇañāṇaṃ yevāti buddhādīsu tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ nikkaṅkhabhāvassa paccakkhakāriyābhāvato
tika-s0102t:660_2: citte ca paramukkaṃsagatavasībhāvatāya “ettake kāle ettakā samāpattiyo samāpajjitvā parinibbāyissāmī”ti
tika-s0102t:661_0: Ayampi cāti yathāvuttapañcasaṭṭhiyā jhānānaṃ samāpannabhāvakathāpi saṅkhepakathā eva, kasmā?
tika-s0102t:661_1: Yasmā bhagavā tadāpi devasikaṃ vaḷañjanasamāpattiyo sabbāpi aparihāpetvā samāpajji evāti dassento “nibbānapuraṃ pavisanto”tiādimāha.
tika-s0102t:662_0: Imāni dvepi samanantarāneva paccavekkhaṇāyapi yebhuyyenānantariyakatāya jhānapakkhikabhāvato,
tika-s0102t:662_4: atha kho sabbepi sattā bhavaṅgacitteneva cavantīti dassetuṃ “ye hi kecī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:664_0: 221. Saṅkhārā vūpasamanti etthāti vūpasamoti evaṃsaṅkhātaṃ ñātaṃ kathitaṃ nibbānaṃ.
tika-s0102t:665_0: 222. Yanti paccatte upayogavacananti āha “yo kālaṃ akarī”ti.
tika-s0102t:666_1: Vedanaṃ adhivāsesi abhāvasamudayo kato suṭṭhu pariññātattā.
tika-s0102t:667_1: Ākaronti attano phalāni samānākāre karontīti ākārā, kāraṇāni.
tika-s0102t:667_2: Sabbākāravarūpeteti sabbehi ākāravarehi uttamakāraṇehi sīlādiguṇehi samannāgateti attho.
tika-s0102t:671_1: Kaṃsatāḷādi tāḷaṃ avacarati etthāti “tāḷāvacara”nti vuccati ātatāditūriyabhaṇḍaṃ.
tika-s0102t:672_0: Dakkhiṇadisābhāgenevāti aññena disābhāgena anāharitvā yamakasālānaṃ ṭhānato dakkhiṇadisābhāgeneva,
tika-s0102t:673_0: Jetavanasadiseti sāvatthiyā jetavanasadise ṭhāne, “jetavanasadise ṭhāne”tipi pāṭho.
tika-s0102t:677_2: Āvajjanapaṭibaddhattā jānanassa anāvajjitattā satthu parinibbānaṃ ajānanto “dasabalaṃ passissāmī”ti thero cintesi,
tika-s0102t:677_3: satthu sarīre vā satthusaññaṃ uppādento tathā cintesi.
tika-s0102t:677_7: pucchane pana kāraṇaṃ sayameva pakāsetuṃ “kiṃ panā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-s0102t:678_0: Ajja sattāhaparinibbutoti ajja divasato paṭilomato sattame ahani parinibbuto.
tika-s0102t:679_0: 232. Nāḷiyā vāpakenāti nāḷiyā ceva thavikāya ca.
tika-s0102t:683_0: Pañhavārāti pañhā viya vissajjanāni “yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hotī”tiādinā,
tika-s0102t:683_1: “yasmiṃ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāvetī”tiādinā ca pavattāni ekaṃ dve bhūmantarāni.
tika-s0102t:683_2: Mūle naṭṭhe pisācasadisā bhavissāmāti yathā rukkhe adhivattho pisāco tassa sākhāparivāre naṭṭhe khandhaṃ nissāya vasati,
tika-s0102t:683_6: Atha vā mūle naṭṭheti pisācena kira rukkhagacchādīnaṃ kañcideva mūlaṃ chinditvā attano puttassa dinnaṃ,
tika-s0102t:683_7: yāva taṃ tassa hatthato na vigacchati,
tika-s0102t:683_8: tāva so taṃ padesaṃ adissamānarūpo vicarati.
tika-s0102t:683_9: Yadā pana tasmiṃ kenaci acchinnabhāvena vā sativippavāsavasena vā naṭṭhe manussānampi dissamānarūpo vicarati,
tika-s0102t:684_0: Maṃ kāyasakkhiṃ katvāti taṃ paṭipadaṃ kāyena sacchikatavantaṃ tasmā tassā desanāya sakkhibhūtaṃ maṃ katvā.
tika-s0102t:686_0: Taṃ sutvāti taṃ āyasmatā anuruddhattherena vuttaṃ devatānaṃ adhippāyaṃ sutvā.
tika-s0102t:687_1: Dasikatantaṃ vāti paliveṭhitaahatakāsikavatthānaṃ dasaṭhānena tantumattampi vā.
tika-s0102t:688_1: Samudāyesu pavattavohārānaṃ avayavesu dissanato sarīrassa avayavabhūtāni aṭṭhīni “sarīrānī”ti vuttāni.
tika-s0102t:689_1: “Sesā vippakiriṃsū”ti vatvā yathā pana tā vippakiṇṇā ahesuṃ,
tika-s0102t:690_1: Evaṃ mahatiyo bahū udakadhārā kimatthāyāti āha “bhagavato citako mahanto”ti.
tika-s0102t:690_3: Aṭṭhadantakehīti naṅgalehi aṭṭheva hi nesaṃ dantasadisāni potthāni honti,
tika-s0102t:691_3: Parinibbutassa hi buddhassa bhagavato evarūpo ānubhāvoti taṃ pavattiṃ kathentānaṃ dhammakathikānaṃ attano
tika-s0102t:691_4: ñāṇabalānurūpaṃ pavattiyamānā dhammakathā evettha pamāṇaṃ vaṇṇetabbassa atthassa mahāvisayattā,
tika-s0102t:691_6: Catujjātiyagandhaparibhaṇḍaṃ kāretvāti tagarakuṅkumayavanapupphatamālapattāni pisitvā katagandhena paribhaṇḍaṃ kāretvā.
tika-s0102t:691_8: gandhavatthūni gahetvā ganthitamālā gandhadāmāni ratanāvaḷiyo ratanadāmāni.
tika-s0102t:692_0: Sattihatthā purisā sattiyo taṃsahacaraṇato yathā “kuntā pacarantī”ti,
tika-s0102t:692_1: tehi samantato rakkhāpanaṃ pañcakaraṇanti āha “sattihatthehi purisehi parikkhipāpetvā”ti.
tika-s0102t:692_3: Sannāhagavacchikaṃ viya katvā nirantarāvaṭṭhitaārakkhasannāhena gavacchijālaṃ viya katvā.
tika-s0102t:695_1: Imināva niyāmenāti yena nīhārena mahātale nisinno kañci parihāraṃ akatvā kevalaṃ iminā niyāmeneva.
tika-s0102t:695_3: Dukūladupaṭṭaṃ nivāsetvāti dve dukūlavatthāni ekajjhaṃ katvā nivāsetvā.
tika-s0102t:696_1: Visaññī jāto yathā taṃ bhagavato guṇavisesāmatarasaññutāya avaṭṭhitapemo pothujjanikasaddhāya patiṭṭhitapasādo katūpakāratāya sañjanitacittamaddavo.
tika-s0102t:698_0: Kasmā panettha pāveyyakā pāḷiyaṃ sabbapacchato gahitā,
tika-s0102t:698_1: kiṃ te kusinārāya āsannatarāpi sabbapacchato uṭṭhitā? Āma,
tika-s0102t:699_1: Nesaṃ pakkhā ahesuṃ “ñāyena tesaṃ santakā dhātuyo”ti.
tika-s0102t:700_2: Etadatthameva hi bhagavā maggaṃ gacchanto “pacchato āgacchanto doṇo brāhmaṇo yāva me padavaḷañjaṃ passati,
tika-s0102t:700_3: tāva mā vigacchatū”ti adhiṭṭhāya aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūle nisīdi.
tika-s0102t:700_4: Doṇopi kho brāhmaṇo “imāni sadevake loke aggapuggalassa padānī”ti sallakkhento padānusārena satthu santikaṃ upagacchi,
tika-s0102t:701_0: Kāyena ekasannipātā vācāya ekavacanā abhinnavacanā evaṃ samaggā hotha.
tika-s0102t:702_1: Tato tato samāgatasaṅghānanti tato tato attano vasanaṭṭhānato samāgantvā sannipatitabhāvena samāgatasaṅghānaṃ.
tika-s0102t:705_0: Sattamadivaseti sattavassasattamāsato parato sattame divase. Balānurūpenāti vibhavabalānurūpena.
tika-s0102t:706_1: Dhātūnaṃ antarāyaṃ disvāti tattha tattha cetiye yathāpatiṭṭhāpitabhāveneva ṭhitānaṃ dhātūnaṃ micchādiṭṭhikānaṃ vasena antarāyaṃ disvā,
tika-s0102t:706_2: mahādhātunidhānena sammadeva rakkhitānaṃ anāgate asokena dhammaraññā tato uddharitvā vitthāritabhāve
tika-s0102t:706_3: kate sadevakassa lokassa hitasukhāvahabhāvañca disvāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0102t:706_7: Tathā hi pacchā asokamahārājā cetiyesu dhātūnaṃ na labhati.
tika-s0102t:707_0: Purimaṃ purimaṃ katassa gaṇhanayogyaṃ pacchimaṃ pacchimaṃ kārento aṭṭha aṭṭha haricandanādimaye karaṇḍe ca thūpe ca kāresi.
tika-s0102t:709_0: Mālā mā milāyantūti “yāva asoko dhammarājā bahi cetiyāni kāretuṃ ito dhātuyo uddharissati,
tika-s0102t:710_0: Vāḷasaṅghātayantanti kukkulaṃ paṭibhayadassanaṃ aññamaññapaṭibaddhagamanāditāya saṅghāṭitarūpakayantaṃ yojesi.
tika-s0102t:710_2: Āṇiyā bandhitvāti anekakaṭṭharūpavicittayantaṃ attano devānubhāvena ekāya eva āṇiyā bandhitvā vissakammo devalokameva gato.
tika-s0102t:711_0: “Asukaṭṭhāne nāma dhātunidhāna”nti raññā pucchite “tasmiṃ sannipāte visesalābhino nāhesu”nti keci.
tika-s0102t:711_1: “Attānaṃ nigūhitvā tassa vuḍḍhatarassa vacanaṃ nissāya vīmaṃsanto jānissatīti na kathesu”nti apare.
tika-s0102t:712_0: Imaṃ padanti “evametaṃ bhūtapubba”nti dutiyasaṅgītikārehi ṭhapitaṃ imaṃ padaṃ.
tika-s0102t:712_1: Mahādhātunidhānampi tassa atthaṃ katvā tatiyasaṅgītikārāpi ṭhapayiṃsu.
tika-s0102t:716_14: Hatthaṃ vā pādaṃ vā cāletvāti hatthalayapādalaye sajjetvā.
tika-s0102t:718_1: Uposathaṃ vuccati aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgataṃ sabbadivasesu gahaṭṭhehi rakkhitabbasīlaṃ,
tika-s0102t:718_11: Tādise hi kāle cakkavattibhāvī purisaviseso yathāvuttaguṇasamannāgato rājā khattiyo muddhāvasitto visuddhasīlo
tika-s0102t:718_13: na yadā cakkaratanaṃ uppajjati, tadā eva.
tika-s0102t:718_14: Ime ca visesā sabbacakkavattīnaṃ sādhāraṇavasena vuttā.
tika-s0102t:718_17: Bodhisattānaṃ pana cakkavattibhāvāvahaguṇāpi cakkavattiguṇāpi sātisayāva honti.
tika-s0102t:719_7: rañño icchitatthanipphattikāraṇatāti evamādīhi dibbasadisehi ānubhāvehi samannāgatattā,
tika-s0102t:719_11: Sabbehi ākārehīti sabbehi sundarehi paripuṇṇāvayave lakkhaṇasampanne cakke icchitabbehi ākārehi.
tika-s0102t:720_2: Tassā pana panāḷiyā samantato passassa rajatamayattā sārarajatamayā vuttā.
tika-s0102t:720_3: Yasmā cassa cakkassa rathacakkassa viya antobhāvo nāma natthi,
tika-s0102t:720_6: Nābhipanāḷiparikkhepapaṭṭesūti nābhiparikkhepapaṭṭe ceva nābhiyā panāḷiparikkhepapaṭṭe ca.
tika-s0102t:721_3: Paricchedalekhā tassa tassa paricchedadassanavasena ṭhitā paricchinnalekhā. Ādi-
tika-s0102t:722_3: Kāmaṃ tassa cakkaratanassa nemimaṇḍalaṃ asandhikameva nibbattaṃ,
tika-s0102t:722_4: sabbatthakameva pana kevalaṃ pavāḷavaṇṇena ca sobhatīti pakaticakkassa sandhiyuttaṭṭhāne surattasuvaṇṇapaṭṭādimayāhi
tika-s0102t:722_5: vaṭṭaparicchedalekhāhi paññāyamānāhi sasandhikā viya dissantīti āha “sandhīsu panassā”tiādi.
tika-s0102t:723_1: Ākāsacāribhāvato hissa tattha vātaggāhī pavāḷadaṇḍo hoti.
tika-s0102t:723_2: Dasannaṃ dasannaṃ arānaṃ antareti dasannaṃ dasannaṃ arānaṃ antare samīpe padese.
tika-s0102t:723_11: Nābhipanāḷiyā dvinnaṃ passānaṃ vasena “dvinnampi nābhipanāḷīna”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:725_0: Cando purato cakkaratanaṃ pacchāti evaṃ pubbāpariyena pubbāparabhāvena.
tika-s0102t:726_1: Uttarasīhapañjarasadiseti tadā rañño pāsāde tādisassa uttaradisāya sīhapañjarassa labbhamānattā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:726_3: sarīrañca anullaṅghitvā yathāṭhiteneva hatthena pupphamuṭṭhiyo khipitvā sukhena sakkā hoti pūjetuṃ.
tika-s0102t:727_1: Ākāsaṃ abbhuggantvā pavatteti āgantvā ṭhitaṭṭhānato upari ākāsaṃ abbhuggantvā pavatte.
tika-s0102t:729_0: Sineruṃ vāmapassena katvā tassa dhurataraṃ gacchanto “vāmapassena sineruṃ pahāyā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:731_0: Paracakkanti parassa rañño senā, āṇā vā.
tika-s0102t:732_4: Upaparikkhitvāti hetutopi sabhāvatopi phalatopi diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikādiādīnavatopi vīmaṃsitvā.
tika-s0102t:732_5: Vibhāventi paññāya atthaṃ vibhūtaṃ karontīti vibhāvino,
tika-s0102t:732_9: pana rañño ca mahānubhāvena te jigucchanavasena pāpato anoramantāpi ekacce ottappavasena oramantīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0102t:734_4: Attano acchariyaguṇehi sobhantameva hi taṃ tiṭṭhati.
tika-s0102t:736_3: Āgamanaṃ cintethāti vadanti cakkavattivattassa pūritatāya paricitattā.
tika-s0102t:736_7: catūhi pādehi cāti sattahi avayavehi patiṭṭhitattā sattapatiṭṭho.
tika-s0102t:736_9: Uposathakulā sabbajeṭṭhoti uposathakulato āgacchanto tattha sabbappadhāno āgacchatīti yojanā.
tika-s0102t:736_14: Gandhameva hi tassa itare hatthī na sahanti.
tika-s0102t:737_0: Gharadhenuvacchako viyāti ghare paricitadhenuyā tattheva jātasaṃvaddhavacchako viya.
tika-s0102t:741_5: Muttājālake ṭhapetvāti suvisuddhe muttamaye jālake patiṭṭhāpetvā.
tika-s0102t:743_1: “Itthiratanaṃ pātubhavatī”ti vatvā kutassā pātubhāvoti dassetuṃ “maddarājakulato”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:743_2: Maddaraṭṭhaṃ kira jambudīpe abhirūpānaṃ itthīnaṃ uppattiṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-s0102t:743_5: bhaddakāpilānī”ti evamādi itthiratanaṃ maddaraṭṭhe eva uppannaṃ.
tika-s0102t:744_2: Rūpanti sarīraṃ “rūpaṃ tveva saṅkhaṃ gacchatī”tiādīsu viya.
tika-s0102t:744_5: Somanassavasena cittaṃ pasādeti yoniso cintentānaṃ kammaphalasaddhāya vasena.
tika-s0102t:744_6: Pasādāvahattāti kāraṇavacanena yathā pāsādikatāya vaṇṇapokkharatāsiddhi vuttā,
tika-s0102t:744_8: abhirūpatāya ca dassanīyatāsiddhi vattabbāti nayaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0102t:744_12: Evaṃ sarīrasampattivasena abhirūpatādike dassetvā idāni sarīre dosābhāvavasenapi te dassetuṃ “abhirūpā vā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:746_0: Aggidaḍḍhā viyāti āsanagatena agginā daḍḍhā viya.
tika-s0102t:746_1: Paṭhamamevāti rājānaṃ disvāpi kiccantarappasutā ahutvā kiccantarato paṭhamameva,
tika-s0102t:746_3: Rañño nisajjāya pacchā nipātanaṃ nisīdanaṃ sīlaṃ etissāti pacchānipātinī.
tika-s0102t:746_4: Taṃ taṃ attanā rañño kātabbakiccaṃ “kiṃ karomī”ti pucchitabbatāya kiṃ karaṇaṃ paṭisāvetīti kiṃkārapaṭissāvinī.
tika-s0102t:747_1: itthiratanassa pana taṃ natthīti dassetuṃ “svāssā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:748_1: Purimakammānubhāvenāti katassa purimakammassānubhāvena itthiratanassa tabbhāvasaṃvattaniyassa purimakammassa ānubhāvena.
tika-s0102t:748_2: Cakkavattinopi parivārasampattisaṃvattaniyaṃ puññakammaṃ tādisassa phalavisesassa upanissayo hotiyeva.
tika-s0102t:748_4: etena sesesupi saviññāṇakaratanesu attano kammavasena nibbattesupi tesaṃ tesaṃ visesānaṃ tadupanissayatā vibhāvitā evāti daṭṭhabbā.
tika-s0102t:748_5: Pubbe ekadesavasena labbhamānā pāripūrī rañño cakkavattibhāvūpagamanato paṭṭhāya sabbākāraparipūrā jātā.
tika-s0102t:750_2: Yādisaṃ rañño cakkavattissa puññabalaṃ nissāya yathāvuttā cakkaratanānubhāvanibbatti,
tika-s0102t:750_3: tādisaṃ etassa puññabalaṃ nissāya gahapatiratanassa kammavipākajaṃ dibbacakkhuṃ nibbattetīti āha “cakkaratanānubhāvasahita”nti.
tika-s0102t:752_2: ayaṃ adhammo”tiādinā kammassakatāvabodhanasaṅkhātassa paṇḍitabhāvassa atthitāya paṇḍito.
tika-s0102t:752_5: Attano yāthāvabuddhamatthaṃ paresaṃ vibhāvetuṃ pakāsetuṃ samatthatāya vibhāvī.
tika-s0102t:754_3: Samaṃ nātisītanāccuṇhatāya avisamaṃ bhuttassa vepāko etissā atthīti samavepākinī,
tika-s0102t:756_1: Janarāsiṃ kāretvā tena janarāsinā khaṇitvā na māpesi.
tika-s0102t:756_5: Pariveṇaparicchedapariyanteti ettha pariveṇaṃ nāma samantato vivaṭaṅgaṇabhūtaṃ pokkharaṇiyā tīraṃ,
tika-s0102t:756_6: tassa paricchedabhūte pariyante ekāya vedikāya parikkhittā pokkharaṇiyo.
tika-s0102t:757_3: pacchā pana yānasayanādīni viya itthiyopi atthikānaṃ pariccattā eva.
tika-s0102t:757_10: Tādisāni atthīti yādisāni rañño dānagge khomasukhumādīni vatthāni,
tika-s0102t:758_2: saddena dānādhippāyena gehato nīhataṃ puna gehaṃ pavesetuṃ na yuttanti imamatthaṃ samucceti.
tika-s0102t:760_1: Haratīti ativiya pabhassarabhāvena cakkhūni paṭiharantaṃ duddikkhatāya diṭṭhiyo harati apanentaṃ viya hoti.
tika-s0102t:760_2: Taṃ pana haraṇaṃ nesaṃ paripphandanenāti āha “phandāpetī”ti.
tika-s0102t:763_5: Pubbe sampannaṃ katvā deyyadhammapariccāgassa katabhāvaṃ dassento “sampattipariccāgassā”ti āha.
tika-s0102t:765_1: Eko theroti appaññāto nāmagottato aññataro puthujjano thero.
tika-s0102t:765_2: Theraṃ disvāti aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūle nisinnaṃ disvā.
tika-s0102t:767_0: Kūṭāgāradvāreyeva nivattesīti kūṭāgāraṃ paviṭṭhakālato paṭṭhāya tesaṃ micchāvitakkānaṃ pavattiyā okāsaṃ nādāsi.
tika-s0102t:768_1: Kasiṇameva paññāyati mahāpurisassa tattha tattha katādhikārattā,
tika-s0102t:769_2: Kasiṇajjhānappamaññānaṃyeva vacanaṃ tāsaṃ tadā ādaragāravavasena nibbattitattā.
tika-s0102t:769_5: tasmā mahāsatto tāpasaparibbājakakāle yattake lokiyaguṇe nibbatteti,
tika-s0102t:774_2: Yaṃ yaṃ rañño icchitaṃ dānūpakaraṇañceva bhogūpakaraṇañca,
tika-s0102t:775_1: Sace pana rājā jīvite chandaṃ janeyya,
tika-s0102t:775_2: ito parampi ciraṃ kālaṃ tiṭṭheyya mahiddhiko mahānubhāvoti evaṃ mahajjhāsayā devī bhogesu,
tika-s0102t:775_3: jīvite ca rājānaṃ sāpekkhaṃ kātuṃ vāyami.
tika-s0102t:775_8: Apekkhati ārammaṇaṃ etāya na vissajjetīti apekkhā, taṇhā.
tika-s0102t:776_2: kasmā ca garahitāti antolīnaṃ codanaṃ vissajjento “buddhehī”tiādimāha,
tika-s0102t:779_3: Tādisaṃ bhattanti tathārūpaṃ garuṃ madhuraṃ siniddhaṃ bhattaṃ.
tika-s0102t:781_0: Idāni yathāvuttāya rañño mahāsudassanassa bhogasampattiyā kammasarikkhataṃ uddharanto “etāni panā”tiādimāha,
tika-s0102t:782_5: Mahāsudassanassa jātakadesanā hi tadā samudāgamanato paṭṭhāya bhagavatā desitāti.
tika-s0102t:782_6: Paṃsvāgārakīḷaṃ viyāti yathā nāma dārakā paṃsūhi vāpigehabhojanādīni dassentā yathāruci kīḷitvā gamanakāle sabbaṃ taṃ vidhaṃsentā gacchanti,
tika-s0102t:782_7: evameva bhagavā mahāsudassanakāle attanā anubhūtaṃ dibbasampattisadisaṃ acinteyyānubhāvasampattiṃ vitthārato
tika-s0102t:782_8: dassetvā puna attano desanaṃ ādīnavanissaraṇadassanavasena vivaṭṭābhimukhaṃ viparivattento “sabbā sā
tika-s0102t:783_0: Ettāvatāti ādito paṭṭhāya pavattena ettakena desanāmaggena.
tika-s0102t:783_2: Aniccalakkhaṇaṃ ādāyāti taṃ sampattigataṃ aniccalakkhaṇaṃ desanāya gahetvā vibhāvetvā.
tika-s0102t:783_3: Yathā nisseṇimuccane tādisaṃ satahatthubbedhaṃ rukkhaṃ pakatipurisena ārohituṃ na sakkā,
tika-s0102t:783_4: evaṃ aniccatāvibhāvanena tassā sampattiyā apekkhānisseṇimuccane kenaci ārohituṃ na sakkāti āha “aniccalakkhaṇaṃ ādāya nisseṇiṃ muñcanto viyā”ti.
tika-s0102t:783_6: ādito sātisayaṃ kāmesu assādaṃ dassetvāpi upari nesaṃ “passānandā”tiādinā ādīnavaṃ, okāraṃ,
tika-s0102t:785_4: yato vidhuya eva kāmavitakkādisamaṇabhāvasaṃkilesaṃ suññāgāraṃ pāvisi,
tika-s0102t:785_5: evaṃbhūtassāpi tassa kālaṃ kiriyato sattame divase sabbā cakkavattisampatti antarahitā,
tika-s0102t:785_7: aho acchariyamanusso anaññasādhāraṇaguṇavisesoti imaṃ visesaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0102t:786_2: So hi imasmiṃ sutte saṅgītiṃ anāruḷho,
tika-s0102t:786_3: aññattha pana āgato imissā desanāya piṭṭhivattakabhāvena.
tika-s0102t:788_2: evaṃ samīpatthavācakopi hotīti samantā sāmantāti attho vutto.
tika-s0102t:788_4: Yassa pana sāmantā janapadesu “nātike viharatī”ti vuttattā nātikassāti viññāto yamattho.
tika-s0102t:788_7: nidassanavasena vā tassa vakkhamānattā “parito parito janapadesu” icceva vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:788_11: Ñāṇagatipuññānaṃ upapattīsūti ettha ñāṇagatūpapatti nāma tassa tassa maggañāṇagamanassa nibbatti.
tika-s0102t:788_17: Paricārake byākaroti byakātabbānaṃ bahūnaṃ tattha labbhanato.
tika-s0102t:791_4: aho saṅgho”ti dhammasaṅghaguṇakittanāpi atthato buddhaguṇakittanā eva hotīti “bhagavantaṃ kittayamānarūpā”ti
tika-s0102t:792_1: Ñāṇagatīti “pañcannaṃ orambhāgiyānaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā”tiādinā āgataṃ pahātabbapahānavasena pavattaṃ maggañāṇagamanaṃ.
tika-s0102t:792_2: Yasmā tassā eva ñāṇagatiyā vasena tassa tassa ariyapuggalassa opapātikatādiviseso,
tika-s0102t:792_3: tasmā taṃ tādisaṃ tassa abhisamparāyaṃ sandhāyāha “ñāṇābhisamparāyamevā”ti.
tika-s0102t:795_0: 280. Jeṭṭhakabhāvena jane vasabhasadisoti janavasabhoti assa devaputtassa nāmaṃ ahosi.
tika-s0102t:796_0: Ito devalokā cavitvā sattakkhattuṃ manussaloke rājabhūtassa.
tika-s0102t:797_5: saddo ādipariyāyoti āha “taṃ divasaṃ ādiṃ katvā”ti.
tika-s0102t:797_7: avinipāto”ti idaṃ yathā tattakaṃ kālaṃ sugatito sugatūpapattiyeva ahosi,
tika-s0102t:797_9: Phussassa sammāsambuddhassa kālato pabhuti hi sambhatavivaṭṭūpanissayakusalasambhāro esa devaputto.
tika-s0102t:797_13: Bhagavato diṭṭhasadisamevāti āvajjanasamanantaraṃ yathā te bhagavato catuvīsatisatasahassamattā sattā ñāṇagatito diṭṭhā,
tika-s0102t:799_3: pavāraṇasaṅgaho panassa pavāretvā satthu santikaṃ gacchantānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ antarāmagge parissayapariharaṇatthaṃ.
tika-s0102t:800_3: Āsanepi nisajjāya sudhammāya devasabhāya paṭhamaṃ devesu tāvatiṃsesu nisinnesu tassā catūsu dvāresu cattāro mahārājāno nisīdanti,
tika-s0102t:800_4: idaṃ nesaṃ āsane nisajjāya cārittaṃ hoti.
tika-s0102t:804_3: Cakkhuyeva patho rūpadassanassa maggo upāyoti cakkhupatho,
tika-s0102t:804_5: cakkhussa gocarayoggo vā cakkhupathoti āha “āpāthe vā”ti.
tika-s0102t:804_8: Heṭṭhā heṭṭhāti tāvatiṃsato paṭṭhāya heṭṭhā heṭṭhā,
tika-s0102t:804_11: “Cātumahārājikā hi tāvatiṃsānaṃ yathā jātirūpāni passituṃ sakkonti,
tika-s0102t:804_14: Na hi heṭṭhimā brahmāno uparimānaṃ mūlapaṭisandhirūpaṃ passituṃ sakkonti,
tika-s0102t:805_0: Suṇantova niddaṃ okkamīti gatiyo upadhārento bahi visaṭavitakkavicchedena saṅkocaṃ āpannacittatāya.
tika-s0102t:807_2: Yehi pittasemhādīhi palibuddhattā saro avissaṭṭho siyā,
tika-s0102t:807_6: Sarassa madhuratā nāma maddavanti āha “madhuro mudū”ti.
tika-s0102t:809_0: “Ye hi kecī”tiādi “yāvañca so bhagavā”tiādinā vuttassa atthassa hetukittanavasena samatthanaṃ saraṇesu nesaṃ niccasevanena,
tika-s0102t:809_5: Te hi sabbaso samugghātitavicikicchatāya ratanattaye aveccappasādena samannāgatāyeva,
tika-s0102t:809_6: pothujjanikasaddhāya vasena buddhādīnaṃ guṇe ogāhetvā jānanti,
tika-s0102t:809_9: Tukā vuccati khīriṇī yā tukātipi vuccati.
tika-s0102t:809_11: Taṃ koṭṭetvā pakkhittaṃ ghanaṃ nirantaracitaṃ hutvā tiṭṭhati.
tika-s0102t:811_4: asaṅkarato ṭhapanañca atthato desanā evāti āha “sukathitā”ti.
tika-s0102t:811_10: Tena hi yasmā uparūpari visesasaṅkhātaṃ iddhiṃ pajjanti pāpuṇanti,
tika-s0102t:811_16: Evaṃ tāva “cattāro iddhipādā”ti ettha attho veditabbo.
tika-s0102t:811_19: Anekatthattā hi dhātūnaṃ yogyattho vi- pubbo su- saddo,
tika-s0102t:812_2: ayaṃ vuccati chandasamādhī”ti imāya pāḷiyā chandādhipati samādhi chandasamādhīti adhipatisaddalopaṃ katvā samāso vuttoti viññāyati,
tika-s0102t:812_4: chandādhiko vā samādhi chandasasamādhī”ti aṭṭhakathāyaṃvuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0102t:812_7: Atha vā taṃ taṃ visesaṃ saṅkharotīti saṅkhāro,
tika-s0102t:812_9: Tattha catukiccasādhakato aññassa nivattanatthaṃ padhānaggahaṇanti padhānabhūtā seṭṭhabhūtāti attho.
tika-s0102t:812_10: Catubbidhassa pana vīriyassa adhippetattā bahuvacananiddeso kato.
tika-s0102t:812_11: Visuṃ samāsayojanavasena yo pubbe iddhipādattho pādassa upāyatthataṃ,
tika-s0102t:812_14: uttaracūḷabhājanīye vā vuttehi chandādīhi iddhipādehi sādhetabbāya iddhiyā kattiddhibhāvaṃ,
tika-s0102t:812_17: karaṇattho ca ekajjhaṃ gahetvā vuttoti kattuatthaṃ tāva dassetuṃ “nipphattipariyāyena ijjhanaṭṭhena vā”ti
tika-s0102t:813_7: na chandādīhīti na idha vīriyādhipatitā padhānasaṅkhārassa vuttā hoti.
tika-s0102t:813_9: samannāgamaṅgavasena pana padhānasaṅkhāravacanena vuttanti nāpi dvīhi vīriyehi samannāgamo vutto hoti.
tika-s0102t:813_13: tasmā samādhivisesanānaṃ vasena cattāro iddhipādā vuttā,
tika-s0102t:813_16: sadde upāyatthena chandādīnaṃ iddhipādatā vuttā hoti.
tika-s0102t:813_17: Teneva hi abhidhamme uttaracūḷabhājanīye “cattāro iddhipādā chandiddhipādo”tiādinā chandādīnameva iddhipādatā vuttā.
tika-s0102t:813_18: Pañhapucchake “cattāro iddhipādā idha bhikkhu chandasamādhī”tiādinā ca uddesaṃ katvāpi puna chandādīnaṃyeva kusalādibhāvo vibhatto.
tika-s0102t:813_22: Idāni paṭilābhapubbabhāgānaṃ vasena iddhipāde vibhajitvā dassetuṃ “apicā”tiādi vuttaṃ,
tika-s0102t:813_24: Idha iddhipādakathā saṅkhepeneva vuttāti āha “vitthārena pana…pe… vuttā”ti.
tika-s0102t:814_1: Tesu hi ekacce “iddhi nāma anipphannā”ti vadanti,
tika-s0102t:814_5: Ābhatoti abhidhammapāṭhato dīghanikāyaṭṭhakathāyaṃ ānīto purimanayato aññenākārena desanāya pavattattā.
tika-s0102t:814_8: Ime panāti imasmiṃ sutte āgatā iddhipādā.
tika-s0102t:814_9: Raṭṭhapālatthero “chande sati kathaṃ nānujānissantī”ti sattāhaṃ bhattāni abhuñjitvā mātāpitaro anujānāpetvā
tika-s0102t:814_10: pabbajitvā chandameva avassāya lokuttaraṃ dhammaṃ nibbattesīti āha “raṭṭhapālatthero…pe…
tika-s0102t:814_12: Soṇatthero bhāvanamanuyutto āraddhavīriyo paramasukhumālo pādesu phoṭesu jātesupi vīriyaṃ nappaṭipassambhesīti
tika-s0102t:814_14: Sambhūtatthero “cittavato kiṃ nāma na sijjhatī”ti cittaṃ pubbaṅgamaṃ katvā bhāvanaṃ ārādhesīti āha “sambhūtatthero cittaṃ dhuraṃ katvā”ti.
tika-s0102t:814_16: tasmā tassa bhagavā “suññato lokaṃ avekkhassū”ti suññatākathaṃ kathesi,
tika-s0102t:814_18: paññāya pariggahatthañca dvikkhattuṃ pucchito samāno pañhaṃ kathesi.
tika-s0102t:815_0: Punappunaṃ chanduppādanaṃ pesanaṃ viya hotīti chandassa upaṭṭhānasadisatā vuttā.
tika-s0102t:818_1: “Sabbadhammesu ca paññā seṭṭhā”ti vīmaṃsāya jātisampattisadisatā vuttā.
tika-s0102t:819_0: Anekaṃ vihitaṃ vidhaṃ etassāti anekavihitanti āha “anekavidha”nti. Vidha-
tika-s0102t:819_1: saddo koṭṭhāsapariyāyo “ekavidhena ñāṇavatthū”tiādīsu viyāti āha “iddhividhanti iddhikoṭṭhāsa”nti.
tika-s0102t:821_1: “Sukhassā”ti idaṃ tiṇṇampi sukhānaṃ sādhāraṇavacananti āha “jhānasukhassa maggasukhassa phalasukhassā”ti.
tika-s0102t:821_4: Purimesu tāva dvīsu okāsādhigamesu tīṇipi sukhāni labbhanti,
tika-s0102t:821_11: so pana tehi samannāgatacittopi hotīti vuttaṃ “sampayuttacitto”ti.
tika-s0102t:822_0: “Aniccantiādivasena manasi karotī”ti saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ vivarituṃ “yoniso manasikāro nāmā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:822_4: anaccantikatāya ca anicce tebhūmake saṅkhāre “anicca”nti manasikāroti yojanā.
tika-s0102t:822_6: Ayaṃ pana viseso tasmiṃyeva udayabbayapaṭipīḷanatāya dukkhanato,
tika-s0102t:822_11: Sabbampi hi tebhūmakaṃ saṅkhataṃ kilesāsucipaggharaṇato “asubha”ntveva vattuṃ arahati.
tika-s0102t:822_13: “Cittassa āvaṭṭanā”tiādinā āvajjanāya paccayabhūtā tato purimuppannā manodvārikā kusalajavanappavatti phalavohāreneva tathā vuttā.
tika-s0102t:822_14: Tassā hi vasena sā kusaluppattiyā upanissayo hotīti.
tika-s0102t:822_15: Āvajjanā hi bhavaṅgacittaṃ āvaṭṭetīti cittassa āvaṭṭanā,
tika-s0102t:822_19: Tadevārammaṇaṃ attānaṃ anubandhitvā anubandhitvā uppajjamāne manasi karoti ṭhapetīti manasikāro.
tika-s0102t:822_20: Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ upāyamanasikāralakkhaṇo yonisomanasikāro nāma vuccati,
tika-s0102t:822_21: yassa vasena puggalo dukkhādīni saccāni āvajjituṃ sakkoti.
tika-s0102t:823_0: Asaṃsaṭṭhoti na saṃsaṭṭho kāmādīhi vivitto vinābhūto.
tika-s0102t:823_1: Kāmādivisaṃsaggahetu uppajjanakasukhaṃ nāma vivekajaṃ pītisukhanti āha “paṭhamajjhānasukha”nti.
tika-s0102t:823_3: suttesu pana taṃ kāyikasukhassāpi paccayabhāvato visesato “sukha”ntveva vuccatīti idhāpi jhānabhūtaṃ somanassaṃ sukhanti,
tika-s0102t:823_7: Aparāparaṃ somanassanti jhānādhigamahetu paccavekkhaṇādivasena punappunaṃ uppajjanakasomanassaṃ.
tika-s0102t:824_4: idha pana pakaṭṭho mudo pamudo pāmojjanti adhippetaṃ,
tika-s0102t:824_5: tañca somanassarahitaṃ natthīti avinābhāvitāya “balavataraṃ pītisomanassa”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:824_6: Jhānassa ujuvipaccanīkataṃ sandhāya “pañca nīvaraṇāni vikkhambhetvā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:824_9: attano okāsaṃ gahetvā tiṭṭhati paṭipakkhadhammehi anabhibhavanīyato.
tika-s0102t:824_14: Purimapakkhe pana okāsaṃ avasaraṃ adhigacchati etenāti okāsādhigamo.
tika-s0102t:825_2: savipphārikatāya ca ānāpānavitakkavicārānaṃ thūlabhāvaṃ anujānanto “kāyavacīsaṅkhārā tāva oḷārikā hontū”ti āha.
tika-s0102t:825_3: Tabbidhuratāya pana ekaccānaṃ vedanāsaññānaṃ thūlataṃ ananujānanto “cittasaṅkhārā kathaṃ oḷārikā”ti āha.
tika-s0102t:825_4: Itaro “appahīnattā”ti kāraṇaṃ vatvā “kāyasaṅkhārā hī”tiādinā tamatthaṃ vivarati.
tika-s0102t:825_7: pahīnā pana tadabhāvato “sukhumā”ti āha “pahīne upādāya appahīnattā oḷārikā nāma jātā”ti.
tika-s0102t:825_13: Pāḷiyaṃ pana atthato siddhāpi supākaṭabhāvena vibhāvetuṃ sarūpato gaṇhāti.
tika-s0102t:825_14: Na hi ariyavinaye atthāpattivibhāvanā abhidhammadesanāya pakatīti.
tika-s0102t:825_15: Yathā nīvaraṇavikkhambhanañca paṭhamassa jhānassa adhigamāya upāyo,
tika-s0102t:825_16: evaṃ sukhadukkhavikkhambhanaṃ catutthassa jhānassa adhigamāya upāyoti “catutthajjhānaṃ sukhaṃ dukkhaṃ vikkhambhetvā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:826_2: Attano hitasukhaṃ ākaṅkhantena sevanīyato sevitabbaṃ, kusalaṃ,
tika-s0102t:826_6: kusalanti sāvajjadukādayo tayopi dukā yathārahaṃ etesaṃ kusalākusalakammapathānaṃ vaseneva veditabbā.
tika-s0102t:826_7: Sabbanti yathāvuttaṃ sabbaṃ catūhi dukehi saṅgahitaṃ dhammajātaṃ.
tika-s0102t:826_10: Vaṭṭapaṭicchādikā avijjā pahīyati catunnaṃ ariyasaccānaṃ sammadeva paṭivijjhanato.
tika-s0102t:826_12: Sukhanti evaṃ kammapathamukhena tebhūmakadhamme sammasitvā vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā maggapaṭipāṭiyā arahatte
tika-s0102t:827_0: Aṭṭhatiṃsārammaṇavasenāti pāḷiyaṃ āgatānaṃ aṭṭhatiṃsāya kammaṭṭhānānaṃ vasena.
tika-s0102t:827_5: “Nirodhasamāpattiṃ pāpetvā”ti iminā arūpajjhānānipi gahitāni honti tehi vinā nirodhasamāpattisamāpajjanassa asambhavato,
tika-s0102t:827_7: Dasa upacārajjhānānīti ṭhapetvā kāyagatāsatiṃ ānāpānañca aṭṭha anussatiyo,
tika-s0102t:827_9: Adhisīlaṃ nāma samādhisaṃvattaniyanti tassa heṭṭhimantena paṭhamajjhānaṃ pariyosānanti vuttaṃ “adhisīlasikkhā paṭhamaṃ okāsādhigamaṃ bhajatī”ti.
tika-s0102t:827_12: Matthakappattā adhipaññāsikkhā nāma aggamaggavijjāti āha “adhipaññāsikkhā tatiya”nti.
tika-s0102t:827_13: Sikkhattayavasena tayo okāsādhigame nīharantena yathārahaṃ taṃtaṃsuttavasenapi nīharitabbanti dassento “sāmaññaphalepī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0102t:828_0: Yadaggena ca tisso sikkhā yathākkamaṃ tayo okāsādhigame bhajanti,
tika-s0102t:828_1: tadaggena tappadhānattā yathākkamaṃ tīṇi piṭakāni te bhajantīti dassetuṃ “tīsu panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:828_2: Tīṇi piṭakāni vibhajitvāti tiṇṇaṃ okāsādhigamānaṃ vasena yathānupubbaṃ tīṇi piṭakāni vitthāretvā kathetuṃ labhissāmāti.
tika-s0102t:828_3: Samodhānetvāti samāyojetvā tattha vuttamatthaṃ imassa suttassa atthabhāvena samānetvā.
tika-s0102t:828_5: atipapañcakathanena vā duṭṭhu kathitanti na sakkā vattuṃ tathākathanasseva sukathanabhāvatoti āha “tepiṭakaṃ…pe…
tika-s0102t:830_2: atha kho bāhitikapariyāyena pīti āha “phalakusalassa cā”ti.
tika-s0102t:830_4: Sammā samāhitoti samathavasena ceva vipassanāvasena ca suṭṭhu samāhito.
tika-s0102t:830_5: Ekaggacittoti vikkhepassa dūrasamussāritattā ekaggataṃ avikkhepaṃ pattacitto.
tika-s0102t:830_6: Attano kāyatoti ajjhattaṃ kāye kāyānupassanāvasena sammā samāhitacitto samāno “samāhito yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti passatī”ti vacanato.
tika-s0102t:830_7: Tattha ñāṇadassanaṃ nibbattento tato bahiddhā parassa kāyepi ñāṇadassanaṃ nibbatteti.
tika-s0102t:830_9: Sammā vippasīdatīti sammā samādhānapaccayena abhippasādena ñāṇūpasañhitena ajjhattaṃ kāyaṃ okappeti.
tika-s0102t:832_2: Jhānakkhassa vīriyacakkassa ariyamaggarathassa sīlaṃ vibhūsanabhāvena vuttanti āha “alaṅkāro parikkhāro nāmā”ti.
tika-s0102t:832_3: Sattahi nagaraparikkhārehīti nagaraṃ parivāretvā rakkhaṇakehi kataparikkhepo, parikhā, uddāpo, pākāro, esikā, palighā,
tika-s0102t:832_8: Parikkhāro hi sammādiṭṭhiyādayo maggadhammā sammāsamādhissa sahajātādipaccayabhāvena parikaraṇato abhisaṅkharaṇato.
tika-s0102t:832_12: Sammā pasatthā sundarā diṭṭhi etassāti sammādiṭṭhi, puggalo,
