tika-s0102t:1227_4: tathā ārammaṇādivibhāgena anekabhedabhinnampi cittaṃ cittabhāvasāmaññena ekajjhaṃ gahetvā “citte”ti ekavacanaṃ,
tika-s0102t:1227_5: vedanā pana sukhādibhedabhinnā visuṃ visuṃ anupassitabbāti dassentena “vedanāsū”ti bahuvacanena vuttā,
tika-s0102t:1227_8: anupassitabbākārena ca anekabhedā evāti tepi bahuvacanavaseneva vuttā.
tika-s0102t:1228_2: kesādike ca bhūtupādāyarūpehi vinibbhuñjanto “tathā na kāye”tiādimāha.
tika-s0102t:1228_4: “nagaraṃ nāma koci attho atthī”ti pana kesañci samaññātidhāvanaṃ siyāti itthipurisādisamaññātidhāvane nagaranidassanaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1228_9: pageva itthiādayoti āha “kāyo vā itthī vā puriso vā añño vā koci dhammo dissatī”ti.
tika-s0102t:1229_5: purisaṃ passāmī”ti pana pavattasaññāya vasena “yaṃ passatī”ti vuttaṃ micchādassanena vā diṭṭhiyā yaṃ passati,
tika-s0102t:1229_6: na taṃ diṭṭhaṃ taṃ rūpāyatanaṃ na hotīti attho viparītaggāhavasena micchāparikappitarūpattā.
tika-s0102t:1229_7: Atha vā taṃ kesādibhūtupādāyasamūhasaṅkhātaṃ diṭṭhaṃ na hoti,
tika-s0102t:1229_8: acakkhuviññāṇaviññeyyattā diṭṭhaṃ vā taṃ na hoti.
tika-s0102t:1229_10: taṃ na passatīti yaṃ rūpāyatanaṃ kesādibhūtupādāyasamūhasaṅkhātaṃ diṭṭhaṃ,
tika-s0102t:1229_11: taṃ paññācakkhunā bhūtato na passatīti attho.
tika-s0102t:1229_12: Apassaṃ bajjhateti imaṃ attabhāvaṃ yathābhūtaṃ paññācakkhunā apassanto “etaṃ mama,
tika-s0102t:1230_2: “Kiṃ vuttaṃ hotī”tiādinā taṃ evatthaṃ pākaṭaṃ karoti.
tika-s0102t:1230_5: pubbāpariyabhāvena ca pavattamānaṃ samūhavasena gahetvā “kāyo”ti vadati.
tika-s0102t:1231_0: Evaṃ gahetabbassāti “ahaṃ mama”nti evaṃ attattaniyabhāvena andhabālehi gahetabbassa.
tika-s0102t:1232_0: Idāni sattannaṃ anupassanākārānampi vasena kāyānupassanaṃ dassetuṃ “apicā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1232_1: Tattha aniccato anupassatīti catusamuṭṭhānikaṃ kāyaṃ “anicca”nti anupassati,
tika-s0102t:1232_3: Tathābhūtassa cassa niccaggāhassa lesopi na hotīti vuttaṃ “no niccato”ti.
tika-s0102t:1232_6: kāro luttaniddiṭṭhoti tena nivattitamatthaṃ dassetuṃ “no niccato”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1232_7: Na cettha dukkhato anupassanādinivattanaṃ āsaṅkitabbaṃ paṭiyogīnivattanaparattā eva- kārassa,
tika-s0102t:1232_11: aniccassa dukkhattā tameva ca kāyaṃ dukkhato anupassati,
tika-s0102t:1232_13: Yasmā pana yaṃ aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattā,
tika-s0102t:1232_22: no samudeti samudayaṃ na karotīti attho.
tika-s0102t:1232_25: Ayañhi aniccādianupassanā tadaṅgavasena saddhiṃ kāyaṃ tannissayakhandhābhisaṅkhārehi kilesānaṃ pariccajanato,
tika-s0102t:1232_26: saṅkhatadosadassanena tabbiparīte nibbāne tanninnatāya pakkhandanato “pariccāgapaṭinissaggo ceva pakkhandanapaṭinissaggo cā”ti vuccati,
tika-s0102t:1232_27: tasmā tāya samannāgato bhikkhu vuttanayena kilese pariccajati,
tika-s0102t:1232_29: tathābhūto ca nibbattanavasena kilese na ādiyati,
tika-s0102t:1232_33: Idānissa tāhi anupassanāhi yesaṃ dhammānaṃ pahānaṃ hoti,
tika-s0102t:1232_34: taṃ dassetuṃ “aniccato anupassanto niccasaññaṃ pajahatī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1232_35: Tattha niccasaññanti “saṅkhārā niccā”ti evaṃ pavattaṃ viparītasaññaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1233_4: Yadipi kilesānaṃ pahānaṃ ātāpananti taṃ sammādiṭṭhiādīnampi attheva, ātappa-
tika-s0102t:1233_5: saddo viya pana ātāpasaddo vīriyeyeva niruḷhoti vuttaṃ “vīriyassetaṃ nāma”nti.
tika-s0102t:1233_6: Atha vā paṭipakkhappahāne sampayuttadhammānaṃ abbhussahanavasena pavattamānassa vīriyassa sātisayaṃ tadātāpananti vīriyameva tathā vuccati,
tika-s0102t:1233_9: atisayassa vā dīpakoti ātāpīgahaṇena sammappadhānasamaṅgitaṃ dasseti. Sammā,
tika-s0102t:1233_14: uparūpari visesāvahabhāvena pavattiyā sāmaṃ pajānantoti attho.
tika-s0102t:1233_20: uddhate ca bhāvetabbā bojjhaṅgā atthikā etāyāti sabbatthikā.
tika-s0102t:1233_21: Satiyā laddhupakārāya eva paññāya ettha yathāvutte kāye kammaṭṭhāniko bhikkhu kāyānupassī viharati.
tika-s0102t:1233_27: Yasmā ca upaṭṭhitassati yathāvuttaṃ upāyaṃ na pariccajati,
tika-s0102t:1234_1: tasmāssa sampayuttadhammā vīriyādayo aṅganti āha “sampayogaṅgañcassa dassetvā”ti. Aṅga-
tika-s0102t:1234_3: Satiggahaṇeneva cettha samādhissāpi gahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ tassā samādhikkhandhe saṅgahitattā.
tika-s0102t:1234_5: Na hi kevalāya satiyā kilesappahānaṃ sambhavati,
tika-s0102t:1234_8: tasmāssa jhānadesanāyaṃ savitakkādivacanassa viya sampayogaṅgadassanatāti aṅga-
tika-s0102t:1234_13: tasmā pubbabhāgiyameva vinayaṃ dassento “tadaṅgavinayena vā vikkhambhanavinayena vā”ti āha.
tika-s0102t:1235_0: Avisesena dvīhipi nīvaraṇappahānaṃ vuttanti katvā puna ekekena vuttaṃ pahānavisesaṃ dassetuṃ “visesenā”ti āha.
tika-s0102t:1235_1: Atha vā “vineyya nīvaraṇānī”ti avatvā abhijjhādomanassavinayavacanassa payojanaṃ dassento “visesenā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0102t:1235_2: Kāyānupassanābhāvanāya hi ujuvipaccanīkānaṃ anurodhavirodhādīnaṃ pahānadassanaṃ etassa payojananti.
tika-s0102t:1235_15: Purimena hi “anurodhavirodhavippamutto”tiādivacanena bhāvanaṃ anuyuttassa ānisaṃso vutto,
tika-s0102t:1235_17: Na hi anurodhavirodhādīhi upaddutassa bhāvanā ijjhati.
tika-s0102t:1236_0: Anupassīti etthāti “anupassī”ti etasmiṃ pade labbhamānāya anupassanāya anupassanājotanāya kammaṭṭhānaṃ vuttanti evamattho daṭṭhabbo,
tika-s0102t:1236_7: Kammaṭṭhānikassa hi kāyapariharaṇaṃ yāvadeva kammaṭṭhānaṃ pariharaṇatthanti.
tika-s0102t:1236_12: evañca katvā “viharatīti ettha vuttavihārenā”ti etthaggahaṇañca samatthitaṃ hoti “kāyānupassī viharatī”ti vihārassa visesetvā vuttattā.
tika-s0102t:1236_13: “Ātāpī”tiādi pana saṅkhepato vuttassa kammaṭṭhānapariharaṇassa saha sādhanena vitthāretvā dassanaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1236_20: sabbattha kammaṭṭhānānuyogassārakkhabhūtattā satisampajaññabalena avicchinnassa pariharitabbattā satisampajaññaggahaṇena tassa vuttatā vuttā.
tika-s0102t:1236_21: Satiyā vā samatho vutto tassā samādhikkhandhena saṅgahitattā.
tika-s0102t:1237_1: Tenāti saddatthaṃ anādiyitvā bhāvatthasseva vibhajanavasena pavattena vibhaṅgapāṭhena saha.
tika-s0102t:1237_2: Aṭṭhakathānayoti saddatthassāpi vivaraṇavasena yathārahaṃ vutto atthasaṃvaṇṇanānayo.
tika-s0102t:1237_4: adhippāyato ca avilomento aññadatthu saṃsandati sameti,
tika-s0102t:1238_0: Vedanādīnaṃ puna vacaneti ettha nissayapaccayabhāvavasena cittadhammānaṃ vedanāsannissitattā,
tika-s0102t:1238_1: pañcavokārabhave arūpadhammānaṃ rūpapaṭibaddhavuttito ca vedanāya kāyādianupassanāppasaṅgepi āpanne tato asammissato vavatthānaṃ dassanatthaṃ,
tika-s0102t:1238_5: atha kho vedanānupassī evāti vedanāsaṅkhāte vatthusmiṃ vedanānupassanākārasseva dassanena asammissato vavatthānaṃ dassitaṃ hoti.
tika-s0102t:1238_11: na tasmiṃ samaye itarā vedanā”ti vedanābhāvasāmaññe avatvā taṃ taṃ vedanaṃ vinibbhujjitvā dassanena ghanavinibbhogo dhuvabhāvaviveko dassito hoti,
tika-s0102t:1238_20: yathā nāma bālo amaṇisabhāvepi udakapubbuḷake maṇiākārānupassī hoti,
tika-s0102t:1238_27: Evaṃ citta dhammesupi yathārahaṃ punavacane payojanaṃ vattabbaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1239_0: Yo sukhaṃ dukkhato addāti yo bhikkhu sukhaṃ vedanaṃ vipariṇāmadukkhatāya “dukkhā”ti paññācakkhunā addakkhi.
tika-s0102t:1239_1: Dukkhaṃ addakkhi sallatoti dukkhaṃ vedanaṃ pīḷājananato,
tika-s0102t:1240_1: Taṃ dukkhasminti sabbaṃ taṃ vedayitaṃ dukkhasmiṃ antogadhaṃ pariyāpannaṃ vadāmi saṅkhāradukkhatānativattanato.
tika-s0102t:1240_3: vipariṇāmaṭhitiaññāṇadukkhatāya ca vuttattā tissopi ca sukhato,
tika-s0102t:1240_6: Sesanti yathāvuttaṃ sukhādivibhāgato sesaṃ sāmisanirāmisādibhedaṃ vedanānupassanāyaṃ vattabbaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1241_7: parittabhūmakādikiriyānānattassa tihetukāditabbhedassa vasena anupassitabbanti yojanā. Ādi-
tika-s0102t:1241_8: saddena savatthukāvatthukādinānattassa puggalattayasādhāraṇāditabbhedassa ca saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0102t:1241_11: Yaṃ vibhāvetuṃ abhidhamme“tasmiṃ kho pana samaye dhammā honti,
tika-s0102t:1241_14: tasmā tassa tassa puna pahānaṃ na vattabbaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1241_15: Na hi kilesā pahīyamānā ārammaṇavibhāgena pahīyanti anāgatānaṃyeva uppajjanārahānaṃ pahātabbattā,
tika-s0102t:1241_16: tasmā abhijjhādīnaṃ ekattha pahānaṃ vatvā itarattha na vattabbaṃ evāti imamatthaṃ dasseti “kāmañcetthā”tiādinā.
tika-s0102t:1241_17: Atha vā maggacittakkhaṇe ekattha pahīnaṃ sabbattha pahīnameva hotīti visuṃ visuṃ pahānaṃ na vattabbaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1241_20: na hi ekassa pahīnaṃ tato aññassa pahīnaṃ nāma hoti.
tika-s0102t:1241_24: Lokiyabhāvanāya ca kāye pahīnaṃ na vedanādīsu vikkhambhitaṃ hoti.
tika-s0102t:1241_26: paṭipakkhabhāvanāya suppahīnattā tattha sā “abhijjhādomanassassa appavattī”ti na vattabbā,
tika-s0102t:1241_28: Ekattha pahīnaṃ sesesupi pahīnaṃ hotīti lokuttarasatipaṭṭhānabhāvanaṃ,
tika-s0102t:1241_29: lokiyabhāvanāya vā sabbattha appavattimattaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1241_30: “Pañcapi khandhā upādānakkhandhā loko”ti hi vibhaṅgecatūsupi ṭhānesu vuttanti.
tika-s0102t:1245_3: Tato catubbidhasatipaṭṭhānato ekekaṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā kāyaṃ vibhajantoti pāṭhaseso.
tika-s0102t:1246_3: tena uddesavārena apākaṭaṃ niddesavārena vibhāviyamānaṃ visesaṃ joteti.
tika-s0102t:1246_4: Bāhirakesupi ito ekadesassa sambhavato sabbappakāraggahaṇaṃ kataṃ “sabbappakārakāyānupassanānibbattakassā”ti,
tika-s0102t:1246_5: tena ye ime ānāpānapabbādivasena āgatā cuddasappakārā,
tika-s0102t:1246_13: Tattha tathābhāvapaṭisedhanoti sabbappakārakāyānupassanānibbattakassa puggalassa aññasāsanassa nissayabhāvapaṭisedhano,
tika-s0102t:1246_20: Parappavādāti paresaṃ aññatitthiyānaṃ nānappakārā vādā titthāyatanāni.
tika-s0102t:1247_2: Dohanakāle yathā thanehi anavasesato khīraṃ na paggharati,
tika-s0102t:1247_8: Satiyāti sammadeva kammaṭṭhānassa sallakkhaṇavasena pavattāya satiyā.
tika-s0102t:1248_2: buddhasāvakānañca visesādhigamassa aññena kammaṭṭhānena adhigatavisesānaṃ diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārassa padaṭṭhānabhūtaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1249_1: Bhikkhu dīpisadiso araññe ekako viharitvā paṭipakkhanimmathanavasena icchitatthasādhanato phalamuttamanti sāmaññaphalaṃ sandhāya vadati.
tika-s0102t:1250_0: Addhānavasena pavattānaṃ assāsapassāsānaṃ vasena dīghaṃ vā assasanto,
tika-s0102t:1250_1: ittaravasena pavattānaṃ assāsapassāsānaṃ vasena rassaṃ vā assasantoti yojanā.
tika-s0102t:1250_3: tathābhūto vā hutvā tisso sikkhā pavattayato.
tika-s0102t:1250_9: Añño satto vā puggalo vā natthīti visuddhidiṭṭhi “tayidaṃ dhammamattaṃ,
tika-s0102t:1250_12: atha kho avijjādihetuka”nti addhāttayepi kaṅkhāvitaraṇena vitiṇṇakaṅkho.
tika-s0102t:1250_13: “Yaṃ kiñci bhikkhu rūpa”ntiādinā nayena kalāpasammasanavasena tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā.
tika-s0102t:1251_0: “Parassa vā assāsapassāsakāye”ti idaṃ sammasanavāravasenāyaṃ pāḷi pavattāti katvā vuttaṃ,
tika-s0102t:1251_1: samathavasena pana parassa assāsapassāsakāye appanānimittuppatti eva natthi.
tika-s0102t:1251_3: Aparāparaṃ sañcaraṇakāloti ajjhattabahiddhādhammesupi nirantaraṃ vā bhāvanāya pavattanakālo kathito.
tika-s0102t:1251_4: Ekasmiṃ kāle panidaṃ ubhayaṃ na labbhatīti “ajjhattaṃ,
tika-s0102t:1251_5: bahiddhā”ti ca vuttaṃ idaṃ dhammadvayaṃ ghaṭitaṃ ekasmiṃ kāle ekato ārammaṇabhāvena na labbhati,
tika-s0102t:1252_4: taṃ pana samudayadhammaṃ upamāya dassento “yathā nāmā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0102t:1252_9: evaṃ karajakāyādayopi assāsapassāsakāyasambandhino taṃnimittabhāvenāti “samudayadhammā kāyasmi”nti vattabbataṃ labhantīti vuttaṃ “samudaya…pe…
tika-s0102t:1252_12: saddo “jātidhammāna”ntiādīsu viyāti kāyassa paccayasamavāye uppajjanakapakatikāyānupassī vā “samudayadhammānupassī”ti vutto.
tika-s0102t:1252_14: Evañca katvā kāyasminti bhummavacanaṃ suṭṭhutaraṃ yujjati.
tika-s0102t:1253_0: Vayadhammānupassīti ettha ahetukattepi vināsassa yesaṃ hetudhammānaṃ abhāve yaṃ na hoti,
tika-s0102t:1253_1: tadabhāvo tassa abhāvassa hetu viya voharīyatīti upacārato karajakāyādiabhāvo assāsapassāsakāyassa vayakāraṇaṃ vutto.
tika-s0102t:1254_0: Ajjhattabahiddhānupassanā viya bhinnavatthuvisayatāya samudayavayadhammānupassanāpi ekakāle na labbhatīti
tika-s0102t:1254_3: saddo luttaniddiṭṭhoti “kāyova atthī”ti vatvā avadhāraṇena nivattitaṃ dassento “na satto”tiādimāha.
tika-s0102t:1254_8: tassa sattanikāyassa pūraṇato ca cavanupapajjanadhammatāya galanato ca “puggalo”ti,
tika-s0102t:1255_1: Satipamāṇatthāyāti kāyapariggāhikaṃ satiṃ pavattanasatiṃ paraṃ pamāṇaṃ pāpanatthāya.
tika-s0102t:1255_2: Imassa hi vuttanayena “atthi kāyo”ti aparāparuppattivasena paccupaṭṭhitā sati bhiyyoso mattāya tattha ñāṇassa,
tika-s0102t:1255_7: Tathābhūto ca loke kiñcipi “aha”nti vā “mama”nti vā gahetabbaṃ na passati,
tika-s0102t:1255_10: saddo heṭṭhā niddiṭṭhassa tādisassa atthassa abhāvato avuttasamuccayatthoti dassento “upari atthaṃ upādāyā”ti āha yathā “antamaso tiracchānagatāyapi,
tika-s0102t:1255_12: evanti pana niddiṭṭhākārassa paccāmasanaṃ nigamanavasena katanti āha “iminā pana…pe…
tika-s0102t:1256_3: tassāpi samuṭṭhāpikā eva nāma hoti tadabhāve abhāvatoti āha “tassā samuṭṭhāpikā purimataṇhā”ti,
tika-s0102t:1256_5: Taṃviññāṇabījataṃsantatisambhūto sabbopi lokiyo viññāṇappabandho “saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ” tveva vuccati suttantanayena.
tika-s0102t:1256_9: “Dukkhaparijānano”tiādi ekantato catukiccasādhanavaseneva ariyamaggassa pavattīti dassetuṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1259_5: Gacchanto vā hi satto kāyena kātabbakiriyaṃ karoti ṭhito vā nisinno vā nipanno vāti,
tika-s0102t:1259_14: gamanādigatavisesajānanaṃ pana adhippetanti taṃ vibhajitvā dassetuṃ “tattha kāma”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1259_18: Tato eva attasaññaṃ “atthi attā kārako vedako”ti evaṃ pavattaṃ viparītasaññaṃ na ugghāṭeti nāpaneti appaṭipakkhabhāvato,
tika-s0102t:1259_20: Evaṃ bhūtassa cassa kuto kammaṭṭhānādibhāvoti āha “kammaṭṭhānaṃ vā satipaṭṭhānabhāvanā vā na hotī”ti.
tika-s0102t:1260_3: Kassa gamananti tamevatthaṃ pariyāyantarena vadati sādhanaṃ,
tika-s0102t:1260_7: Kiṃ kāraṇāti pana paṭikkhittakattukāya gamanakiriyāya aviparītakāraṇapucchā.
tika-s0102t:1260_8: Idañhi gamanaṃ nāma attā manasā saṃyujjati,
tika-s0102t:1260_10: indriyāni attehīti evamādi micchākāraṇavinimuttaanurūpapaccayahetuko dhammānaṃ pavattiākāraviseso.
tika-s0102t:1261_0: Na koci satto vā puggalo vā gacchati dhammamattasseva gamanasiddhito,
tika-s0102t:1261_8: “Gacchatī”ti vatvā yathā pavattamāne kāye “gacchatī”ti vohāro hoti,
tika-s0102t:1262_0: “Eseva nayo”ti atidesena saṅkhepato vatvā tamatthaṃ vivarituṃ “tatrāpi hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1262_1: Koṭito paṭṭhāyāti heṭṭhimakoṭito paṭṭhāya pādatalato paṭṭhāya.
tika-s0102t:1263_0: Evaṃ pajānatoti evaṃ cittakiriyavāyodhātuvipphāreneva gamanādi hotīti pajānato.
tika-s0102t:1263_1: Tassa evaṃ pajānanāya nicchayagamanatthaṃ “evaṃ hotī”ti vicāraṇā vuccati loke yathābhūtaṃ ajānantehi micchābhinivesavasena,
tika-s0102t:1263_3: Atthi panāti attano evaṃ vīmaṃsanavasena pucchāvacanaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1264_0: Nāvā mālutavegenāti yathā acetanā nāvā vātavegena desantaraṃ yāti,
tika-s0102t:1264_1: yathā ca acetano tejanaṃ kaṇḍo jiyāvegena desantaraṃ yāti,
tika-s0102t:1264_2: tathā acetano kāyo vātāhato yathāvuttavāyunā nīto desantaraṃ yātīti evaṃ upamāsaṃsandanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1264_3: Sace pana koci vadeyya “yathā nāvātejanānaṃ pellakassa purisassa vasena desantaragamanaṃ,
tika-s0102t:1264_5: evaṃ icchito vāyamattho yathā hi nāvātejanānaṃ saṃhatalakkhaṇasseva purisassa vasena gamanaṃ,
tika-s0102t:1265_0: Tattha payuttanti heṭṭhā vuttanayena gamanādikiriyāvasena paccayehi payojitaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1265_5: Vajeti vajeyya gaccheyya ko nāmāti sambandho.
tika-s0102t:1265_7: saddoti hetupaccayavirahena ṭhānagamanapaṭikkhepamukhena sabbāyapi dhammappavattiyā paccayādhīnavuttitāvibhāvanena
tika-s0102t:1266_0: Paṇihitoti yathā yathā paccayehi pakārehi nihito ṭhapito.
tika-s0102t:1266_1: Sabbasaṅgāhikavacananti sabbesampi catunnaṃ iriyāpathānaṃ ekajjhaṃ saṅgaṇhanavacanaṃ,
tika-s0102t:1266_2: pubbe visuṃ visuṃ iriyāpathānaṃ vuttattā idaṃ nesaṃ ekajjhaṃ gahetvā vacananti attho.
tika-s0102t:1266_3: Purimanayo vā iriyāpathappadhāno vuttoti tattha kāyo appadhāno anunipphādīti idha kāyaṃ padhānaṃ,
tika-s0102t:1266_4: apadhānañca iriyāpathaṃ anunipphādiṃ katvā dassetuṃ dutiyanayo vuttoti evampettha dvinnaṃ nayānaṃ viseso veditabbo.
tika-s0102t:1267_0: Iriyāpathapariggaṇhanampi iriyāpathavato kāyasseva pariggaṇhanaṃ tassa avatthāvisesabhāvatoti vuttaṃ
tika-s0102t:1267_5: saddena yathā “taṇhāsamudayā kammasamudayā āhārasamudayā”ti nibbattilakkhaṇaṃ passantopi rūpakkhandhassa
tika-s0102t:1267_6: udayaṃ passatīti ime cattāro ākārā saṅgayhanti,
tika-s0102t:1267_7: evaṃ “avijjānirodhā”ti ādayopi pañca ākārā saṅgahitāti daṭṭhabbā.
tika-s0102t:1270_9: tasmā taṃtaṃsaṃvaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanāpi tattha vihitanayeneva gahetabbā.
tika-s0102t:1270_11: rūpakāyassevettha samudayadhammānupassitādi adhippetoti āha “rūpakkhandhasseva samudayo ca vayo ca nīharitabbo”ti.
tika-s0102t:1273_4: Antarenāpi hi bhāvavācinaṃ saddaṃ bhāvattho viññāyati yathā “paṭassa sukka”nti.
tika-s0102t:1274_0: Vatthādīhi pasibbakākārena bandhitvā kataṃ āvāṭanaṃ putoḷi.
tika-s0102t:1274_1: Nānākārā ekasmiṃ ṭhāne sammissāti ettāvatā nānāvaṇṇānaṃ kesādīnañca upameyyatā.
tika-s0102t:1274_2: Vibhūtakāloti paṇṇattiṃ samatikkamitvā kesādīnaṃ asubhākārassa upaṭṭhitakālo. Iti-
tika-s0102t:1274_3: saddassa ākāratthataṃ dassento “eva”nti vatvā taṃ ākāraṃ sarūpato dassento “kesādipariggaṇhanenā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0102t:1274_4: Kesādisaññitānañhi asucibhāvānaṃ paramaduggandhajegucchapaṭikkūlākārassa samudayato anupassanā idha kāyānupassanāti.
tika-s0102t:1277_1: Dhātumanasikāravasenāti pathavīdhātuādikā catasso dhātuyo ārabbha pavattabhāvanāmanasikāravasena,
tika-s0102t:1277_7: Antevāsikoti kammakaraṇavasena tassa samīpavāsī taṃ nissāya jīvanako.
tika-s0102t:1277_9: Mahāpathānaṃ vemajjhaṭṭhānasaṅkhāteti catunnaṃ mahāpathānaṃ tāya eva vinivijjhanaṭṭhānatāya vemajjhasaṅkhāte.
tika-s0102t:1277_10: Yasmā te cattāro mahāpathā catūhi disāhi āgantvā tattha samohitā viya honti,
tika-s0102t:1277_14: saddassa vā gatinivattiatthatāya aññattha ṭhapetvā gamanaṃ sesairiyāpathasamaṅgitāya bodhako,
tika-s0102t:1277_15: idha pana yathā tathā rūpakāyassa pavattiākārabodhako adhippetoti āha “catunnaṃ iriyāpathānaṃ yena kenaci ākārena ṭhitattā yathā ṭhita”nti.
tika-s0102t:1277_17: Ṭhānādayo hi iriyāpathasaṅkhātāya kiriyāya patho pavattimaggoti “iriyāpatho”ti vuccantīti vutto vāyamattho.
tika-s0102t:1277_19: yathāvuttaṃ ṭhānamevettha paṇidhānanti adhippetanti āha “yathā ṭhitattā ca yathāpaṇihita”nti.
tika-s0102t:1277_22: “Ṭhita”nti vā kāyasaṅkhātānaṃ rūpadhammānaṃ tasmiṃ tasmiṃ khaṇe sakiccavasena avaṭṭhānaparidīpanaṃ,
tika-s0102t:1277_23: paṇihitanti paccayavasena tehi tehi paccayehi pakārato nihitaṃ paṇihitanti evampettha attho veditabbo.
tika-s0102t:1278_0: Idāni vuttamevatthaṃ bhāvatthavibhāvanavasena dassetuṃ “yathā goghātakassā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1278_5: Gāvīti saññā na antaradhāyatīti yāni aṅgapaccaṅgāni yathāsanniviṭṭhāni upādāya gāvīsamaññā matamattāyapi gāviyā tesaṃ taṃsannivesassa avinaṭṭhattā.
tika-s0102t:1278_6: Vilīyanti bhijjanti vibhujjantīti bīlā, bhāgā va-
tika-s0102t:1278_11: tato vā vivecitaṃ maṃsaṃ bhāgaso katvā.
tika-s0102t:1278_15: Dhātuso paccavekkhatoti ghanavinibbhogakaraṇena dhātuṃ dhātuṃ pathavīādidhātuṃ visuṃ visuṃ katvā paccavekkhantassa.
tika-s0102t:1278_17: vohāravasena pavattasattasaññāyapi tadā antaradhānaṃ yuttameva yāthāvato ghanavinibbhogassa sampādanato.
tika-s0102t:1278_18: Evañhi sati yathāvuttaopammatthena upameyyattho aññadatthu saṃsandati sameti.
tika-s0102t:1278_20: Dakkhoti cheko taṃtaṃsamaññāya kusalo “yathājāte sūnasmiṃ naṅguṭṭhakhuravisāṇādivante aṭṭhimaṃsādiavayavasamudāye avibhatte gāvīsamaññā,
tika-s0102t:1278_23: Catumahāpatho viya catuiriyāpathoti gāviyā ṭhitacatumahāpatho viya kāyassa pavattimaggabhūto catubbidho iriyāpatho yasmā visuddhimagge vitthāritā,
tika-s0102t:1281_5: Uddhaṃ jīvitapariyādānāti jīvitakkhayato upari maraṇato paraṃ.
tika-s0102t:1281_13: Kucchitaṃ vinīlanti vinīlakanti kucchanattho vā ayaṃ ka-
tika-s0102t:1281_14: kāroti dassetuṃ vuttaṃ yathā “pāpako kittisaddo abbhuggacchatī”ti.
tika-s0102t:1282_0: So bhikkhūti yo “passeyya sarīraṃ sivathikāya chaḍḍita”nti vutto,
tika-s0102t:1282_7: Evaṃ pūtikasabhāvoyevāti evaṃ ativiya duggandhajegucchapaṭikkūlapūbhikasabhāvo eva,
tika-s0102t:1282_8: na āyuādīnaṃ avigame viya mattasoti adhippāyo.
tika-s0102t:1282_9: Ediso bhavissatīti evaṃbhāvīti āha “evaṃ uddhumātādibhedo bhavissatī”ti.
tika-s0102t:1283_1: Sāvasesamaṃsalohitayuttanti sabbaso akhāditattā tahaṃ tahaṃ sesena appāvasesena maṃsalohitena yuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1283_2: “Aññena hatthaṭṭhika”nti avisesena hatthaṭṭhikānaṃ vippakiṇṇatā jotitāti anavasesato tesaṃ vippakiṇṇataṃ dassento “catusaṭṭhibhedampī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0102t:1284_1: tāni pana saṃvaccharaṃ vītivattāni hontīti āha “atikkantasaṃvaccharānī”ti.
tika-s0102t:1284_2: Purāṇatāya ghanabhāvavigamena vicuṇṇatā idha pūtibhāvoti so yathā hoti,
tika-s0102t:1284_5: Khajjamānatādivasena dutiyasivathikapabbādīnaṃ vavatthāpitattā vuttaṃ “khajjamānatādīnaṃ vasena yojanā kātabbā”ti.
tika-s0102t:1286_0: Imāneva dveti avadhāraṇena appanākammaṭṭhānaṃ tattha niyameti aññapabbesu tadabhāvato.
tika-s0102t:1286_3: tena pabbadvayassa vipassanākammaṭṭhānatāpi appaṭisiddhā daṭṭhabbā aniccatādidassanato.
tika-s0102t:1286_4: Saṅkhāresu ādīnavavibhāvanāni sivathikapabbānīti āha “sivathikānaṃ ādīnavānupassanāvasena vuttattā”ti.
tika-s0102t:1286_5: Iriyāpathapabbādīnaṃ appanāvahatā pākaṭā evāti “sesāni dvādasapī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1290_3: Dhammavinimuttassa kattu abhāvato dhammasseva kattubhāvaṃ dassento “vedanāva vedayatī”ti āha.
tika-s0102t:1290_4: “Vohāramattaṃ hotī”ti etena “sukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedayamāno sukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedayāmī”ti idaṃ vohāramattanti dasseti.
tika-s0102t:1291_0: Nitthunantoti balavato vedanāvegassa nirodhane ādīnavaṃ disvā tassa avasaradānavasena nitthunanto.
tika-s0102t:1291_1: Vegasandhāraṇe hi atimahantaṃ dukkhaṃ uppajjatīti aññampi vikāraṃ uppādeyya,
tika-s0102t:1291_3: Vīriyasamathaṃ yojetvāti adhivāsanavīriyassa adhimattattā tassa hāpanavasena samādhinā samarasatāpādanena vīriyasamathaṃ yojetvā.
tika-s0102t:1291_7: Lokiyānampi vā sati uppattikāle tattha samatthataṃ sandhāyāha “saha paṭisambhidāhī”ti.
tika-s0102t:1292_1: evaṃ dukkhanti yathā “sukhaṃ ko vedayatī”tiādinā sampajānavediyanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-s0102t:1292_15: “Na pākaṭaṃ hotī”ti ca idaṃ tādise puggale sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-s0102t:1292_16: tesaṃ ādito vedanāva vibhūtatarā hutvā upaṭṭhāti.
tika-s0102t:1292_17: Evañhi yaṃ vuttaṃ sakkapañhavaṇṇanā dīsu “phasso pākaṭo hoti,
tika-s0102t:1292_20: Vedanāvasena kathiyamānaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ pākaṭaṃ hotīti yojanā.
tika-s0102t:1292_21: “Vedanānaṃ uppattipākaṭatāyā”ti ca idaṃ sukhadukkhavedanānaṃ vasena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1292_24: Tadubhayaggahaṇamukhena vā gahetabbattā itarāyapi pavatti viññūnaṃ pākaṭā evāti “vedanāna”nti avisesaggahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1292_26: tasmā tattha vattabbo atthaviseso tattha līnatthappakāsaniyaṃ vuttanayeneva gahetabbo.
tika-s0102t:1293_0: Pubbe “vatthuṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā vedanāva vedayatī”ti vedanāya ārammaṇādhīnavuttitāya ca anattatāya ca pajānanaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-s0102t:1293_1: idāni tassā aniccatādipajānanaṃ dassento “ayaṃ aparopi pajānanapariyāyo”ti āha.
tika-s0102t:1293_2: Yathā ekasmiṃ khaṇe cittadvayassa asambhavo ekajjhaṃ anekantapaccayābhāvato,
tika-s0102t:1293_3: evaṃ vedanādvayassa visiṭṭhārammaṇavuttito cāti āha “sukhavedanākkhaṇe dukkhāya vedanāya abhāvato”ti.
tika-s0102t:1293_5: tena sukhavedanākkhaṇe bhūtapubbānaṃ itaravedanānaṃ hutvāabhāvapajānanena sukhavedanāyapi hutvā abhāvo
tika-s0102t:1293_6: ñāto eva hotīti tassā pākaṭabhāvameva dassento “imissā ca sukhāya vedanāya ito paṭhamaṃ abhāvato”ti āha,
tika-s0102t:1293_7: eteneva ca tāsampi vedanānaṃ pākaṭabhāvo dassitoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1293_9: Aniccaggahaṇena hi vedanānaṃ viddhaṃsanabhāvo dassito viddhaste aniccatāya suviññeyyattā.
tika-s0102t:1293_13: pageva itarāti tissannampi vedanānaṃ dukkhatā dassitā hoti.
tika-s0102t:1293_15: taṃ ekantato anattā”ti tīsupi vedanāsu lakkhaṇattayapajānanā jotitāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1294_1: Tattha neva tasmiṃ samaye dukkhaṃ vedanaṃ vedetīti tasmiṃ sukhavedanāsamaṅgisamaye neva dukkhaṃ vedanaṃ vedeti niruddhattā,
tika-s0102t:1294_7: Khayavayapalujjananirujjhanapakatitāya khayadhammā vayadhammā virāgadhammā nirodhadhammāti daṭṭhabbā.
tika-s0102t:1296_0: Ito paranti “atthi vedanā”ti evamādi pāḷiṃ sandhāyāha “kāyānupassanāyaṃ vuttanayamevā”ti.
tika-s0102t:1299_3: Vītarāganti ettha kāmaṃ sarāgapadapaṭiyoginā vītarāgapadena bhavitabbaṃ,
tika-s0102t:1299_4: sammasanacārassa pana adhippetattā tebhūmakasseva gahaṇanti “lokiyakusalābyākata”nti vatvā “idaṃ panā”tiādinā tameva adhippāyaṃ vivarati.
tika-s0102t:1299_8: taṃnimittakatāya pana siyā taṃsahitakāle soti nattheva vītarāgatāpīti dukkhavinimuttatā evettha labbhatīti
tika-s0102t:1299_13: Ye pana “paṭipakkhabhāve agayhamāne sampayogābhāvo evettha pamāṇaṃ ekaccaabyākatānaṃ viyā”ti icchanti,
tika-s0102t:1299_16: Akusalamūlesu saha moheneva vattatīti samohanti āha “vicikicchāsahagatañceva uddhaccasahagatañcā”ti.
tika-s0102t:1299_17: Yasmā cettha “saheva mohenāti samoha”nti purimapadāvadhāraṇampi labbhatiyeva,
tika-s0102t:1299_19: Yathā pana atimūḷhatāya pāṭipuggalikanayena savisesamohavantatāya “momūhacitta”nti vattabbato vicikicchāuddhaccasahagatadvayaṃ
tika-s0102t:1299_25: Paccayavisesavasena thāmajātena uddhaccena sahagataṃ saṃsaṭṭhanti uddhaccasahagataṃ,
tika-s0102t:1299_27: Pasaṭacittaṃ nāma ārammaṇe savisesaṃ vikkhepavasena visaṭabhāvena pavattanato.
tika-s0102t:1300_0: Kilesavikkhambhanasamatthatāya vipulaphalatāya ca dīghasantānatāya ca mahantabhāvaṃ gataṃ,
tika-s0102t:1300_1: mahantehi vā uḷāracchandādīhi gataṃ paṭipannanti mahaggataṃ,
tika-s0102t:1300_2: taṃ pana rūpārūpabhūmigataṃ tato mahantassa loke abhāvato.
tika-s0102t:1300_4: Tassa cettha paṭiyogī parittaṃ evāti āha “amahaggatanti kāmāvacara”nti.
tika-s0102t:1300_5: Attānaṃ uttarituṃ samatthehi saha uttarehīti sauttaraṃ.
tika-s0102t:1300_18: taṃ ubhayavimuttirahitanti gayhamāne lokuttaracittepi siyāsaṅkāti taṃ nivattanatthaṃ “samuccheda…pe…
tika-s0102t:1304_1: Pahātabbādidhammavibhāgadassanavasena pañcadhā dhammānupassanā niddiṭṭhāti ayamattho pāḷito eva viññāyatīti
tika-s0102t:1304_5: Yesañhi veneyyānaṃ pahātabbadhammesu paṭhamaṃ nīvaraṇāni vibhāgena vattabbāni,
tika-s0102t:1304_6: tesaṃ vasenettha bhagavatā paṭhamaṃ nīvaraṇesu dhammānupassanā kathitā.
tika-s0102t:1304_11: tasmā cettha samathabhāvanāpi yāvadeva vipassanatthā icchitā.
tika-s0102t:1304_13: vipassanābahulā ca satipaṭṭhānadesanāti tassā vipassanābhinivesavibhāgena desitabhāvaṃ vibhāvento “apicā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0102t:1305_3: so pana “kāmacchandassa uppādo hotī”ti vuttattā kāmacchandassa kāraṇākārova,
tika-s0102t:1306_3: tenākārena pavattanakassa aññassa kāmacchandassa nimittattā “nimitta”nti ca. Iṭṭhaṃ,
tika-s0102t:1306_5: Ākaṅkhitassa hitasukhassa pattiyā anupāyabhūto manasikāro anupāyamanasikāro.
tika-s0102t:1306_9: Āhāroti paccayo attano phalaṃ āharatīti katvā.
tika-s0102t:1307_1: taṃ pana dasasu aviññāṇakaasubhesu ca kesādīsu saviññāṇakaasubhesu ca pavattaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1307_4: yonisomanasikārassa ca gahaṇaṃ niravasesadassanatthaṃ katanti daṭṭhabbaṃ,
tika-s0102t:1308_4: “Bhojane mattaññuno mitāhārassa thinamiddhābhibhavābhāvā otāraṃ alabhamāno kāmacchando pahīyatī”ti vadanti,
tika-s0102t:1308_7: tabbipariṇāmassa tadādhārassa tassa ca upanissayabhūtassa ativiya jegucchataṃ,
tika-s0102t:1308_9: so sabbaso bhojane pamāṇassa jānanena bhojanemattaññū nāma.
tika-s0102t:1309_2: Ito paresupi evarūpesu ṭhānesu eseva nayo.
tika-s0102t:1310_0: Paṭighampi purimuppannaṃ paṭighanimittaṃ parato uppajjanakassa paṭighassa kāraṇanti katvā.
tika-s0102t:1311_6: “Cetovimuttī”ti vutte appanāva vaṭṭati appanaṃ appattāya paṭipakkhato suṭṭhu muccanassa abhāvato.
tika-s0102t:1312_0: Sattesu mettāyanassa hitūpasaṃhārassa uppādanaṃ pavattanaṃ mettānimittassa uggaho,
tika-s0102t:1312_1: paṭhamuppanno mettāmanasikāro parato uppajjanakassa kāraṇabhāvato mettāmanasikārova mettānimittaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1312_5: Dosamettāsu yāthāvato ādīnavānisaṃsānaṃ paṭisaṅkhānaṃ vīmaṃsā idha paṭisaṅkhānaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1312_12: Vihārādiuddesarahitaṃ puratthimādidisāvasena anodissakadisāpharaṇanti evaṃ dvidhā uggahaṇaṃ sandhāya “odissakaanodissakadisāpharaṇāna”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1312_15: Tattha sabbe sattā, pāṇā, bhūtā, puggalā,
tika-s0102t:1312_19: sukhī attānaṃ pariharantūti catudhā pavattito vīsatividhā anodissakapharaṇā mettā.
tika-s0102t:1312_20: Sabbā itthiyo, purisā, ariyā, anariyā, devā, manussā,
tika-s0102t:1312_24: ekekāya vā disāya sattādiitthādiaverādibhedena asītādhikacatusatappabhedā ca odhiso pharaṇā veditabbā.
tika-s0102t:1314_1: tappaṭipakkhānaṃ visosanasabhāvatāya ca ārambhadhātuādito pavattavīriyanti āha “paṭhamārambhavīriya”nti.
tika-s0102t:1314_5: Yasmā pana aparāparuppattiyā laddhāsevanaṃ uparūpari visesaṃ āvahantaṃ ativiya thāmagatameva hoti,
tika-s0102t:1314_6: tasmā vuttaṃ “paraṃ paraṃ ṭhānaṃ akkamanato tatopi balavatara”nti.
tika-s0102t:1315_1: ettake bhutte taṃ bhojanaṃ thinamiddhassa kāraṇaṃ hoti,
tika-s0102t:1315_2: ettake na hotīti thinamiddhassa kāraṇākāraṇagāho hotīti attho.
tika-s0102t:1315_4: tasmā “ettake bhutte taṃ bhojanaṃ thinamiddhassa kāraṇaṃ na hotī”ti bhojane mattaññutā ca atthato dassitāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1315_7: Divā sūriyālokanti divā gahitanimittaṃ sūriyālokaṃ rattiyaṃ manasi karontassāpīti evamettha attho veditabbo.
tika-s0102t:1316_0: Kukkuccampi katākatānusocanavasena pavattamānaṃ cetaso avūpasamāvahatāya uddhaccena samānalakkhaṇamevāti “avūpasamo nāma avūpasantākāro,
tika-s0102t:1317_1: atthato ca suttādīni vicārentassa tabbahulavihārino atthavedādipaṭilābhasabbhāvato vikkhepo na hotīti,
tika-s0102t:1317_7: Vuddhasevitā ca vuddhasīlitaṃ āvahatīti cetovūpasamakarattā uddhaccakukkuccappahānakārī vuttā.
tika-s0102t:1317_8: Vuddhattaṃ pana anapekkhitvā kukkuccavinodakā vinayadharā kalyāṇamittā vuttāti daṭṭhabbā.
tika-s0102t:1317_9: Vikkhepo ca pabbajitānaṃ yebhuyyena kukkuccahetuko hotīti “kappiyākappiyaparipucchābahulassā”tiādinā vinayanayeneva paripucchakatādayo niddiṭṭhā.
tika-s0102t:1317_11: Kukkuccassa domanassasahagatattā anāgāmimaggena āyatiṃ anuppādo vutto.
tika-s0102t:1318_0: Tiṭṭhati pavattati etthāti ṭhānīyā vicikicchāya ṭhānīyā vicikicchāṭhānīyā,
tika-s0102t:1318_5: Sā hi purimuppannā parato uppajjanakavicikicchāya sabhāgahetutāya asādhāraṇaṃ kāraṇaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1319_9: Kusalā vā hīnehi chandādīhi āraddhā hīnā,
tika-s0102t:1319_18: Atha vā kaṇhasukkā ca sappaṭibhāgā ca kaṇhasukkasappaṭibhāgā.
tika-s0102t:1319_19: Sukhā hi vedanā dukkhāya vedanāya sappaṭibhāgā,
tika-s0102t:1319_20: dukkhā ca vedanā sukhāya vedanāya sappaṭibhāgāti.
tika-s0102t:1320_0: Kāmaṃ bāhusaccaparipucchakatāhi sabbāpi aṭṭhavatthukā vicikicchā pahīyati,
tika-s0102t:1320_1: tathāpi ratanattayavicikicchāmūlikā sesavicikicchāti katvā āha “tīṇi ratanāni ārabbhā”ti.
tika-s0102t:1320_3: Vinaye pakataññutā “sikkhāya kaṅkhatī”ti vuttāya vicikicchāya pahānaṃ karotīti āha “vinaye ciṇṇavasībhāvassāpī”ti.
tika-s0102t:1324_0: 383. Upādānehi ārammaṇakaraṇādivasena upādātabbā vā khandhā upādānakkhandhā.
tika-s0102t:1325_3: Tayidaṃ sarūpaggahaṇabhāvato anavasesapariyādānaṃ hotīti āha “ettakaṃ rūpaṃ,
tika-s0102t:1325_6: tasmā “iti rūpa”nti iminā bhūtupādādivasena yattako rūpassa pabhedo,
tika-s0102t:1325_7: tena saddhiṃ rūpaṃ anavasesato pariyādiyitvā dasseti.
tika-s0102t:1325_12: na ito paraṃ vedanā atthīti sabhāvato vedanaṃ pajānātī”tiādinā,
tika-s0102t:1328_1: Chasu ajjhattikabāhiresūti “chasu ajjhattikesu chasu bāhiresū”ti “chasū”ti padaṃ paccekaṃ yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1328_4: Cakkhuviññāṇavīthiyā pariyāpannassa hi viññāṇakāyassa cakkhāyatanameva uppattidvāraṃ,
tika-s0102t:1328_18: Rūpayati vaṇṇavikāraṃ āpajjamānaṃ hadayaṅgatabhāvaṃ pakāsetīti rūpaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1328_19: Sappati attano paccayehi harīyati sotaviññeyyabhāvaṃ gamīyatīti saddo.
tika-s0102t:1329_0: Cakkhuñca pajānātīti ettha cakkhu nāma pasādacakkhu,
tika-s0102t:1329_3: Yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “yaṃ cakkhu catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ upādāya pasādo”ti. ca-
tika-s0102t:1329_5: Yāthāvasarasalakkhaṇavasenāti aviparītassa attano rasassa ceva lakkhaṇassa ca vasena,
tika-s0102t:1329_6: rūpesu āviñchanakiccassa ceva rūpābhighātārahabhūtapasādalakkhaṇassa ca daṭṭhukāmatānidānakammasamuṭṭhānabhūtapasādalakkhaṇassa ca vasenāti attho.
tika-s0102t:1329_7: Atha vā yāthāvasarasalakkhaṇavasenāti yāthāvasarasavasena ceva lakkhaṇavasena ca,
tika-s0102t:1329_9: So hi rasīyati aviraddhapaṭivedhavasena assādīyati ramīyatīti “raso”ti vuccati,
tika-s0102t:1330_0: “Cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇa”ntiādīsu samuditāniyeva rūpāyatanāni cakkhuviññāṇuppattihetu,
tika-s0102t:1330_1: na visuṃ visunti imassa atthassa jotanatthaṃ “rūpe cā”ti puthuvacanaggahaṇaṃ,
tika-s0102t:1330_2: tāya eva ca desanāgatiyā kāmaṃ idhāpi “rūpe ca pajānātī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0102t:1330_3: rūpabhāvasāmaññena pana sabbaṃ ekajjhaṃ gahetvā bahiddhā catusamuṭṭhānikarūpañcāti ekavacanavasena attho.
tika-s0102t:1330_4: Sarasalakkhaṇa vasenāti cakkhuviññāṇassa visayabhāvakiccassa vasena ceva cakkhupaṭihananalakkhaṇassa vasena cāti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1331_3: nippariyāyakathā nāma abhidhammasannissitā evāti abhidhammanayeneva saṃyojanāni dassento “kāmarāga…pe…
tika-s0102t:1331_6: kāmo ca so rāgo cāti vā kāmarāgo.
tika-s0102t:1331_9: taṃ puggalaṃ vaṭṭasmiṃ saṃyojeti bandhati iti dukkhena sattaṃ,
tika-s0102t:1331_11: kammunā vā vipākaṃ saṃyojeti bandhatīti saṃyojanaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1331_13: Sarasalakkhaṇavasenāti ettha pana sattassa vaṭṭato anissajjanasaṅkhātassa attano kiccassa ceva yathāvuttabandhanasaṅkhātassa
tika-s0102t:1332_3: Padadvayenāpi balavato kāmarāgassa paccayabhūtā kāmarāguppatti vuttā.
tika-s0102t:1332_5: Aniṭṭhārammaṇeti ettha “āpāthagate”ti vibhattivipariṇāmanavasena “āpāthagata”nti padaṃ ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1332_6: Etaṃ ārammaṇanti etaṃ evaṃsukhumaṃ evaṃdubbibhāgaṃ ārammaṇaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1332_11: Attattaniyādigāhānugatā hi vicikicchā diṭṭhiyā asati abhāvato.
tika-s0102t:1332_12: Bhavaṃ patthentassāti “īdise sampattibhave yasmā amhākaṃ idaṃ iṭṭhaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ sulabhaṃ jātaṃ,
tika-s0102t:1332_14: ito vā uttaritaro sampattibhavo bhaveyyā”ti bhavaṃ nikāmentassa.
tika-s0102t:1332_17: Bhavati hi taṃsadisesu tabbohāro yathā “sā eva tittirī,
tika-s0102t:1332_20: Aññassa maccharāyatoti aññena asādhāraṇabhāvakaraṇena macchariyaṃ karoto.
tika-s0102t:1333_0: Tañca kāraṇanti subhanimittapaṭighanimittādivibhāgaṃ iṭṭhāniṭṭhādirūpārammaṇañceva tajjāyonisomanasikārañcāti tassa tassa saṃyojanassa kāraṇaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1333_4: Tañhi tassa tadaṅgavasena ceva vikkhambhanavasena ca pahānakāraṇaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1333_6: Yadi evaṃ “tiṇṇaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā sotāpanno hotī”ti suttapadaṃ kathanti?
tika-s0102t:1333_9: ayaṃ pana abhidhammanayena saṃvaṇṇanāti nāyaṃ dosoti.
tika-s0102t:1333_13: Uddhaccasaṃyojanassapettha anuppādo vuttoyevāti daṭṭhabbo yathāvuttasaṃyojanehi avinābhāvato.
tika-s0102t:1333_15: tappaccayānaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ uppādādipajānanā ca vuttanayeneva veditabbāti dassento “eseva nayo”ti atidisati.
tika-s0102t:1334_3: Evañca anavasesato saparasantānesu āyatanānaṃ pariggaho siddho hoti.
tika-s0102t:1334_4: Parassa vā dhammesūti etthāpi eseva nayo.
tika-s0102t:1334_5: Rūpāyatanassāti aḍḍhekādasappabhedassa rūpasabhāvassa āyatanassa rūpakkhandhe “vuttanayena nīharitabbo”ti ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1334_7: Vuttanayenāti iminā atidesena rūpakkhandhe “āhārasamudayā”ti viññāṇakkhandhe “nāmarūpasamudayā”ti sesakhandhesu
tika-s0102t:1334_9: itaraṃ pana sabbattha samānanti khandhapabbe viya āyatanapabbepi lokuttaranivattanaṃ pāḷiyaṃ gahitaṃ natthīti vuttaṃ “lokuttaradhammā na gahetabbā”ti.
tika-s0102t:1337_5: Udayavayañāṇuppattito paṭṭhāya sambodhipaṭipadāyaṃ ṭhito nāma hotīti āha “āraddhavipassakato paṭṭhāya yogāvacaroti sambodhī”ti.
tika-s0102t:1337_7: ayañca satipaṭṭhānadesanā lokiyamaggavasena pavattāti vuttaṃ “yogāvacaroti sambodhī”ti,
tika-s0102t:1339_2: Taṃ sabbattha satokārībhāvāvahattā satisambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya hoti.
tika-s0102t:1339_4: anurūpadhammasevanā ca anuppannānaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ uppādāya hoti,
tika-s0102t:1339_7: tattha ca yuttappayuttatā satisambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya hotīti imamatthaṃ dasseti “satisampajañña”ntiādinā.
tika-s0102t:1339_9: yo bodhimaṇḍe suvaṇṇasalākaṃ gahetvā “aṭṭhārasasu bhāsāsu katarabhāsāya dhammaṃ kathemī”ti parisaṃ pavāresi.
tika-s0102t:1340_6: Tattha yonisomanasikārabahulīkāroti kusalādīnaṃ taṃtaṃsabhāvasarasalakkhaṇaādikassa yāthāvato avabujjhanavasena uppanno ñāṇasampayuttacittuppādo.
tika-s0102t:1341_1: Ācariye payirupāsitvā pañcapi nikāye saha aṭṭhakathāya pariyogāhetvā yaṃ yaṃ tattha gaṇṭhiṭṭhānabhūtaṃ,
tika-s0102t:1341_3: imassa ko attho”ti khandhāyatanādiatthaṃ pucchantassa dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo uppajjati.
tika-s0102t:1341_6: Vatthūnaṃ visadabhāvakaraṇanti ettha cittacetasikānaṃ pavattiṭṭhānabhāvato sarīraṃ,
tika-s0102t:1341_12: Sedamalamakkhitanti sedena ceva jallikāsaṅkhātena sarīramalena ca makkhitaṃ. Ca-
tika-s0102t:1341_21: Te hi cittuppādā cittekaggatāya aparisuddhabhāvāya saṃvattanti.
tika-s0102t:1341_26: atha kho tasmiṃ aparisuddhe ñāṇampi aparisuddhaṃ hotīti nissayāparisuddhiyā taṃnissitāparisuddhi viya
tika-s0102t:1342_7: Kosajjapakkhe patituṃ adatvā sampayuttadhammānaṃ paggaṇhanaṃ anubalappadānaṃ paggaho,
tika-s0102t:1342_15: Rūpagataṃ viya cakkhunā yena yāthāvato visayasabhāvaṃ passati,
tika-s0102t:1342_17: Kātuṃ na sakkoti balavatā saddhindriyena abhibhūtattā.
tika-s0102t:1342_18: Sahajātadhammesu hi indaṭṭhaṃ kārentānaṃ sahapavattamānānaṃ dhammānaṃ ekarasatāvaseneva atthasiddhi,
tika-s0102t:1342_22: Dhammasabhāvapaccavekkhaṇenāti yassa saddheyyassa vatthuno uḷāratādiguṇe adhimuccanassa sātisayappavattiyā saddhindriyaṃ balavaṃ jātaṃ,
tika-s0102t:1342_24: Evañhi evaṃdhammatānayena sabhāvasarasato pariggayhamāne savipphāro adhimokkho na hoti “ayaṃ imesaṃ dhammānaṃ
tika-s0102t:1342_26: Dhuriyadhammesu hi yathā saddhāya balavabhāve paññāya mandabhāvo hoti,
tika-s0102t:1342_27: evaṃ paññāya balavabhāve saddhāya mandabhāvo hotīti.
tika-s0102t:1342_31: Tathā amanasikārenāti yenākārena bhāvanaṃ anuyuñjantassa saddhindriyaṃ balavaṃ jātaṃ,
tika-s0102t:1342_33: Idha duvidhena saddhindriyassa balavabhāvo attano vā paccayavisesena kiccuttariyato,
tika-s0102t:1342_36: Dutiyakappe pana yathā manasi karoto vīriyādīnaṃ mandakiccatāya saddhindriyaṃ balavaṃ jātaṃ,
tika-s0102t:1342_38: vīriyādīnaṃ paṭukiccabhāvāvahena manasikārena saddhindriyaṃ tehi samarasaṃ karontena hāpetabbaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1343_1: So hi āyasmā saddhādhimuttatāya katādhikāro satthu rūpakāyadassanappasuto eva hutvā viharanto satthārā “kiṃ te vakkali iminā pūtikāyena diṭṭhena,
tika-s0102t:1343_3: so maṃ passatī”tiādinā ovaditvā kammaṭṭhāne niyojitopi taṃ ananuyuñjanto paṇāmito attānaṃ vinipātetuṃ papātaṭṭhānaṃ abhiruhi,
tika-s0102t:1343_4: atha naṃ satthā yathānisinnova obhāsaṃ vissajjanena attānaṃ dassetvā –
tika-s0102t:1346_1: So tena amateneva abhisitto haṭṭhatuṭṭho hutvā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapesi.
tika-s0102t:1346_3: taṃ ñatvā bhagavā tassa indriyasamattapaṭipādanāya kammaṭṭhānaṃ sodhetvā adāsi.
tika-s0102t:1346_4: So satthārā dinnanaye ṭhatvā vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā maggappaṭipāṭiyā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
tika-s0102t:1347_3: Hāpetabbanti yathā saddhindriyassa balavabhāvo dhammasabhāvapaccavekkhaṇena hāyati,
tika-s0102t:1347_4: evaṃ vīriyindriyassa adhimattatā passaddhiādibhāvanāya hāyati samādhipakkhiyattā tassā.
tika-s0102t:1347_5: Tathā hi samādhindriyassa adhimattataṃ kosajjapātato rakkhantī vīriyādibhāvanā viya vīriyindriyassa adhimattataṃ
tika-s0102t:1347_9: so hi āyasmā satthu santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā sītavane viharanto “mama sarīraṃ sukhumālaṃ,
tika-s0102t:1347_10: na ca sakkā sukheneva sukhaṃ adhigantuṃ,
tika-s0102t:1347_11: kilametvāpi samaṇadhammo kātabbo”ti taṃ ṭhānacaṅkamameva adhiṭṭhāya padhānaṃ anuyuñjanto pādatalesu phoṭesu
tika-s0102t:1347_12: uṭṭhitesupi vedanaṃ ajjhupekkhitvā daḷhaṃ vīriyaṃ karonto accāraddhavīriyatāya visesaṃ nibbattetuṃ nāsakkhi.
tika-s0102t:1347_13: Satthā tattha gantvā vīṇūpamovādena ovaditvā vīriyasamatāyojanavīthiṃ dassento kammaṭṭhānaṃ sodhetvā gijjhakūṭaṃ gato.
tika-s0102t:1347_14: Theropi satthārā dinnanayena vīriyasamataṃ yojetvā bhāvento vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā arahatte patiṭṭhāsi.
tika-s0102t:1348_2: Yathā hi saddhāpaññānaṃ visuṃ visuṃ dhuriyadhammabhūtānaṃ kiccato aññamaññaṃ nātivattanaṃ visesato icchitabbaṃ,
tika-s0102t:1348_4: evaṃ samādhivīriyānaṃ kosajjuddhaccapakkhikānaṃ samarasatāya sati aññamaññūpatthambhanato sampayuttadhammānaṃ
tika-s0102t:1348_7: Tassattho yo balavatiyā saddhāya samannāgato avisadañāṇo,
tika-s0102t:1348_10: Tathā hi avatthusmiṃ pasīdati seyyathāpi titthiyasāvakā.
tika-s0102t:1348_12: Saddhāhīnāya paññāya atidhāvanto “deyyavatthupariccāgena vinā cittuppādamattenapi dānamayaṃ puññaṃ hotī”tiādīni parikappeti hetupatirūpakehi vañcito,
tika-s0102t:1348_13: evaṃbhūto ca sukkhatakkaviluttacitto paṇḍitānaṃ vacanaṃ nādiyati saññattiṃ na gacchati.
tika-s0102t:1348_15: Yathā cettha saddhāpaññānaṃ aññamaññaṃ visamabhāvo na atthāvaho,
tika-s0102t:1349_3: Saddahantoti “pathavī pathavīti manasikaraṇamattena kathaṃ jhānuppattī”ti acintetvā “addhā sammāsambuddhena
tika-s0102t:1349_5: Okappentoti ārammaṇaṃ anupavisitvā viya adhimuccanavasena avakappento pakkhandanto.
tika-s0102t:1349_8: Samādhikammikassa samādhino adhimattatāya paññāya adhimattatāpi icchitabbāti āha “samatāyapī”ti,
tika-s0102t:1350_2: kathaṃ satīti āha “sati pana sabbattha balavatī vaṭṭatī”ti.
tika-s0102t:1350_15: uddhate ca citte bhāvetabbā bojjhaṅgā atthikā etāyāti sabbatthikā.
tika-s0102t:1350_17: Tassa hi sati paṭisaraṇaṃ parāyaṇaṃ appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya.
tika-s0102t:1351_2: Taruṇavipassanāsamaṅgīpi bhāvanāmayañāṇe ṭhitattā ekaṃsato paññavā eva nāma hotīti āha “samapaññāsa lakkhaṇapariggāhikāya
tika-s0102t:1351_4: Ñeyyadhammassa gambhīrabhāvavasena tapparicchedakañāṇassa gambhīrabhāvaggahaṇanti āha “gambhīresu khandhādīsu pavattāya gambhīrapaññāyā”ti.
tika-s0102t:1351_5: Tañhi ñeyyaṃ tādisāya paññāya caritabbato gambhīrañāṇacariyaṃ,
tika-s0102t:1351_6: tassā vā paññāya tattha pabhedato pavatti gambhīrañāṇacariyā,
tika-s0102t:1351_9: evaṃ paññāvepullappattotipi so evāti āha “arahattamaggena bhāvanāpāripūrī hotī”ti.
tika-s0102t:1352_0: “Tattaṃ ayokhilaṃ hatthe gamentī”tiādinā vuttapañcavidhabandhanakammakāraṇā niraye nibbattasattassa yebhuyyena sabbapaṭhamaṃ karontīti,
tika-s0102t:1352_1: devadūtasuttādīsu tassa ādito vuttattā ca āha “pañcavidhabandhanakammakāraṇato paṭṭhāyā”ti.
tika-s0102t:1352_5: “Ekaṃ buddhantara”nti idaṃ aparāparaṃ petesu eva uppajjanakasattavasena vuttaṃ,
tika-s0102t:1352_6: ekaccānaṃ vā petānaṃ ekaccatiracchānānaṃ viya tathā dīghāyukatāpi siyāti tathā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1352_7: Tathā hi “kālo nāgarājā catunnaṃ buddhānaṃ sammukhībhāvaṃ labhitvā ṭhito metteyyassapi bhagavato sammukhībhāvaṃ labhissatī”ti vadanti,
tika-s0102t:1353_1: lokiyo ca visesādhigamo”ti evaṃ vīriye ānisaṃsadassanasīlassa.
tika-s0102t:1353_5: Sā hi bhikkhuno vaṭṭaniyyānāya gantabbā paṭipadāti katvā gamanavīthi nāma.
tika-s0102t:1353_8: Paccayadāyakānaṃ attani kārassa attano sammāpaṭipattiyā mahapphalabhāvassa karaṇena piṇḍassa bhikkhāya paṭipūjanā piṇḍāpacāyanaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1354_1: Taṃ saddaṃ sutvāti taṃ upāsikāya vacanaṃ attano vasanapaṇṇasāladvāre ṭhitova pañcābhiññatāya dibbasotena sutvā.
tika-s0102t:1354_6: veyyāvaccamayena ca puññakammena khettavisesabhāvūpagamanena aparāparaṃ devamanussasampattiyo,
tika-s0102t:1354_7: ante nibbānasampattiñca dātuṃ sakkhissasī”ti thero attānaṃ pucchati.
tika-s0102t:1354_8: Sitaṃ karonto vāti “akiccheneva mayā vaṭṭadukkhaṃ samatikkanta”nti paccavekkhaṇāvasāne sañjātapāmojjavasena sitaṃ karonto eva.
tika-s0102t:1355_1: Evaṃ yathā asammāpaṭipanno putto tāya eva asammāpaṭipattiyā kulasantānato bāhiro hutvā pitu santikā dāyajjassa na bhāgī, evaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1355_2: Kusītopi tena kusītabhāvena asammāpaṭipanno satthu santikā laddhabbaariyadhanadāyajjassa na bhāgī.
tika-s0102t:1356_0: Mahāti sīlādīhi guṇehi mahanto vipulo anaññasādhāraṇo.
tika-s0102t:1356_1: Taṃ panassa guṇamahattaṃ dasasahassilokadhātukampanena loke pākaṭanti dassento “satthuno hī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0102t:1357_0: Yasmā satthusāsane pabbajitassa pabbajjūpagamena sakyaputtassabhāvo sampajāyati,
tika-s0102t:1358_0: Alasānaṃ bhāvanāya nāmamattampi ajānantānaṃ kāyadaḷhībahulānaṃ yāvadatthaṃ bhuñjitvā seyyasukhādianuyuñjanakānaṃ
tika-s0102t:1358_2: “Divasaṃ caṅkamena nisajjāyā”tiādinā bhāvanāraddhavasena āraddhavīriyānaṃ daḷhaparakkamānaṃ kālena kālaṃ upasaṅkamanā āraddhavīriyapuggalasevanā.
tika-s0102t:1358_8: Tattha ānisaṃsadassāvitāya eva sammappadhānapaccavekkhaṇā gahitā hoti lokiyalokuttaravisesādhigamassa vīriyāyattatādassanabhāvato.
tika-s0102t:1359_0: Purimuppannā pīti parato uppajjanakapītiyā visesakāraṇasabhāgahetubhāvato “pītiyeva pītisambojjhaṅgaṭṭhānīyā dhammā”ti vuttā,
tika-s0102t:1359_1: tassā pana bahuso pavattiyā puthuttaṃ upādāya bahuvacananiddeso.
tika-s0102t:1361_1: Sakalasarīraṃ pharamānoti pītisamuṭṭhānehi paṇītarūpehi sakalasarīraṃ pharamāno.
tika-s0102t:1361_2: Dhammaguṇe anussarantassāpi yāva upacārā sakalasarīraṃ pharamāno pītisambojjhaṅgo uppajjatīti yojanā,
tika-s0102t:1361_5: Saṅkhārānaṃ sappadesavūpasamepi nippadesavūpasame viya tathā paññāya pavattito bhāvanāmanasikāro kilesavikkhambhanasamattho
tika-s0102t:1361_6: hutvā upacārasamādhiṃ āvahanto tathārūpapītisomanassasamannāgato pītisambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya hotīti
tika-s0102t:1361_13: tasmā taṃ nesaṃ asamudācāraṃ paccavekkhantassāti yojanā.
tika-s0102t:1361_14: Na hi kilese paccavekkhantassa bojjhaṅguppatti yuttā.
tika-s0102t:1361_16: sā tattha ādaragāravākaraṇena viññāyatīti āha “asakkaccakiriyāya saṃsūcitalūkhabhāve”ti.
tika-s0102t:1362_1: tassa passaddhisambojjhaṅgassa evaṃ uppādo hotīti yojanā.
tika-s0102t:1363_2: Tañhi tividhampi sappāyaṃ seviyamānaṃ kāyassa kallatāpādanavasena cittassa kallataṃ āvahantaṃ duvidhāyapi passaddhiyā kāraṇaṃ hoti.
tika-s0102t:1363_3: Ahetukaṃ sattesu labbhamānaṃ sukhadukkhanti ayameko anto,
tika-s0102t:1363_5: Ete ubho ante anupagamma yathāsakaṃ kammunā hotīti ayaṃ majjhimā paṭipatti.
tika-s0102t:1363_8: Ayañhi pahāya sāraddhakāyataṃ passaddhakāyatāya kāraṇaṃ hontī passaddhidvayaṃ āvahati,
tika-s0102t:1364_0: Yathāsamāhitākārasallakkhaṇavasena gayhamāno purimuppanno samatho eva samathanimittaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1364_1: Nānārammaṇe paribbhamanena vividhaṃ aggaṃ etassāti byaggo, vikkhepo.
tika-s0102t:1364_5: So eva nimittanti pubbe viya vattabbaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1365_2: samādhānāvahāpi tā honti samādhānāvahabhāveneva paññāvahabhāvatoti vuttaṃ “vatthuvisada…pe…
tika-s0102t:1366_1: rakkhanakosallassa ca taṃmūlakattā “nimittakusalatā nāma kasiṇanimittassa uggahaṇakusalatā” icceva vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1366_3: Asubhanimittassāpi hi yassa kassaci jhānuppattinimittassa uggahaṇakosallaṃ nimittakusalatā evāti.
tika-s0102t:1366_7: Tassa paggaṇhananti tassa līnassa cittassa dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgādisamuṭṭhāpanena layāpattito samuddharaṇaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1367_8: cittaṃ taṃ etehi dhammehi susamuṭṭhāpayaṃ hoti.
tika-s0102t:1367_12: so tattha sukkhāni ceva tiṇāni pakkhipeyya,
tika-s0102t:1367_17: bhabbo nu kho so puriso parittaṃ aggiṃ ujjālitunti.
tika-s0102t:1368_0: Ettha ca yathāsakaṃ āhāravasena dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgādīnaṃ bhāvanāsamuṭṭhāpanāti veditabbā,
tika-s0102t:1368_5: Tassa niggaṇhananti tassa uddhatassa cittassa samādhisambojjhaṅgādisamuṭṭhāpanena uddhatāpattito nisedhanaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1369_8: cittaṃ taṃ etehi dhammehi suvūpasamayaṃ hoti.
tika-s0102t:1369_14: bhabbo nu kho so puriso mahantaṃ aggikkhandhaṃ nibbāpetunti.
tika-s0102t:1370_0: Etthāpi yathāsakaṃ āhāravasena passaddhisambojjhaṅgādīnaṃ bhāvanāsamuṭṭhāpanāti veditabbā,
tika-s0102t:1370_7: Tattha yadā paññā na balavatī hoti,
tika-s0102t:1370_8: tadā bhāvanā pubbenāparaṃ visesāvahā na hoti,
tika-s0102t:1370_9: anabhisaṅkhato viya āhāro purisassa yogino cittassa abhiruciṃ na janeti,
tika-s0102t:1370_11: tathā bhāvanāya sammadeva avīthipaṭipattiyā upasamasukhaṃ na vindati,
tika-s0102t:1370_18: duggatiyañca hontīti tadaññameva pañcavidhabandhanādikhuppipāsādi aññamaññaṃ vibādhanādihetukaṃ apāyadukkhaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ,
tika-s0102t:1370_19: tayidaṃ sabbaṃ tesaṃ tesaṃ sattānaṃ paccuppannabhavanissitaṃ gahitanti atīte anāgate ca kāle vaṭṭamūlakadukkhāni visuṃ gahitāni.
tika-s0102t:1370_22: tesaṃ aññehi asādhāraṇaṃ jīvikādukkhaṃ aṭṭhamaṃ saṃvegavatthu gahitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1370_23: Ayaṃ vuccati samaye sampahaṃsanāti ayaṃ bhāvanācittassa sampahaṃsitabbasamaye vuttanayena saṃvegajananavasena
tika-s0102t:1371_1: samathavīthipaṭipattiyā ca sammā avisamaṃ sammadeva bhāvanāpaṭipattiṃ āgamma.
tika-s0102t:1371_14: Ayaṃ vuccati samaye ajjhupekkhanatāti ayaṃ ajjhupekkhitabbasamaye bhāvanācittassa paggahaniggahasampahaṃsanesu
tika-s0102t:1371_17: vipassanāya adhiṭṭhānabhāvūpagamanato ca upacārajjhānampi samādhāna kiccanipphattiyā puggalassa samāhitabhāvasādhanaṃ
tika-s0102t:1371_18: evāti tattha samadhurabhāvenāha “upacāraṃ vā appanaṃ vā”ti.
tika-s0102t:1372_2: Anurodhavirodhavippahānavasena majjhattabhāvo upekkhāsambojjhaṅgassa kāraṇaṃ tasmiṃ sati sijjhanato,
tika-s0102t:1372_4: So ca majjhattabhāvo visayavasena duvidhoti āha “sattamajjhattatā saṅkhāramajjhattatā”ti.
tika-s0102t:1372_5: Tadubhaye ca virujjhanaṃ passaddhisambojjhaṅgabhāvanāya eva dūrīkatanti anurujjhanasseva pahānavidhiṃ dassetuṃ “sattamajjhattatā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1372_15: Sati hi attani tassa kiñcanabhāvena cīvaraṃ,
tika-s0102t:1372_16: aññaṃ vā kiñci attaniyaṃ nāma siyā,
tika-s0102t:1373_0: Mamāyatīti mamattaṃ karoti “mamā”ti taṇhāya pariggayha tiṭṭhati.
tika-s0102t:1375_0: Ayaṃ satipaṭṭhānadesanā pubbabhāgamaggavasena desitāti pubbabhāgiyabojjhaṅge sandhāyāha “bojjhaṅgapariggāhikā sati dukkhasacca”nti.
tika-s0102t:1379_2: Bādhanakkhaṇato yo yo vā sabhāvo yathāsabhāvo, tato,
tika-s0102t:1379_4: Janikaṃ samuṭṭhāpikanti pavattalakkhaṇassa dukkhassa janikaṃ nimittalakkhaṇassa samuṭṭhāpikaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1379_5: Purimataṇhanti yathāpariggahitassa dukkhassa nibbattito puretaraṃ siddhaṃ taṇhaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1379_13: Dukkhaṃ dukkhasaccaṃ parijānāti pariññābhisamayavasena paricchindatīti dukkhaparijānano,
tika-s0102t:1381_6: Nippariyāyato khandhānaṃ paṭhamābhinibbatti jātīti katvā “jananaṃ jātī”ti vatvā svāyaṃ uppādavikāro aparinipphanno yesu khandhesu icchitabbo,
tika-s0102t:1381_9: Jātiādīni hi tīṇi lakkhaṇāni dhammānaṃ vikāravisesāti.
tika-s0102t:1381_10: “Upasaggamaṇḍitavevacana”nti iminā kevalaṃ upasaggena padavaḍḍhanaṃ katanti dasseti.
tika-s0102t:1382_0: Atha vā jananaṃ jātīti aparipuṇṇāyatanaṃ jātimāha.
tika-s0102t:1382_5: vatthikosañca okkamantā pavisantā viya paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhanti.
tika-s0102t:1382_7: Te hi pākaṭā eva hutvā nibbattanti.
tika-s0102t:1382_10: yonivasena ca dvīhi dvīhi padehi sabbasatte pariyādiyitvā jātiṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1382_16: tena “āyatanānaṃ paṭilābho”ti imassa padassa saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0102t:1382_20: Āyatanānaṃ paṭilābhoti ekacatuvokārabhavesu dvinnaṃ dvinnaṃ āyatanānaṃ vasena,
tika-s0102t:1382_22: kāmadhātuyaṃ vikalāvikalindriyānaṃ vasena sattannaṃ, navannaṃ, dasannaṃ,
tika-s0102t:1382_27: Paṭiladdhāni nāma honti sattasantānassa tassa saṃvijjamānattā.
tika-s0102t:1382_28: Āyatanānaṃ paṭilābhoti vā āyatanānaṃ attalābho veditabbo.
tika-s0102t:1383_13: Valittacatāya vā vali taco assāti valittaco.
tika-s0102t:1385_4: Khandhā bhijjantīti ekabhavapariyāpannassa khandhasantānassa pariyosānabhūtā khandhā bhijjanti,
tika-s0102t:1385_9: “Maccu maraṇa”nti samāsaṃ akatvā yo “maccū”ti vuccati bhedo,
tika-s0102t:1385_11: idaṃ vuccati maraṇanti visuṃ sambandho na na yujjati.
tika-s0102t:1385_15: kālassa vā antakassa kiriyāti yā loke vuccati, sā cuti,
tika-s0102t:1385_17: Ayaṃ sabbāpi sammutikathāva “yaṃ tesaṃ tesaṃ sattāna”ntiādinā sattavasena vuttattā.
tika-s0102t:1385_18: Ayaṃ paramatthakathā paramatthato labbhamānānaṃ ruppanādisabhāvānaṃ dhammānaṃ vinassanajotanābhāvato.
tika-s0102t:1386_4: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃpana “maraṇaṃ pattassā”tiādinā nikkhepahetutāya patanaṃ “nikkhepo”ti phalūpacārena vuttanti dasseti.
tika-s0102t:1386_5: “Khandhānaṃ bhedo”ti pabandhavasena pavattamānassa dhammasamūhassa vināsajotanāti ekadesato paramatthakathā,
tika-s0102t:1386_6: “jīvitindriyassa upacchedo”ti panettha na koci vohāraleso pīti āha “jīvitindriyassa upacchedo pana sabbākārato paramatthato maraṇa”nti.
tika-s0102t:1386_7: Evaṃ santepi yassa khandhabhedassa pavattattā “tisso mato,
tika-s0102t:1386_9: so bhedo khandhappabandhassa anupacchinnatāya “sammutimaraṇa”nti vattabbataṃ arahatīti āha “etadeva sammutimaraṇantipi vuccatī”ti.
tika-s0102t:1388_1: “Ādissa ādissa devanti paridevanti etenāti ādevo”ti ādevana-
tika-s0102t:1388_2: saddaṃ katvā assumocanādivikāraṃ āpajjantānaṃ tabbikārāpattiyā so saddo kāraṇabhāvena vutto.
tika-s0102t:1388_3: Taṃ taṃ vaṇṇanti taṃ taṃ guṇaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1389_4: so eva attho sabhāvoti dukkhamanaṭṭho, tena.
tika-s0102t:1390_2: taṃ pana yasmā cittena samaṃ pakārehi yuttaṃ,
tika-s0102t:1391_8: te “upāyāso tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā sampayutto,
tika-s0102t:1391_9: ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā kehici sampayutto”ti.
tika-s0102t:1392_4: Maggabhāvanāya maggabhāvanicchāhetukatā icchitabbāti tādisaṃ icchaṃ nivattento “vinā maggabhāvana”nti āha.
tika-s0102t:1392_5: Aparo nayo na kho panetanti yametaṃ “aho vata mayaṃ na jātidhammā assāma,
tika-s0102t:1392_6: na ca vata no jāti āgaccheyyā”ti evaṃ pahīnasamudayesu ariyesu vijjamānaṃ ajātidhammattaṃ,
tika-s0102t:1392_7: parinibbutesu ca vijjamānaṃ jātiyā anāgamanaṃ icchitaṃ,
tika-s0102t:1392_9: anicchantassāpi bhāvanāya pattabbato na icchāya pattabbaṃ nāma hotīti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0102t:1392_11: saddoti āha “upari sesāni upādāya pi- kāro”ti.
tika-s0102t:1392_12: Yanti hetuatthe karaṇe paccattavacananti āha “yenapi dhammenā”ti.
tika-s0102t:1392_22: so pana atthato añño dhammo natthi,
tika-s0102t:1394_5: saddena gamitatthattā kiriyāvācakassa saddassa adassanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ yathā “asūpabhakkhanasīlo asūpiko”ti.
tika-s0102t:1394_8: punappunaṃ bhave nibbattetīti ponobbhavikā”ti attho vutto so “taddhitā” iti bahuvacananiddesato,
tika-s0102t:1394_10: abhidhānalakkhaṇattā vā taddhitānaṃ tesupi atthesu ponobbhavikasaddasiddhi sambhaveyyāti katvā vutto.
tika-s0102t:1394_19: byañjanameva nānanti taṇhā “nandīrāgena saddhiṃ atthato ekattameva gatā”ti vuttā.
tika-s0102t:1394_22: Tasmā nandīrāgasahagatāti nandīrāgabhāvaṃ gatā sabbāsupi avatthāsu nandīrāgabhāvassa apaccakkhāya vattanatoti attho.
tika-s0102t:1394_24: Rūpārūpabhavarāgassa visuṃ vuccamānattā kāmabhave eva bhavapatthanuppatti vuttāti veditabbā.
tika-s0102t:1395_13: tasmiṃ sati tuṅgā nāsā yesaṃ te tuṅganāsā,
tika-s0102t:1395_14: evaṃ laddhavohārā sattā attano ghānanti yojanā kātabbā.
tika-s0102t:1395_23: tadā ettha uppajjatīti sāmaññena gahitā uppādakiriyā lakkhaṇabhāvena vuttā,
tika-s0102t:1395_25: Na hi sāmaññavisesehi nānattavohāro na hotīti.
tika-s0102t:1395_26: Uppajjamānāti vā anicchito uppādo hetubhāvena vutto,
tika-s0102t:1395_27: uppajjatīti nicchito phalabhāvena yadi uppajjamānā hoti,
tika-s0102t:1397_1: “Sabbāni nibbānavevacanānevā”ti vatvā tamatthaṃ pākaṭataraṃ kātuṃ “nibbānañhī”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1397_12: Kasmā panetaṃ nibbānaṃ ekameva samānaṃ nānānāmehi vuccatīti?
tika-s0102t:1397_14: Saṅkhatadhammavidhurasabhāvattā nibbānassa nāmānipi guṇanemittikattā saṅkhatadhammavidhurāneva hontīti
tika-s0102t:1397_20: na vā etasmiṃ adhigate puggalassa uppādoti anuppādo,
tika-s0102t:1398_1: pahāne pana sati tattha tatthevassā abhāvo sudassitoti āha “tattheva abhāvaṃ dassetu”nti.
tika-s0102t:1398_4: Tittaalābuvalliyā appavattiṃ icchanto puriso viya ariyamaggo,
tika-s0102t:1398_5: tassa tassā appavattininnacittassa mūlacchedanaṃ viya maggassa nibbānārammaṇassa taṇhāya pahānaṃ,
tika-s0102t:1398_6: tadappavatti viya taṇhāya appavattibhūtaṃ nibbānaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1399_2: Dakkhiṇadvāre ghātitāpi corā pacchā “aṭaviyaṃ corā ghātitā”ti vuccanti,
tika-s0102t:1399_3: evaṃ nibbānaṃ āgamma niruddhāpi taṇhā “cakkhādīsu niruddhā”ti vuccati tattha kiccakaraṇābhāvatoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1399_4: Purimā vā upamā maggena niruddhāya “piyarūpasātarūpesu niruddhā”ti vattabbatādassanatthaṃ vuttā,
tika-s0102t:1399_5: pacchimā nibbānaṃ āgamma niruddhāya “piyarūpasātarūpesu niruddhā”ti vattabbatādassanatthaṃ vuttāti ayaṃ etāsaṃ viseso.
tika-s0102t:1401_5: tesu ca bhikkhūsu ekaccānaṃ paccakkhabhāvato āsannapaccakkhavacanaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1401_8: puggalassa ariyabhāvakarattā ariyaṃ karotīti vā ariyo,
tika-s0102t:1401_9: ariyaphalapaṭilābhakarattā vā ariyaṃ phalaṃ labhāpeti janetīti ariyo.
tika-s0102t:1401_13: catusaccaṃ vā uddissa pavattaṃ bhāvanākammaṃ yogino sukhavisesānaṃ ṭhānabhūtanti catusaccakammaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1402_5: na ito bhiyyo”ti paricchinditvā jānanameva vuttanayena paṭivedhoti pariññāpaṭivedho, tena.
tika-s0102t:1402_6: Idañca yathā tasmiṃ ñāṇe pavatte pacchā dukkhassa sarūpādiparicchede sammoho na hoti,
tika-s0102t:1402_9: Pahīnassa puna appahātabbatāya pakaṭṭhaṃ hānaṃ cajanaṃ samucchindanaṃ,
tika-s0102t:1402_11: Ayampi yasmiṃ kilese appahīyamāne maggabhāvanāya na bhavitabbaṃ,
tika-s0102t:1402_13: tassa kilesassa paṭighātaṃ karontassa anuppattidhammataṃ āpādentassa ñāṇassa tathāpavattiyaṃ paṭighātābhāvena nissaṅgacāraṃ upādāya evaṃ vutto.
tika-s0102t:1402_14: Sacchikiriyā paccakkhakaraṇaṃ anussavākāraparivitakkādike muñcitvā sarūpato ārammaṇakaraṇaṃ “idaṃ ta”nti yathāsabhāvato gahaṇaṃ,
tika-s0102t:1402_15: sā eva vuttanayena paṭivedhoti sacchikiriyāpaṭivedho, tena.
tika-s0102t:1402_16: Ayaṃ panassa āvaraṇassa asamucchindanato ñāṇaṃ nirodhaṃ ālambituṃ na sakkoti,
tika-s0102t:1402_17: tassa samucchindanato taṃ sarūpato vibhāventameva pavattatīti evaṃ vutto.
tika-s0102t:1402_23: Paṭhamamaggepi hi yathārahaṃ vuṭṭhānagāminiyaṃ pavattaṃ parijānanādiṃ vaḍḍhento pavattoti vaḍḍhanaṭṭhena bhāvanā sakkā viññātuṃ.
tika-s0102t:1402_25: puggalantarabhāvasādhanato ca uppādanaṭṭhena bhāvanā sakkā viññātuṃ,
tika-s0102t:1402_26: sā eva vuttanayena paṭivedhoti bhāvanāpaṭivedho, tena.
tika-s0102t:1402_27: Ayampi hi yathā ñāṇe pavatte pacchā maggadhammānaṃ sarūpaparicchede sammoho na hoti,
tika-s0102t:1403_1: yathāpavattesu phaladhammesupi ayaṃ yathādhigatasaccadhammesu viya vigatasammohova hoti.
tika-s0102t:1403_2: Tenevāha “diṭṭhadhammo pattadhammo viditadhammo pariyogāḷhadhammo”ti yato sacassa dhammatāsañcoditā yathādhigatasaccadhammālambaniyo
tika-s0102t:1403_6: Ekābhisamayena abhisametīti etthāha vitaṇḍavādī “ariyamaggañāṇaṃ catūsu saccesu nānābhisamayavasena kiccakara”nti,
tika-s0102t:1403_8: Idāni tameva ekābhisamayaṃ vitthāravasena vibhāvetuṃ “evamassā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1403_13: idha pana uggahādivasena pavatto avabodho pariyāyato tathā vutto.
tika-s0102t:1403_14: Paṭivedhanimittattā vā uggahādivasena pavattaṃ dukkhādīsu pubbabhāge ñāṇaṃ “paṭivedho”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0102t:1403_16: Kiccatoti pubbabhāgehi dukkhādiñāṇehi kātabbakiccassa idha nipphattito,
tika-s0102t:1403_23: Adhigame hi sati tassā siyā avasaro.
tika-s0102t:1404_0: Taṃyeva hi anavasaraṃ dassetuṃ “imassa cā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1404_3: Tathā tāni pariggaṇhanato manasikāradaḷhatāya pubbabhāgiyā dukkhapariññādayo honti yevāti āha “pariggahato paṭṭhāya hotī”ti.
tika-s0102t:1404_5: Duddasattāti attano pavattikkhaṇavasena pākaṭānipi pakatiñāṇena sabhāvarasato daṭṭhuṃ asakkuṇeyyattā.
tika-s0102t:1404_7: tathāpi matthakappattena ariyamaggañāṇeneva yāthāvato passitabbattā gambhīrāni.
tika-s0102t:1404_10: anuppannapubbatāya ca pavattivasena apākaṭattā ca paramagambhīrattā,
tika-s0102t:1404_11: tathā paramagambhīrañāṇeneva passitabbatāya pakatiñāṇena daṭṭhuṃ na sakkuṇeyyānīti duddasāni.
tika-s0102t:1404_18: Ekameva taṃ ñāṇanti dukkhādīsu pariññādikiccasādhanavasena ekameva taṃ maggañāṇaṃ hoti.
tika-s0102t:1405_0: Imesu tīsu ṭhānesūti imesu viramitabbatāvasena jotitesu tīsu kāmabyāpādavihiṃsāvitakkavatthūsu.
tika-s0102t:1405_3: yena ca upāyena kāraṇena kāmavitakko uppajjati,
tika-s0102t:1405_4: so tassa gatamaggoti tassa pacchedo ghāto padapacchedo,
tika-s0102t:1405_8: Maggakiccasādhanena maggaṅgaṃ pūrayamāno ekova tividhakiccasādhano kusalasaṅkappo uppajjati.
tika-s0102t:1405_10: Iminā nayena “imesu catūsu ṭhānesū”tiādīsupi attho veditabbo.
tika-s0102t:1406_1: sabbe sampayuttadhammā ca sikkhāpadānīti āgatānīti tattha padhānānaṃ viraticetanānaṃ vasena “viratiyopi
tika-s0102t:1406_4: saddena na kevalaṃ pisuṇavācā veramaṇiādīnaṃyeva saṅgaho,
tika-s0102t:1406_5: atha kho tādisānaṃ cetanānampi saṅgaho”ti vadanti,
tika-s0102t:1406_9: maggakkhaṇe pana viratiyova icchitabbā cetanānaṃ amaggaṅgattā.
tika-s0102t:1406_11: ekāya viratiyā musāvādādiviratibhāvo viya ca ekāya cetanāya sammāvācādikiccattayasādhanasabhāvābhāvā sammāvācādibhāvāsiddhito,
tika-s0102t:1407_0: Bhikkhussa ājīvahetukaṃ kāyavacīduccaritaṃ nāma ayoniso āhārapariyesanahetukameva siyāti āha “khādanīya…pe…
tika-s0102t:1408_0: Anuppannānanti asamudācāravasena vā ananubhūtārammaṇavasena vā anuppannānaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1408_1: Aññathā hi anamatagge saṃsāre anuppannā pāpakā akusalā dhammā nāma na santi.
tika-s0102t:1408_3: Yasmiṃ bhave ayaṃ imaṃ vīriyaṃ ārabhati,
tika-s0102t:1408_6: Tādisaṃ chandaṃ kurumāno evaṃ chandaṃ janeti nāma.
tika-s0102t:1408_9: Vīriyena cittaṃ paggahitaṃ karotīti teneva sahajātavīriyena cittaṃ ukkhipento kosajjapātato nisedhanena paggahitaṃ karoti.
tika-s0102t:1408_11: Paṭipāṭiyā panetāni cattāri padāni āsevanābhāvanābahulīkammasātaccakiriyāhi yojetabbāni.
tika-s0102t:1409_1: Bhavati hi taṃsadisesu tabbohāro yathā “sā eva tittiri,
tika-s0102t:1409_6: Anuppannānaṃ kusalānanti ettha kusalāti uttarimanussadhammā adhippetā,
tika-s0102t:1409_9: “Ṭhitiyā vīriyaṃ ārabhatī”ti vutte na khaṇaṭhiti adhippetā tadatthaṃ vīriyārabbhena payojanābhāvato,
tika-s0102t:1409_10: atha kho pabandhaṭhiti adhippetāti āha “punappunaṃ uppattipabandhavasena ṭhitattha”nti.
tika-s0102t:1409_11: Sammussanaṃ paṭipakkhadhammavasena adassanamupagamananti tappaṭikkhepena asammussanaṃ asammosoti āha “asammosāyāti avināsanattha”nti.
tika-s0102t:1411_0: Jhānāni pubbabhāgepi maggakkhaṇepi nānāti yadipi samādhiupakārakehi abhiniropanānumajjanasampiyāyanabrūhanasantasukhasabhāvehi
tika-s0102t:1411_1: vitakkādīhi sampayogabhedato bhāvanātisayappavattānaṃ catunnaṃ jhānānaṃ vasena sammāsamādhi vibhatto,
tika-s0102t:1411_3: sati viya ca asubhāsukhāniccānattesu kāyādīsu subhādisaññāppahānacatusatikiccaṃ,
tika-s0102t:1411_4: eko samādhi catujhānasamādhikiccaṃ na sādhetīti pubbabhāgepi paṭhamajjhānasamādhi eva maggakkhaṇepi,
tika-s0102t:1411_5: tathā pubbabhāgepi catutthajjhānasamādhi eva maggakkhaṇe pīti attho.
tika-s0102t:1411_8: Ayaṃ panassāti ettha maggabhāvena catubbidhampi ekattena gahetvā “assā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0102t:1411_10: Ayanti pana ayaṃ jhānavasena sabbasadisasabbāsadisekaccasadisatā viseso.
tika-s0102t:1412_0: Pādakajjhānaniyamena hotīti idha pādakajjhānaniyamaṃ dhuraṃ katvā vuttaṃ,
tika-s0102t:1412_5: Vipassanāniyamo pana sādhāraṇattā idhāpi na paṭikkhittoti daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0102t:1412_6: Aññe ca ācariyavādā parato vakkhamānā vibhajitabbāti yathāvuttameva tāva pādakajjhānaniyamaṃ vibhajanto āha “pādakajjhānaniyamena tāvā”ti.
tika-s0102t:1412_8: yasmā āsannapadese vuṭṭhitasamāpatti maggassa attano sadisabhāvaṃ karoti bhūmivaṇṇo viya godhāvaṇṇassa.
tika-s0102t:1412_9: Paripuṇṇāneva hontīti aṭṭha satta ca hontīti attho.
tika-s0102t:1412_20: tena atthato “catukkapañcakajjhānaṃ uppajjatī”ti vuttameva hotīti evamāhāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1412_22: na lokiya”nti āha “avayavekattaṃ liṅgasamudāyassa visesakaṃ hotī”ti.
tika-s0102t:1412_26: Ettha kathanti pādakajjhānassa abhāvā kathaṃ daṭṭhabbanti attho.
tika-s0102t:1412_29: Tikacatukkajjhānikaṃ pana maggaṃ bhāvetvā tattha uppannassa arūpacatutthajjhānaṃ,
tika-s0102t:1412_30: tajjhānikaṃ phalañca pādakaṃ katvā uparimaggabhāvanāya aññajhānikāpi uppajjantīti,
tika-s0102t:1413_2: Tatiyavāre kecīti “pādakajjhānameva niyametī”ti evaṃ vādinaṃ tipiṭakacūḷanāgattherañceva anantaraṃ vutte
tika-s0102t:1413_3: dve ca there ṭhapetvā itare there sandhāya vadati.
tika-s0102t:1414_1: Sasantatipariyāpannānaṃ dukkhasamudayānaṃ appavattibhāvena pariggayhamāno nirodhopi sasantatipariyāpanno
tika-s0102t:1414_2: viya hotīti katvā vuttaṃ “attano vā cattāri saccānī”ti.
tika-s0102t:1414_4: Tenāha bhagavā “imasmiṃyeva byāmamatte kaḷevare sasaññimhi samanake lokañca paññāpemi,
tika-s0102t:1414_7: lokanirodhagāminipaṭipadañca paññāpemī”ti kathaṃ pana ādikammiko nirodhamaggasaccāni pariggaṇhātīti?
tika-s0102t:1414_9: Evañca katvā lokuttarabojjhaṅge uddissāpi pariggaho na virujjhati.
tika-s0102t:1414_11: ṭhapetvā nirodhasaccaṃ sesasaccavasena samudayavayāti veditabbāti attho.
tika-s0102t:1417_1: “Aṭṭhikasaṅkhalikaṃ samaṃsa”ntiādikā satta sivathikā aṭṭhikakammaṭṭhānatāya itarāsaṃ uddhumātakādīnaṃ
tika-s0102t:1417_8: ālokitādayo ca rūpadhammānaṃ avatthāvisesamattatāya na sammasanupagā viññattiādayo viya.
tika-s0102t:1417_11: Kesādiapadesena tadupādānadhammā viya iriyāpathādiapadesena tadavatthā rūpadhammā pariggayhanti,
tika-s0102t:1417_13: taṃnissayadhammāti adhippāyena mahāsivatthero ca iriyāpathādīsupi “abhiniveso jāyatī”ti avoca.
tika-s0102t:1417_14: “Atthi nu kho me”tiādi pana sabhāvato iriyāpathādīnaṃ ādikammikassa anicchitabhāvadassanaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1418_0: Kāmaṃ “idha bhikkhave bhikkhū”tiādinā uddesaniddesesu tattha tattha bhikkhuggahaṇaṃ kataṃ taṃpaṭipattiyā bhikkhubhāvadassanatthaṃ,
tika-s0102t:1418_1: desanā pana sabbasādhāraṇāti dassetuṃ “yo hi koci bhikkhave” icceva vuttaṃ,
tika-s0102t:1418_2: na bhikkhu yevāti dassento “yo hi koci bhikkhu vā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0102t:1418_3: Dassanamaggena ñātamariyādaṃ anatikkamitvā jānantī sikhāppattā aggamaggapaññā aññā nāma,
tika-s0102t:1418_4: tassa phalabhāvato aggaphalaṃ pīti āha “aññāti arahatta”nti.
tika-s0102t:1419_0: Appatarepi kāle sāsanassa niyyānikabhāvaṃ dassentoti yojanā. Niyyātentoti nigamento.
tika-s0102t:1421_1: Puññāni karonto kappasatasahassaṃ devesu ceva manussesu ca uppajjitvā visesaṃ nibbattetuṃ nāsakkhi indriyānaṃ aparipakkattā.
tika-s0102t:1422_1: puññasambhārassa ca sātisayattā vinipātaṃ agantvā ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ…pe…
tika-s0102t:1423_0: “Kuladārikāya kucchimhi uppanno”ti vatvā taṃ evassa uppannabhāvaṃ mūlato paṭṭhāya dassetuṃ “sā cā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1423_6: Satipi visākhāya ca sāvatthivāsikulapariyāpannatte tassā tattha padhānabhāvadassanatthaṃ “visākhañcā”ti
tika-s0102t:1423_9: Pañheti “bhikkhu bhikkhu ayaṃ vammiko”tiādinā āgate pannarasapañhe.
tika-s0102t:1424_3: Atthavacanena pana uttarasaddaṃ apekkhitvā setabyatoti nissakkappayogo kato.
tika-s0102t:1426_6: taṃ pana diṭṭhigataṃ tassa ayonisomanasikārādivasena uppajjitvā paṭipakkhasammukhībhāvābhāvato,
tika-s0102t:1426_7: anurūpāhāralābhato ca samudācārappattaṃ jātanti pāḷiyaṃ “uppannaṃ hotī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1426_8: Taṃ taṃ kāraṇaṃ apadisitvāti tato idhāgacchanakassa,
tika-s0102t:1426_9: ito tattha gacchanakassa ca apadisanato “tattha tattheva sattānaṃ ucchijjanato”ti evamādi taṃ taṃ kāraṇaṃ paṭirūpakaṃ apadisitvā.
tika-s0102t:1429_1: Yathā candimasūriyā uḷāravipulobhāsatāya aññena obhāsena anabhibhavanīyā,
tika-s0102t:1429_6: kittakañca ṭhānaṃ nesaṃ ābhā pharatī”ti evamādimpi codanaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-s0102t:1429_10: Tasmāti yasmā yathāvuttaṃ codanaṃ nibbeṭhetuṃ na sakkoti, tasmā.
tika-s0102t:1429_11: Attano anicchitaṃ saṅghātanaṃ pakkhaṃ paṭijānanto “parasmiṃ loke,
tika-s0102t:1430_0: Kathaṃ panāyaṃ natthikadiṭṭhi “devo”ti paṭijānātīti tattha kāraṇaṃ dassetuṃ “bhagavā panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1430_2: manussāpi manussattabhāveneva ucchijjantī”ti evaṃ vā assa diṭṭhi,
tika-s0102t:1433_4: Kammakāraṇaṃ karotīti āyūhanānurūpaṃ taṃ taṃ kāraṇaṃ karoti,
tika-s0102t:1433_9: Evaṃ suttato nirayapālānaṃ atthibhāvaṃ dassetvā idāni yuttitopi dassetuṃ “manussaloke”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1433_10: Tattha nerayike niraye pālenti tato niggantuṃ appadānavasena rakkhantīti nirayapālā.
tika-s0102t:1435_2: Taṃ pana tassa tassa gūthassa tathā sodhanaṃ apanayanaṃ hotīti āha “apanethā”ti.
tika-s0102t:1436_1: so pana yasmā manavaḍḍhanako manoharo na hoti,
tika-s0102t:1436_3: Asucisaṅkhātaṃ asucibhāgataṃ attano sabhāvataṃ gato pattoti asucisaṅkhātoti āha “asucikoṭṭhāsabhūto”ti.
tika-s0102t:1438_0: 419. Sundaradhammeti sobhanaguṇe. Sugatisukhanti sugati ceva tappariyāpannaṃ sukhañca.
tika-s0102t:1440_7: Nibbisanti yassa pana taṃ kammaphalaṃ nibbisanto niyuñjanto,
tika-s0102t:1440_8: nibbisanti vā nibbesaṃ vetanaṃ paṭikaṅkhanto bhatapuriso yathā.
tika-s0102t:1443_1: “Nikkhamantaṃ vā pavisantaṃ vā jīva”nti idaṃ tassa ajjhāsayavasena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1443_2: So hi “sattānaṃ supinadassanakāle attabhāvato jīvo bahi nikkhamitvā taṃtaṃārāmarāmaṇeyyakadassanādivasena
tika-s0102t:1443_3: ito cito ca paribbhamitvā punadeva attabhāvaṃ anupavisatī”ti evaṃ pavattamicchāgāhavipallattacitto.
tika-s0102t:1443_4: Athassa thero khuddakāya āṇiyā vipulaṃ āṇiṃ nīharanto viya jīvasamaññāmukhena ucchedadiṭṭhiṃ nīharitukāmo
tika-s0102t:1443_5: “api nu tā tuyhaṃ jīvaṃ passanti pavisantaṃ vā nikkhamantaṃ vā”ti āha.
tika-s0102t:1443_7: taṃ dassento “cittācāraṃ jīvanti gahetvā āhā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1447_4: āmatoti vā īsaṃ darathena usmanā yuttamaraṇo marantoti attho.
tika-s0102t:1447_8: Tathā rūpassa odhunanaṃ nāmassa orato parivattanamevāti āha “orato karothā”ti.
tika-s0102t:1447_10: taṃ pana parato karaṇanti āha “parato karothā”ti.
tika-s0102t:1447_11: Paramukhaṃ katassa ito cito parivattanaṃ niddhunananti āha “aparāparaṃ karothā”ti.
tika-s0102t:1447_12: Indriyāni aparibhinnānīti adhippāyena “tañcāyatanaṃ na paṭisaṃvedetī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1451_2: svāssa aggikabhāvo yasmā aggihutamālāvedisampādanehi ceva indhanadhūmabarihisasappitelūpaharaṇehi balipupphadhūmagandhādiupahārehi
tika-s0102t:1452_6: parassa guṇe uttaritare ḍaṃsitvā viya chaḍḍento attano guṇehi same karotīti attho.
tika-s0102t:1454_5: tañca sannayhato dhanunā vinā na sannayhatīti āha “sannaddhadhanukalāpa”nti.
tika-s0102t:1454_6: Āsittodakāni vaṭumānīti gamanamaggā ceva taṃtaṃudakamaggā ca sammadeva devena phuṭṭhattā tahaṃ tahaṃ paggharitaudaka sandamānaudakā.
tika-s0102t:1455_1: yathā “amma ito karohī”ti vutte ṭhapesīti attho karaṇakiriyāya kiriyāsāmaññavācībhāvato.
tika-s0102t:1457_2: yāya salākāya ṭhitāya ca parājayo hoti,
tika-s0102t:1459_4: Gāmapadanti yathā purisassa pādanikkhittaṭṭhānaṃ adhigataparicchedaṃ “pada”nti vuccati,
tika-s0102t:1459_7: Susannaddhoti sukhena gahetvā gamanayogyatāvasena suṭṭhu sajjito.
tika-s0102t:1459_8: Taṃ pana susajjanaṃ suṭṭhu bandhanavasenevāti āha “subaddho”ti.
tika-s0102t:1460_0: Ayādīnampi lohabhāve satipi loha-saddo sāsane tambalohe niruḷhoti āha “lohanti tambaloha”nti.
tika-s0102t:1462_3: Pañhupaṭṭhānānīti pañhesu upaṭṭhānāni mayā pucchitatthesu tumhākaṃ vissajjanavasena ñāṇupaṭṭhānāni.
tika-s0102t:1464_11: taṃ pana vappābhāvato asāraṃ hotīti āha “nissārakhette”ti.
tika-s0102t:1464_13: svāssa kucchitabhāvo asāratāya vā siyā ninnatādidosavasena vā.
tika-s0102t:1464_14: Tattha paṭhamo pakkho paṭhamapadena dassitoti itaraṃ dassento “visamabhūmibhāge”ti āha.
tika-s0102t:1464_17: Tāni pana yasmā sāravantāni na honti,
tika-s0102t:1464_19: Vātātapahatānīti vātena ca ātapena ca vinaṭṭhabījasāmatthiyāni.
tika-s0102t:1464_24: Etāni pana bījāni na tādisāni khaṇḍādidosavantatāya.
tika-s0102t:1464_26: taṃ paṭikkhepavasena dassento āha “na sammā vasseyyā”ti.
tika-s0102t:1465_2: Gavādighātenapi hi tattha paṭiggāhakānaṃ ghāso saṅkīyati.
tika-s0102t:1467_1: Atha kho tehi sakuṇḍakehi taṇḍulehi siddhaṃbhattaṃ uttaṇḍulameva hotīti āha “uttaṇḍulabhatta”nti.
tika-s0102t:1468_2: taṃ pana kammaphalasaddhāya abhāvena hotīti āha “saddhāvirahita”nti.
tika-s0102t:1470_3: Aṭṭhāsīti phalassa kammasarikkhataṃ dassento vimānadvāre nibbattitvā aṭṭhāsi.
tika-s0102t:1470_6: atha kho utusukhumavasena pīti dassento “tattha kirassa utusukhaṃ hotī”ti āha.
tika-s0102t:1471_1: Yadi asakkaccaṃ dānaṃ datvā pāyāsi tattha nibbatto,
tika-s0102t:1471_2: pāyāsissa paricārikā sakkaccaṃ dānaṃ datvā kathaṃ tattha nibbattāti āha “pāyāsissa panā”ti.
